reference: I also consider it essential that the national of the third country in question be released immediately if the public custody is not legal.
source: Považuji rovněž za nezbytné, aby byl daný státní příslušník třetí země okamžitě propuštěn, pokud je vazba nezákonná.

errors.contrastive: I also consider it essential that the national of the third country in question be released immediately if the public bond is not legal.

reference: [Rather, I was held in a van outside for what they call "investigative detention."]
source: Místo toho jsem byl držen v dodávce nazvané "vyšetřovací vazba".

errors.contrastive: [Rather, I was held in a van outside for what they call "investigative bond."]

reference: Introducing repressive measures towards so-called illegal immigrants, such as so-called temporary custody, and keeping them under the horrendous conditions that exist in some detention centres (according to the LIBE Committee) violate internationally recognised conventions for the protection of human rights.
source: Zavedení represivních opatření vůči tzv. nelegálním přistěhovalcům, jakým je tzv. předběžná vazba, a jejich zadržování v hrozných podmínkách, jaké panují v některých internačních střediscích (podle zjištění výboru LIBE), je v rozporu s mezinárodněprávními úmluvami na ochranu lidských práv.

errors.contrastive: Introducing repressive measures towards so-called illegal immigrants, such as so-called temporary bond, and keeping them under the horrendous conditions that exist in some detention centres (according to the LIBE Committee) violate internationally recognised conventions for the protection of human rights.

reference: Said I have to take some classes if I want to keep the number one singles spot, so this is basically detention in a leotard.
source: Říkal, že budu muset víc trénovat, pokud chci zůstat jedničkou ve dvouhře. Takže tohle je vlastně vazba, jen v trikotu.

errors.contrastive: Said I have to take some classes if I want to keep the number one singles spot, so this is basically bond in a leotard.

reference: Then, if that flagging of them as a person of interest is not promptly removed, longer-term restrictions could follow, such as refusal of visas and entry, bans on employment or even arrest and detention.
source: Jestliže nejsou včas zbaveny nálepky podezřelých osob, mohou se později setkat s omezeními dlouhodobější povahy, jako je zamítnutí víz či vstupu, zákazy v oblasti zaměstnání nebo dokonce zadržení a vazba.

errors.contrastive: Then, if that flagging of them as a person of interest is not promptly removed, longer-term restrictions could follow, such as refusal of visas and entry, bans on employment or even arrest and bond.

reference: Also, the copy room is now a detention center for anyone who gets out of line.
source: Místnost s kopírkou je teď vazba za trest pro kohokoliv, kdo poruší pravidla.

errors.contrastive: Also, the copy room is now a bond center for anyone who gets out of line.

reference: "Dr. Turner's detention is not necessary in the public interest."
source: "Vazba dr. Turnerové není v obecném zájmu."

errors.contrastive: "Dr. Turner's bond is not necessary in the public interest."

reference: Protective custody, but we can't keep them there forever.
source: A co ti zločinci? Je to ochranná vazba, ale nemůžeme je tam držet navěky.

errors.contrastive: Protective bond, but we can't keep them there forever.

reference: Joe Carroll, you've been remanded into the custody of the Jesup County federal correctional facility of the state of Georgia.
source: Joe Carrolle, byla na vás uvalena do vazba ve federálním nápravném zařízení v Jesup County, ve státě Georgia.

errors.contrastive: Joe Carroll, you've been remanded into the bond of the Jesup County federal correctional facility of the state of Georgia.

reference: I got to say, though, protective custody has its advantages.
source: Musím ale říct, že ochranná vazba má své výhody.

errors.contrastive: I got to say, though, protective bond has its advantages.

reference: Truancy, theft, juvenile court, detention centre, do a runner, two housebreakings, assault and affray, then assault on a copper, suspended sentence, heavy fine.
source: Záškoláctví, krádeže, soudy mládeže soudní vazba, uprchlík, dvě vloupačky napadení a rvačky, i útok na policajta...

errors.contrastive: Truancy, theft, juvenile court, bond centre, do a runner, two housebreakings, assault and affray, then assault on a copper, suspended sentence, heavy fine.

reference: Jack... you don't start talking, your protective custody is gonna be cleaning out the bathrooms at La Mesa Prison in Tijuana.
source: Jacku... když nezačnete mluvit, tvoje ochranná vazba bude čistění záchodů vo vězení La Mesa v Tichuaně.

errors.contrastive: Jack... you don't start talking, your protective bond is gonna be cleaning out the bathrooms at La Mesa Prison in Tijuana.

reference: "Dr. Turner's detention is not necessary in the public interest."
source: "Vazba dr. Turnerové není v obecném zájmu."

errors.contrastive: "Dr. Turner's bond is not necessary in the public interest."

reference: "Dr. Turner's detention is not necessary in the public interest."
source: "Vazba dr. Turnerové není v obecném zájmu."

errors.contrastive: "Dr. Turner's bond is not necessary in the public interest."

reference: Then you should know that your protective custody isn't worth a damn.
source: Pak byste měla vědět, že vaše ochranná vazba nestojí za nic.

errors.contrastive: Then you should know that your protective bond isn't worth a damn.

reference: Got me enough trust and privilege for a little C.C. -- community custody.
source: Získal jsem si dost důvěry a menší privilegia... Společenská vazba.

errors.contrastive: Got me enough trust and privilege for a little C.C. -- community bond.

reference: "Dr. Turner's detention is not necessary in the public interest.
source: "Vazba dr. Turnerové není v obecném zájmu.

errors.contrastive: "Dr. Turner's bond is not necessary in the public interest.

reference: "GenDen" meaning "general detention"? - Yes.
source: "GenDen" ve smyslu "generální vazba" ?

errors.contrastive: "GenDen" meaning "general bond"? - Yes.

reference: Discounting reception, basic training corrective custody been in the Army more than three months.
source: Přijímač, výcviková nápravná vazba, seš v armádě víc než tři měsíce.

errors.contrastive: Discounting reception, basic training corrective bond been in the Army more than three months.

reference: Melissa Ventura, y ou're remanded to the custody of the state of Florida.
source: Melisso Venturová, je na vás uvalena vazba ve státě Florida.

errors.contrastive: Melissa Ventura, y ou're remanded to the bond of the state of Florida.

reference: The bond between precious metals and paper currency was cracking.
source: Vazba mezi drahými kovy a papírovou měnou začala praskat.

errors.contrastive: The detention between precious metals and paper currency was cracking.
The custody between precious metals and paper currency was cracking.

reference: “Nationality” is defined in the European Convention on Nationality as the “legal bond between a person and a State and does not indicate the person’s ethnic origin.”
source: „Státní příslušnost“ je v Evropské úmluvě o státní příslušnosti definována jako „právní vazba mezi osobou a státem bez ohledu na etnický původ dané osoby“.

errors.contrastive: “Nationality” is defined in the European Convention on Nationality as the “legal detention between a person and a State and does not indicate the person’s ethnic origin.”
“Nationality” is defined in the European Convention on Nationality as the “legal custody between a person and a State and does not indicate the person’s ethnic origin.”

reference: Your familial bond notwithstanding, you yourself told me that our shared connection as Witnesses means I am the lieutenant's best chance.
source: Váš familiární vazba přesto, Vy sám mi řekl, že náš sdílené připojení jako svědci Znamená, že jsem nejlepší šance poručíkovi.

errors.contrastive: Your familial detention notwithstanding, you yourself told me that our shared connection as Witnesses means I am the lieutenant's best chance.
Your familial custody notwithstanding, you yourself told me that our shared connection as Witnesses means I am the lieutenant's best chance.

reference: This bond sets out the rights (political, economic, social, cultural, etc) and responsibilities that are reserved for nationals of a state.
source: Tato vazba vymezuje práva (politická, ekonomická, sociální, kulturní atd.) a povinnosti, které jsou vyhrazeny pro státní příslušníky daného státu.

errors.contrastive: This detention sets out the rights (political, economic, social, cultural, etc) and responsibilities that are reserved for nationals of a state.
This custody sets out the rights (political, economic, social, cultural, etc) and responsibilities that are reserved for nationals of a state.

reference: Bail is set at 100,000, cash or bond.
source: Kauce je stanovena na 100.000, v hotovosti nebo vazba.

errors.contrastive: Bail is set at 100,000, cash or detention.
Bail is set at 100,000, cash or custody.

reference: What you shall drink from these cups... will celebrate our newfound alliance's unremitting bond.
source: Co budete pít z těchto šálků ... oslaví náš nově objevený aliance je neustávající vazba.

errors.contrastive: What you shall drink from these cups... will celebrate our newfound alliance's unremitting detention.
What you shall drink from these cups... will celebrate our newfound alliance's unremitting custody.

reference: In the case of the State of Florida v. Juan Diego Díaz, after taking into account all due considerations, bail has been set at two million dollars, or a bond of $200,000.
source: V případě stát Florida vs. Juan Diego Díaz po zohlednění byla kauce stanovena na dva miliony dolarů, anebo chemická vazba ve výši $ 200,000.

errors.contrastive: In the case of the State of Florida v. Juan Diego Díaz, after taking into account all due considerations, bail has been set at two million dollars, or a detention of $200,000.
In the case of the State of Florida v. Juan Diego Díaz, after taking into account all due considerations, bail has been set at two million dollars, or a custody of $200,000.

reference: A bond's gonna cost you 10% of said bail, non-refundable.
source: Vazba vás bude stát 10 procent z řečené kauce, nevratně.

errors.contrastive: A detention's gonna cost you 10% of said bail, non-refundable.
A custody's gonna cost you 10% of said bail, non-refundable.

reference: A covalent bond, which means these two atoms are linked by...
source: To je kolární vazba, což znamená, že tyhle dva atomy jsou spojeny...

errors.contrastive: A covalent detention, which means these two atoms are linked by...
A covalent custody, which means these two atoms are linked by...

reference: It's a very weak bond over a single hair, but multiplied by 10 million or more and it's incredibly strong.
source: Je to velmi slabá vazba přes jediný vlas, ale znásobeno 10 miliony nebo více, je to síla neuvěřitelně silná.

errors.contrastive: It's a very weak detention over a single hair, but multiplied by 10 million or more and it's incredibly strong.
It's a very weak custody over a single hair, but multiplied by 10 million or more and it's incredibly strong.

reference: The bond between master and slave has already been dissolved... The moment you disobeyed me.
source: Vazba mezi pánem a otrokem se už rozplynula... v okamžiku, kdy jsi mě neuposlechl.

errors.contrastive: The detention between master and slave has already been dissolved... The moment you disobeyed me.
The custody between master and slave has already been dissolved... The moment you disobeyed me.

reference: On the small end of the range, it's of the same order as the bond lengths, Barkley.
source: V menším rozsahu je to stejný řád jako chemická vazba, Barkley.

errors.contrastive: On the small end of the range, it's of the same order as the detention lengths, Barkley.
On the small end of the range, it's of the same order as the custody lengths, Barkley.

reference: Hell, Ron and I may not agree on everything, but we share the bond of being from the greatest city in the history of this Earth.
source: Sakra , Ron a já nemohou dohodnout na všem , ale sdílíme vazba je z největší města v historii této země .

errors.contrastive: Hell, Ron and I may not agree on everything, but we share the detention of being from the greatest city in the history of this Earth.
Hell, Ron and I may not agree on everything, but we share the custody of being from the greatest city in the history of this Earth.

reference: There is a special bond between mother, father and child... that extends from this life into the next.
source: Je tu zvláštní vazba mezi matkou, otcem a dítětem, která má pokračování v příštím životě.

errors.contrastive: There is a special detention between mother, father and child... that extends from this life into the next.
There is a special custody between mother, father and child... that extends from this life into the next.

reference: I guess if the White Martian's bond is strong enough, the telepathy goes both ways.
source: Asi když je vazba White Martiana dost silná, - telepatie proudí oběma směry.

errors.contrastive: I guess if the White Martian's detention is strong enough, the telepathy goes both ways.
I guess if the White Martian's custody is strong enough, the telepathy goes both ways.

reference: BE TOGETHER. YEAH, JUST BECAUSE HE GOT MY MOTHER PREGNANT DOESN'T MEAN THAT THERE'S SOME SPECIAL BOND BETWEEN US.
source: Jo, jenom proto, že s ním matka otěhotněla neznamená, že je mezi náma nějaká vazba.

errors.contrastive: BE TOGETHER. YEAH, JUST BECAUSE HE GOT MY MOTHER PREGNANT DOESN'T MEAN THAT THERE'S SOME SPECIAL detention BETWEEN US.
BE TOGETHER. YEAH, JUST BECAUSE HE GOT MY MOTHER PREGNANT DOESN'T MEAN THAT THERE'S SOME SPECIAL custody BETWEEN US.

reference: That's very good. Burton and I decided to go on a... well, we decided to talk a little strategy, knowing that the bond between Christa, Rupert and Sandra pretty much puts us at fourth and fifth.
source: Burton a já jsme se rozhodli trochu probrat strategii, protože víme, že vazba mezi Christou, Rupertem a Sandrou nás staví do pozice pět proti čtyřem.

errors.contrastive: That's very good. Burton and I decided to go on a... well, we decided to talk a little strategy, knowing that the detention between Christa, Rupert and Sandra pretty much puts us at fourth and fifth.
That's very good. Burton and I decided to go on a... well, we decided to talk a little strategy, knowing that the custody between Christa, Rupert and Sandra pretty much puts us at fourth and fifth.

reference: The antibody would adapt itself to alter the genetic code of the virus.
source: Ta protilátka se adaptuje tak, aby změnila genetický kód toho viru.

errors.contrastive: The antidote would adapt itself to alter the genetic code of the virus.

reference: An antibody targeting HER2 appears to be effective both when given alone or in combination with conventional chemotherapy, but such therapy in the adjuvant setting will raise the cost and complexity of care.
source: Protilátka zaměřující se na HER2 se zdá být účinná jak při samostatném podávání, tak v kombinaci s běžnou chemoterapií, avšak taková terapie během pomocné léčby zvýší nákladnost i komplikovanost léčby.

errors.contrastive: An antidote targeting HER2 appears to be effective both when given alone or in combination with conventional chemotherapy, but such therapy in the adjuvant setting will raise the cost and complexity of care.

reference: So you were saved from the virus by an antibody found in elephant semen, which lined, uh your innards.
source: Před virem vás zachránila protilátka nalezená ve sloním spermatu, která obklopovala, uh vaše vnitřnosti.

errors.contrastive: So you were saved from the virus by an antidote found in elephant semen, which lined, uh your innards.

reference: For novel agents, such as the anti-HER2 antibody Herceptin™, where there is no precedent, this cost must be considered against its novel action, activity, and limited toxicity.
source: U tak nových a původních látek, které nemají předchůdce, jako je například protilátka Herceptin™ ničící protein HER2, je třeba jejich cenu zvážit z pohledu účinku, aktivity a nízké toxicity.

errors.contrastive: For novel agents, such as the anti-HER2 antidote Herceptin™, where there is no precedent, this cost must be considered against its novel action, activity, and limited toxicity.

reference: Kes has prevailed upon Neelix to allow Dr. Jetrel to continue metabolic scans in the hope that it will facilitate treatment once the antibody has been synthesized.
source: Kes přemluvila Neelixe, aby dovolil doktoru Jetrelovi pokračovat v dalším vyšetření jeho metabolismu v naději, že to pomůže při jeho léčbě než bude syntetizována protilátka.

errors.contrastive: Kes has prevailed upon Neelix to allow Dr. Jetrel to continue metabolic scans in the hope that it will facilitate treatment once the antidote has been synthesized.

reference: Under further analysis, the inoculant found in the broken vials... was isolated and determined to be an unstable antibody... of no known biological origin.
source: Důkladnější analýzou rozbitých ampulí... byla izolována a určena nestabilní protilátka... neznámého biologického původu.

errors.contrastive: Under further analysis, the inoculant found in the broken vials... was isolated and determined to be an unstable antidote... of no known biological origin.

reference: My systems are rejecting sleep like it's a foreign antibody.
source: Moje soustava odmítá spánek, jako by to byla cizí protilátka.

errors.contrastive: My systems are rejecting sleep like it's a foreign antidote.

reference: Problems on the global financial market and the effect of the US economy's difficulties on world economic growth are the first serious test for the new Lisbon Strategy and its ability to act as an antidote to the possible obstacles to the growth of the European economy.
source: Problémy na světovém finančním trhu a vliv problémů, se kterými se potýká hospodářství USA, na světový hospodářský růst jsou prvním závažným testem pro novou Lisabonskou strategii a její schopnost působit jako protilátka na případné překážky růstu evropského hospodářství.

errors.contrastive: Problems on the global financial market and the effect of the US economy's difficulties on world economic growth are the first serious test for the new Lisbon Strategy and its ability to act as an antibody to the possible obstacles to the growth of the European economy.

reference: The Calabar bean has helped us with anti-tetanus and with... it's an antidote to strychnine.
source: Fazole Calabar nám pomáhá proti tetanu a ... je to protilátka na strychnin.

errors.contrastive: The Calabar bean has helped us with anti-tetanus and with... it's an antibody to strychnine.

reference: Social democracy, with its promise of greater equality and opportunities for all, served as an ideological antidote.
source: Jako jeho ideologická protilátka pak sloužila sociální demokracie se svým slibem větší rovnosti a příležitostí pro všechny.

errors.contrastive: Social democracy, with its promise of greater equality and opportunities for all, served as an ideological antibody.

reference: Anyway, when the antidote didn't work on me, I called the Lipron company, Geni-Trax.
source: Každopádně, když ta protilátka na mě neúčinkovala, zavolal jsem výrobce Lipronu, Geni-Trax.

errors.contrastive: Anyway, when the antibody didn't work on me, I called the Lipron company, Geni-Trax.

reference: Social democracy lost its raison d’être as an antidote to Communism.
source: Sociální demokracie jako protilátka vůči komunismu ztratila důvod k existenci.

errors.contrastive: Social democracy lost its raison d’être as an antibody to Communism.

reference: By taking Maki, she deceives the Blue Ship members that the antidote is completed.
source: Tím, že unesla Maki, se snaží členům Modré lodi nalhat, že je protilátka připravená.

errors.contrastive: By taking Maki, she deceives the Blue Ship members that the antibody is completed.

reference: It says "Benzene" on the label, but it's the antidote.
source: Na nálepce stojí "benzén", ale je to protilátka.

errors.contrastive: It says "Benzene" on the label, but it's the antibody.

reference: Yeah, and it looks like glucagon is the only known antidote.
source: Jo, a vypadá to, že glucagon, je jediná známá protilátka.

errors.contrastive: Yeah, and it looks like glucagon is the only known antibody.

reference: Except the antidote will only take hold once we've achieved a full reaction.
source: Ale protilátka začne účinkovat, teprve až vzbudíme plnou reakci.

errors.contrastive: Except the antibody will only take hold once we've achieved a full reaction.

reference: The antidote probably died with the tech guy that made the virus.
source: Protilátka pravděpodobně zemřela s technikem, který virus vynalezl.

errors.contrastive: The antibody probably died with the tech guy that made the virus.

reference: Virus weapon is a success, only if it comes with an antidote.
source: Virální zbraň se dá považovat za úspěch, jedině pokud existuje protilátka.

errors.contrastive: Virus weapon is a success, only if it comes with an antibody.

reference: I'm sure there was antidote, but it's of no use now.
source: Jsem si jistý, že protilátka existovala, ale teď je k ničemu.

errors.contrastive: I'm sure there was antibody, but it's of no use now.

reference: The antidote needs to be heated to 1000 degrees Kelvin until it clears, otherwise it's useless!
source: Ta protilátka musí být zahřáta na 1000 stupnů Kelvina, jinak je nám k ničemu.

errors.contrastive: The antibody needs to be heated to 1000 degrees Kelvin until it clears, otherwise it's useless!

reference: Can't kill you when the antidote is made.
source: Až bude protilátka, tak vás nebudu moct zabít.

errors.contrastive: Can't kill you when the antibody is made.

reference: There is no antidote, and there sure as hell is no cure for your brother.
source: Žádná protilátka není, a zcela jistě není aní žádná pro tvého bratra.

errors.contrastive: There is no antibody, and there sure as hell is no cure for your brother.

reference: If that's true, and I suspect it is there is no known antidote
source: Pokud je to pravda, a já myslím, že je, protilátka neexistuje.

errors.contrastive: If that's true, and I suspect it is there is no known antibody

reference: If desire had an antidote, it would be those pontoons of hers.
source: Kdyby byla protilátka na touhu, tak jsou to ty její obří nohy.

errors.contrastive: If desire had an antibody, it would be those pontoons of hers.

reference: Even if everything goes perfectly, if we induce an episode, if we get the dosage exactly right, is that going to be a lasting cure or just some antidote to suppress that specific flare-up?
source: I když všechno půjde hladce a podaří se nám vyvolat záchvat, i když přesně trefíme dávku, vyléčíme to natrvalo, nebo to bude jen protilátka na záchvaty?

errors.contrastive: Even if everything goes perfectly, if we induce an episode, if we get the dosage exactly right, is that going to be a lasting cure or just some antibody to suppress that specific flare-up?

reference: For 20 years, the antidote has been buried in Higher Cemetery.
source: Celých 20 let byla protilátka zakopána na hřbitově Highgate.

errors.contrastive: For 20 years, the antibody has been buried in Higher Cemetery.

reference: I had to drink the potion... the antidote sank... and I turned into a jellyfish.
source: Vypil jsem lektvar... protilátka se potopila... a já se proměnil v medůzu.

errors.contrastive: I had to drink the potion... the antibody sank... and I turned into a jellyfish.

reference: We think about cattle, beef, dairying, sheep, vegetables, wine and so on.
source: Máme na mysli skot, hovězí, mlékárenství, ovce, zeleninu, víno a tak dále.

errors.contrastive: We think about scot, beef, dairying, sheep, vegetables, wine and so on.
We think about scotsman, beef, dairying, sheep, vegetables, wine and so on.

reference: And then you blundered in, a stranger looking to buy some cattle, so McCleod sold you a few head.
source: Pak ses tam nachomýtl ty. Toužící koupit nějaký skot, tak ti McCleod prodal pár kusů.

errors.contrastive: And then you blundered in, a stranger looking to buy some scot, so McCleod sold you a few head.
And then you blundered in, a stranger looking to buy some scotsman, so McCleod sold you a few head.

reference: Moreover, epidemiological studies indicated that BSE was likely to have been transmitted to cattle (and other species) by meat-and-bone-meal animal feed produced by UK rendering plants and exported to many countries.
source: Epidemiologické studie navíc ukázaly, že BSE se pravděpodobně přenesla na skot (a další druhy) prostřednictvím krmiv z masokostní moučky vyráběných v britských kafilériích a vyvážených do mnoha zemí.

errors.contrastive: Moreover, epidemiological studies indicated that BSE was likely to have been transmitted to scot (and other species) by meat-and-bone-meal animal feed produced by UK rendering plants and exported to many countries.

Moreover, epidemiological studies indicated that BSE was likely to have been transmitted to scotsman (and other species) by meat-and-bone-meal animal feed produced by UK rendering plants and exported to many countries.

reference: Ancient breeds were used such as the Hungarian grey cattle, Mangalica pig or Racka sheep because they were well adapted to the Puszta.
source: Chovala se starobylá plemena, která byla dobře přizpůsobena k životu v pustě, jako je maďarský šedý skot, vepř plemene mangalika či ovce cápová (tzv. racka).

errors.contrastive: Ancient breeds were used such as the Hungarian grey scot, Mangalica pig or Racka sheep because they were well adapted to the Puszta.
Ancient breeds were used such as the Hungarian grey scotsman, Mangalica pig or Racka sheep because they were well adapted to the Puszta.

reference: This is an animal epidemic affecting ruminants such as cattle, sheep and goats.
source: Tato zvířecí epidemie postihuje přežvýkavce, jako je skot, ovce a kozy.

errors.contrastive: This is an animal epidemic affecting ruminants such as scot, sheep and goats.
This is an animal epidemic affecting ruminants such as scotsman, sheep and goats.

reference: Cattle built our homes, gave us a living ever since our fathers settled here.
source: Skot postavil naše domovy, dává nám obživu od doby, kdy se zde usadili naši otcové.

errors.contrastive: scot built our homes, gave us a living ever since our fathers settled here.
scotsman built our homes, gave us a living ever since our fathers settled here.

reference: In the years 1990 to 1992 Willy Kempter KG (‘Kempter’ or ‘the applicant’) exported cattle to a number of Arab countries and to the former Yugoslavia.
source: V průběhu let 1990 až 1992 vyvážela společnost Willy Kempter KG (dále jen „Kempter“ nebo „žalobkyně“) skot do různých arabských zemí a do zemí bývalé Jugoslávie.

errors.contrastive: Am I supposed to feel flattered that you have so overcome your resistance to my family that you are ready to marry into it?

reference: This never met any criticism from my voters, because educational policy and the social safety net were designed to lower workers’ risk aversion.
source: Ze strany mých voličů se to nikdy nesetkalo s kritikou, protože vzdělávací politika a sociální síť byly koncipovány tak, aby snižovaly odpor zaměstnanců k riziku.

errors.contrastive: This never met any criticism from my voters, because educational policy and the social safety net were designed to lower workers’ risk resistance.

reference: We express our great disgust and indignation that the ethnic cleansing and destruction of hundreds of Medieval Orthodox churches in Metochia, Kosovo, have taken place before the eyes of the international security forces of NATO and the United Nations.
source: Vyjadřujeme svůj velký odpor a pobouření, že k etnickým čistkám a zničení stovek středověkých ortodoxních kostelů Metochii v Kosovu došlo před zraky mezinárodních bezpečnostních sil NATO a OSN.

errors.contrastive: We express our great resistance and indignation that the ethnic cleansing and destruction of hundreds of Medieval Orthodox churches in Metochia, Kosovo, have taken place before the eyes of the international security forces of NATO and the United Nations.

reference: "These dream fantasies led, in your consciousness to a morbid aversion to touching a knife."
source: "Tyto snové přeludy vedly ve vašem vědomí k tomu, že se ve vás vytvořil odpor dotýkat se nože."

errors.contrastive: "These dream fantasies led, in your consciousness to a morbid resistance to touching a knife."

reference: The supposed hand-over of the journalist Babitsky to the Chechen rebels, and the subsequent fears for his life, inspired widespread public revulsion.
source: Údajné předání novináře Babického čečenským rebelům a jeho následné obavy o život vyvolaly napříč celou veřejností odpor.

errors.contrastive: The supposed hand-over of the journalist Babitsky to the Chechen rebels, and the subsequent fears for his life, inspired widespread public resistance.

reference: A further issue is the fact that the southern part of the country is currently united by its dislike of the Muslim North.
source: Další problém spočívá v tom, že jižní část země v současnosti sjednocuje odpor k muslimskému severu.

errors.contrastive: A further issue is the fact that the southern part of the country is currently united by its resistance of the Muslim North.

reference: This consideration had made me determine to abandon the project and as I had demanded her in marriage and had given her my promise I would have given her to you if it were not for the dislike you have for her.
source: Proto jsem se rozhodl, že se s ní neožením. Jenže už jsem ji požádal o ruku, a protože je třeba dostát ve slově, dal bych ti ji za ženu, kdybys k ní necítil odpor.

errors.contrastive: This consideration had made me determine to abandon the project and as I had demanded her in marriage and had given her my promise I would have given her to you if it were not for the resistance you have for her.

reference: Only in the last few months of his second presidential term, after he launched the second war in Chechnya in September 1999, did he and his lieutenants regain some legitimacy in the eyes of the Russian public, while causing revulsion among any remaining Western admirers.
source: Až během posledních několika měsíců svého druhého funkčního období, poté co v září 1999 zahájil druhou válku v Čečensku, si Jelcin se svými důstojníky znovu získal v očích ruské veřejnosti jistou legitimitu, zatímco u zbývajících západních obdivovatelů vzbudil odpor.

errors.contrastive: Only in the last few months of his second presidential term, after he launched the second war in Chechnya in September 1999, did he and his lieutenants regain some legitimacy in the eyes of the Russian public, while causing resistance among any remaining Western admirers.

reference: In this resolution, the European Parliament makes clear its disgust at the most brutal forms of carrying out this type of punishment, such as stoning.
source: V tomto usnesení Evropský parlament ozřejmuje svůj odpor k nejbrutálnějším formám výkonu tohoto typu trestu, jako je kamenování.

errors.contrastive: In this resolution, the European Parliament makes clear its resistance at the most brutal forms of carrying out this type of punishment, such as stoning.

reference: I've had to deal with fifty murderers in my career, but the worst of them never gave me this sense of revulsion which that I feel at this moment towards Mr. Charles Augustus Milverton.
source: Za své kariéry jsem měl co činit s padesáti vrahy, ale ani ten nejhorší z nich ve mně nevzbudil takový odpor, jaký teď cítím k tomuhle Charlesi Augustusi Milvertonovi.

errors.contrastive: I've had to deal with fifty murderers in my career, but the worst of them never gave me this sense of resistance which that I feel at this moment towards Mr. Charles Augustus Milverton.

source: Národní odpor je tudíž legitimní: je právem všech občanů a povinností všech vlastenců.

source: Postoj vysokých škol, vnímaný často jako odpor vůči změně, však nemusí být vždy negativní: změny, které se dotýkají kvality, hodnot a zvyklostí vysokého školství, by se neměly uskutečňovat bez náležité rozvahy.

reference: Those who see dark American forces behind all that is wrong with the world, from financial crashes to the violence in Ukraine, are prone to detect the malign hand of Israeli or even Jewish lobbies in every US policy.
source: Ti, kdo za vším, co je na světě špatně – od finančních krachů až po násilí na Ukrajině –, vidí temné americké síly, mají sklon odhalovat v jakékoliv americké politice zlovolný rukopis izraelských, či dokonce židovských lobby.

reference: "How bad's your handwriting?" "Mine's all over the place.
source: "Jak špatný je tvůj rukopis?" "Můj je všude možně.

errors.contrastive: "How bad's your manuscript?" "Mine's all over the place.

reference: He's gonna verify Tony's handwriting. He'll do whatever's necessary.
source: Ověří Tonyho rukopis a udělá, co bude nutné.

errors.contrastive: If the Dalys are anything like their manuscript, they must fall over backwards a lot.

reference: And there's printed messages to prevent the fact that she's a woman being revealed by her handwriting.
source: Tiskací písmena měla zabránit, aby ji neprozradil ženský rukopis. Podívejte se.

errors.contrastive: And there's printed messages to prevent the fact that she's a woman being revealed by her manuscript.

reference: I spoke to the publishers, I'll be handing in the script next week.

errors.contrastive: I spoke to the publishers, I'll be handing in the manuscript next week.

reference: "Please excuse my handwriting. "I busted whichever hand it is I write with.
source: "Omluvte můj rukopis, zlomila jsem si ruku, kterou píšu."

errors.contrastive: "Please excuse my manuscript. "I busted whichever hand it is I write with.

reference: Can you counterfeit the handwriting, the seal and the signature?
source: Umíš padělat rukopis, pečeť a podpis? Ano.

errors.contrastive: Can you counterfeit the manuscript, the seal and the signature?

reference: I saw your hand in it from the beginning.

errors.contrastive: I saw your manuscript in it from the beginning.

reference: May I ask, is this your handwriting, sir?
source: Mohu se zeptat, jestli je to váš rukopis, pane?

errors.contrastive: May I ask, is this your manuscript, sir?

reference: The handwriting is his, and the seal looks authentic,

errors.contrastive: The manuscript is his, and the seal looks authentic,

reference: I typed the envelope... to be sure you wouldn't tear up my letter... when you saw my handwriting.

errors.contrastive: I typed the envelope... to be sure you wouldn't tear up my letter... when you saw my manuscript.

errors.contrastive: Now, if you like, I can have an expert identify your manuscript.

reference: The new D.N.A. sample has been multiplexed, and the gametes are already dividing.
source: Nový vzorek DNA byl rozmnožen a buňky se už dělí.

errors.contrastive: The new D.N.A. sample has been multiplexed, and the gametes are already dividing.

reference: I'm running D.N.A. on the hairs I pulled from the skull.
source: Zjišťuji DNA z vlasů, které jsem získala z lebky.

errors.contrastive: I'm running D.N.A. on the hairs I pulled from the skull.

reference: Of course, if we could sample your D.N.A. I could probably figure it out.
source: Samozřejmě, pokud by jsme měli vzorek tvého DNA, mohla bych to vyřešit.

errors.contrastive: Of course, if we could sample your D.N.A. I could probably figure it out.

reference: The D.N.A. is obtained from my medical files, and upgraded automatically every time the weapon is reloaded.
source: DNA pochází z našich lékařských archívů a je kontrolovaná při každém nabíjení zbraně.

errors.contrastive: The D.N.A. is obtained from my medical files, and upgraded automatically every time the weapon is reloaded.

reference: Each time a round is chambered and fired... the projectile is tagged with the relevant D.N.A.
source: Když se zbraň použije, náboj se označí příslušnou DNA.

errors.contrastive: Each time a round is chambered and fired... the projectile is tagged with the relevant D.N.A.

reference: If not for the paternity bet, I never would have taken their D.N.A.
source: Kdybychom nesázeli na otcovství, nikdy bych nesebral jejich DNA.

errors.contrastive: If not for the paternity bet, I never would have taken their D.N.A.

reference: Four decades ago, D.N.A. samples were taken from the original Council.
source: Před 40 roky byli původní radě odebrané vzorky DNA od soudců.

errors.contrastive: Four decades ago, D.N.A. samples were taken from the original Council.

reference: We share 98.8% of the same D.N.A. As a chimpanzee.
source: 98.8% našeho DNA je stejné jako u šimpanzů.

errors.contrastive: We share 98.8% of the same D.N.A. As a chimpanzee.

reference: Well, it may still give us a chance to get a sample of his D.N.A.
source: No, je stále šance, že tak získáme vzorek jeho DNA.

errors.contrastive: Well, it may still give us a chance to get a sample of his D.N.A.

reference: If they ever do a D.N.A. Test, people will know the baby was mine.
source: Jestli někdy udělají test DNA, lidé se dozvědí, že dítě bylo moje.

errors.contrastive: If they ever do a D.N.A. Test, people will know the baby was mine.

reference: You know when police find the slightest bit of D.N.A. And build a case?
source: Víte, že policie najde malinký kousek DNA a postaví na tom případ?

errors.contrastive: You know when police find the slightest bit of D.N.A. And build a case?

reference: We share 98.4% of our D.N.A. with these creatures.
source: To je rozdíl. Z 98,4% máme stejné DNA jako tito tvorové.

errors.contrastive: We share 98.4% of our D.N.A. with these creatures.

reference: We're gonna dig him up, Earl, get your D.N.A. ... prove you were his father.
source: Vykopeme ho, Earle, odebereme vám vzorek DNA ... a prokážeme, že jste byl jeho otec.

errors.contrastive: We're gonna dig him up, Earl, get your D.N.A. ... prove you were his father.

reference: Was he a religious fanatic who had, in fervid haste... licked the envelope, leaving the telltale D.N.A. that would begin his unraveling?
source: "Byl to náboženský fanatik, který ve spěchu..." "olíznul obálku a zanechal tam tak zrádné DNA, které by vedlo k jeho odhalení?"

errors.contrastive: Was he a religious fanatic who had, in fervid haste... licked the envelope, leaving the telltale D.N.A. that would begin his unraveling?

reference: We are random mutations... simply a carrier of D.N.A. 's relentless quest for more... in a meaningless universe.
source: Jsme náhodné mutace... pouze prostředek, pomocí nějž DNA hledá víc... ve vesmíru bez smyslu.

errors.contrastive: We are random mutations... simply a carrier of D.N.A. 's relentless quest for more... in a meaningless universe.

reference: All I know is that somewhere there's someone who's D.N.A. reads...
source: Všechno co vím je, že někdo kdo umí číst v DNA by si přečetl...

errors.contrastive: All I know is that somewhere there's someone who's D.N.A. reads...

reference: Without their D.N.A., we never would have discovered that Dan was adopted, which was the key to this case.
source: Bez DNA, bychom nikdy nepřišli na to, že Dan je adoptovaný, což bylo klíčem k případu.

errors.contrastive: Without their D.N.A., we never would have discovered that Dan was adopted, which was the key to this case.

reference: Any excuse we can give the folks to justify a D.N.A. test?
source: Nějaký důvod proč bychom jim nemohli udělat DNA test?

errors.contrastive: Any excuse we can give the folks to justify a D.N.A. test?

reference: Is this urge to disinfect part of your D.N.A. Now, too, or is it just that my family is still crazier than everyone else's?
source: Ty také cítíš, jak infikovaná část tvého DNA cítí volání přírody, nebo moje rodina je pořád více bláznivá než ostatní?

errors.contrastive: Is this urge to disinfect part of your D.N.A. Now, too, or is it just that my family is still crazier than everyone else's?

reference: The D.N.A. sample has been taken out of frozen stasis. Ready for cloning process.
source: Vzorek DNA byla rozmražený a je připravený na klonovaní.

errors.contrastive: The D.N.A. sample has been taken out of frozen stasis. Ready for cloning process.

reference: Some say that his favourite disease- he had when he was a child was gout. LAUGHTER
source: Někdo říká, že jeho nejoblíbenější nemoc z dětství, je dna.

errors.contrastive: Some say that his favourite disease- he had when he was a child was d.n.a.. LAUGHTER

reference: So, I kind of caused a plumbing issue upstairs, and I'd plunge it myself, but my gout is back this week with a vengeance.
source: Tak trochu jsem nahoře ucpala záchod, a potopila bych to sama, ale moje dna se tento týden vrátila s odvetou.

errors.contrastive: So, I kind of caused a plumbing issue upstairs, and I'd plunge it myself, but my d.n.a. is back this week with a vengeance.

reference: And yet, interestingly, they do all suffer from a variety of health problems-- gout, hair loss, kidney diseases, which, in themselves, have something in common.
source: Dna, ztráta vlasů, onemocnění ledvin, které samy o sobě mají něco společného.

errors.contrastive: And yet, interestingly, they do all suffer from a variety of health problems-- d.n.a., hair loss, kidney diseases, which, in themselves, have something in common.

reference: Lupus, gout, glaucoma, osteoarthritis, hypertension, diabetes-- stop me anytime.
source: Lupus, dna, glaukom, osteoartritida, hypertenze, diabetes- zastav mě kdykoliv. Srdce ukazuje na sarkoidózu.

errors.contrastive: Lupus, d.n.a., glaucoma, osteoarthritis, hypertension, diabetes-- stop me anytime.

reference: You seem to me a poor sort of creature that's bound to get left with your gout and your dignity. But of course, you can make yourself pretty disagreeable before you're done.
source: Připadáte mi jako chudák, kterému zůstane už jenom jeho dna a důstojnost, ale můžete se stejně ještě hodně znemožnit.

errors.contrastive: You seem to me a poor sort of creature that's bound to get left with your d.n.a. and your dignity. But of course, you can make yourself pretty disagreeable before you're done.

reference: And what's more, my dear, I think my gout is getting very much better.
source: A notabene, drahoušku, myslím, že moje dna je den ode dne o hodně lepší.

errors.contrastive: And what's more, my dear, I think my d.n.a. is getting very much better.

reference: Why can't there be like a air-borne gout that just kills rich people?
source: Proč tu nemůže být něco jako vzduchem šířená dna, co zabíjí boháče?

errors.contrastive: Why can't there be like a air-borne d.n.a. that just kills rich people?

reference: Cancer and gout aren't working-class diseases, but they will be, believe me.
source: Rak a dna nejsou dělnické nemoci, ale brzo budou, věřte mi.

errors.contrastive: Cancer and d.n.a. aren't working-class diseases, but they will be, believe me.

reference: My gout is near crippling and the French experts can do nothing about it.
source: Má dna mě ochromuje a francouzští experti s tím nemohou nic dělat.

errors.contrastive: My d.n.a. is near crippling and the French experts can do nothing about it.

reference: Tell me, Livia, if I'm a god - even in Palmyra... how do I cure gout?
source: Jsem tedy teď v Palmyře bohem, ale poraď mi Lívie - jak se léčí dna?

errors.contrastive: Tell me, Livia, if I'm a god - even in Palmyra... how do I cure d.n.a.?

reference: Arrows and sabers, I can withstand. But the gout... it's a curse from the Eternal Blue Sky.
source: Šípy a šavle vydržím, ale dna je prokletím od Věčného modrého nebe.

errors.contrastive: Arrows and sabers, I can withstand. But the d.n.a.... it's a curse from the Eternal Blue Sky.

reference: Lupus, gout, glaucoma, osteoarthritis, hypertension, diabetes, stop me anytime, they all affect black people more than whites.
source: Sžíravý vřed, dna, zelený oční zákal, zánět kloubů, zvýšený tlak, cukrovka, kdykoliv mě zastavte... všechny tyto působí na černochy víc než na bělochy.

errors.contrastive: Lupus, d.n.a., glaucoma, osteoarthritis, hypertension, diabetes, stop me anytime, they all affect black people more than whites.

reference: I'll wager my gout hurts him more than it does me.
source: Vsadím se, že moje dna ho bolí víc než mě.

errors.contrastive: I'll wager my d.n.a. hurts him more than it does me.

reference: Urged me to walk the kingdom with him... and gout wouldn't let me take a step.
source: Naléhal na mě, ať se s ním projdu po království a dna mi neumožnila udělat ani krok.

errors.contrastive: Urged me to walk the kingdom with him... and d.n.a. wouldn't let me take a step.

reference: Remember when my gout flared up and I couldn't walk?
source: Pamatuješ si, když se mi rozjela DNA a nemohla jsem chodit?

errors.contrastive: Remember when my d.n.a. flared up and I couldn't walk?

reference: The issue that we're talking about is that there are these chronic diseases related to obesity and diabetes... heart disease, many cancers, gout, hypertension, high blood pressure, possibly Alzheimer's disease.
source: V současnosti řešíme problém, kdy existuje řada chronických chorob souvisejích s obezitou a cukrovkou... srdeční choroby, mnoho typů rakoviny, dna, hypertenze, vysoký tlak, možná dokonce Alzheimer.

errors.contrastive: The issue that we're talking about is that there are these chronic diseases related to obesity and diabetes... heart disease, many cancers, d.n.a., hypertension, high blood pressure, possibly Alzheimer's disease.

reference: I made up a slide of what Curtis thought might be gout in Nikki Parkson's toe.
source: Dal jsem na sklíčko to, o čem si Curtis myslel, že by to mohla být dna na palci Nikki Parksonové.

errors.contrastive: I made up a slide of what Curtis thought might be d.n.a. in Nikki Parkson's toe.

reference: I have to tell you that the gout have left my left leg and is travelled to my right.
source: Musím říci, že dna opustila mou levou nohu a přestěhovala se do pravé.

errors.contrastive: I have to tell you that the d.n.a. have left my left leg and is travelled to my right.

errors.contrastive: I've heard you are the best bishop in Goguryeo.

errors.contrastive: After barely surviving the sheep flight a cat in giant boots came along...

reference: If I can trace the stampede to somebody in the crowd, the Lightman Group gets 10% of what you save.
source: Pokud se mi podaří vystopovat úprk někoho v davu, Lightman Group dostane 10% z toho, co ušetříte.

errors.contrastive: If I can trace the flight to somebody in the crowd, the Lightman Group gets 10% of what you save.

reference: Hide your wallet, update your spam filter, and unplug your phone, for that stampede you hear thundering over the hill is the voracious and unyielding herd of candidates and their fundraisers, all just looking to pick your pockets clean of every hard-earned dollar you got.
source: Schovejte peněženky, aktualizujte spam filtr a odpojte telefon, protože ten úprk, co slyšíte hřmět za kopcem, je nenasytné a neústupné stádo kandidátů a jejich výběru peněz, kteří vám chtějí z kapes vybrat všechny těžce vydělané dolary.

errors.contrastive: Hide your wallet, update your spam filter, and unplug your phone, for that flight you hear thundering over the hill is the voracious and unyielding herd of candidates and their fundraisers, all just looking to pick your pockets clean of every hard-earned dollar you got.

reference: If the stampede was crowd induced, It would reduce the settlement considerably.
source: Jestliže byl úprk davu vyvolaný, mohlo by to významě snížit naše vyrovnání.

errors.contrastive: If the flight was crowd induced, It would reduce the settlement considerably.

reference: The crash in equity prices since 2000 in most countries has made financial assets look less secure, spurring a "flight to quality" - in this case, housing.
source: Kvůli krachu cen akcií ve většině zemí od roku 2000 se finanční aktiva jeví jako méně bezpečná, což podnítilo „úprk ke kvalitě" - v tomto případě k bydlení.

errors.contrastive: The crash in equity prices since 2000 in most countries has made financial assets look less secure, spurring a "stampede to quality" - in this case, housing.

reference: The crash is followed by a flight to safety, which is followed by a steep fall in the velocity of money as investors hoard cash.
source: Po krachu následuje úprk do bezpečí, po němž přichází strmý propad rychlosti obratu peněz, neboť investoři hromadí hotovost.

errors.contrastive: The crash is followed by a stampede to safety, which is followed by a steep fall in the velocity of money as investors hoard cash.

reference: We recognized that large bubble-driven losses in assets held by leveraged financial institutions would cause a panicked flight to safety, and that preventing a deep depression required active official intervention as a lender of last resort.
source: Uvědomovali jsme si, že bublinami vyvolané ztráty u aktiv ve vlastnictví zadlužených finančních ústavů by mohly zapříčinit panický úprk do bezpečí, a že chceme-li předejít hluboké recesi, je nutná aktivní oficiální intervence z pozice věřitele poslední záchrany.

errors.contrastive: We recognized that large bubble-driven losses in assets held by leveraged financial institutions would cause a panicked stampede to safety, and that preventing a deep depression required active official intervention as a lender of last resort.

reference: The answer appears to be that there is nobody in the financial centers of New York, London, Tokyo, Frankfurt, and Hong Kong who thinks it is their business to bet on a future flight from the dollar.
source: Odpověď zní podle všeho tak, že ve finančních centrech New Yorku, Londýna, Tokia, Frankfurtu a Hongkongu není nikdo, kdo by zastával názor, že je vhodné sázet na budoucí úprk od dolaru.

errors.contrastive: The answer appears to be that there is nobody in the financial centers of New York, London, Tokyo, Frankfurt, and Hong Kong who thinks it is their business to bet on a future stampede from the dollar.

reference: The eurozone needs a banking union: a European deposit-insurance scheme in order to stem capital flight, a European source for financing bank recapitalization, and eurozone-wide supervision and regulation.
source: Eurozóna potřebuje bankovní unii: evropský program pojištění depozit, který zastaví úprk kapitálu, evropský zdroj k financování rekapitalizace bank a dohled a regulaci s působností napříč eurozónou.

errors.contrastive: The eurozone needs a banking union: a European deposit-insurance scheme in order to stem capital stampede, a European source for financing bank recapitalization, and eurozone-wide supervision and regulation.

reference: According to the Kiel Institute for the World Economy, investor flight from the government debt markets of the eurozone’s struggling members to Germany has already saved the German government almost €70 billion ($88 billion).
source: Úprk investorů z trhů s dluhy vlád otřesených zemí eurozóny do Německa už podle Kielského institutu pro světovou ekonomiku ušetřil německé vládě téměř 70 miliard eur.

errors.contrastive: According to the Kiel Institute for the World Economy, investor stampede from the government debt markets of the eurozone’s struggling members to Germany has already saved the German government almost €70 billion ($88 billion).

reference: Italy, too, is being drained of capital; in fact, the flight of investors accelerated after the ECB’s liquidity injection.
source: I z Itálie odtéká kapitál; úprk investorů po likviditní injekci ECB dokonce zrychlil.

errors.contrastive: Italy, too, is being drained of capital; in fact, the stampede of investors accelerated after the ECB’s liquidity injection.

reference: First, the good news: The fear that Europe’s banks could collapse, with panicked investors’ flight to safety producing a European Great Depression, now seems to have passed.
source: Nejprve dobrá zpráva: strach, že by se evropské banky mohly zhroutit a úprk zpanikařených investorů do bezpečí by pak v Evropě vyvolal velkou hospodářskou krizi, již zřejmě pominul.

errors.contrastive: First, the good news: The fear that Europe’s banks could collapse, with panicked investors’ stampede to safety producing a European Great Depression, now seems to have passed.

reference: The search for non-financial assets looks like characteristic behavior in any financial crisis – what was known during the great drama of hyperinflation in Weimar Germany as “die Flucht in die Sachwerte,” the flight to material assets.
source: Hledání nefinančních aktiv se jeví jako charakteristické chování v jakékoliv finanční krizi – jako to, co během velkého dramatu hyperinflace ve Výmarské republice vešlo ve známost coby „die Flucht in die Sachwerte“, „úprk k věcným hodnotám“.

errors.contrastive: The search for non-financial assets looks like characteristic behavior in any financial crisis – what was known during the great drama of hyperinflation in Weimar Germany as “die Flucht in die Sachwerte,” the stampede to material assets.

reference: Thus, new fights on the debt ceiling, risks of a government shutdown, and rating downgrades could further depress consumer and business confidence, reducing spending and accelerating a flight to safety that would exacerbate the fall in stock markets.
source: Nové bitky o dluhový strop, rizika znehybnění vlády a snížení ratingů by mohly dále stlačit spotřebitelskou a podnikatelskou důvěru a tím snížit výdaje a urychlit úprk do bezpečí, který by zjitřil propad na akciových burzách.

errors.contrastive: Thus, new fights on the debt ceiling, risks of a government shutdown, and rating downgrades could further depress consumer and business confidence, reducing spending and accelerating a stampede to safety that would exacerbate the fall in stock markets.

reference: Ditching the euro might trigger a banking crisis, capital flight, inflation, and perhaps even sovereign default.
source: Opuštění eura by mohlo vyvolat bankovní krizi, úprk kapitálu, inflaci, a možná dokonce suverénní krach.

errors.contrastive: Ditching the euro might trigger a banking crisis, capital stampede, inflation, and perhaps even sovereign default.

reference: June, cancer. Libra, october. Capricorn, december.
source: - Rak, Váhy - říjen Kozoroh - prosinec.

errors.contrastive: June, crawfish. Libra, october. Capricorn, december.

reference: The cancer cut is the surest way to the pity pooty party.
source: Sestřih alá rak je nejjistější cesta k divoké party z lítosti.

errors.contrastive: The crawfish cut is the surest way to the pity pooty party.

reference: Well, fish is Pisces and the crab is Cancer, but they're upside down.
source: No ryba je znamení Ryb a krab je Rak, ale jsou obráceně.

errors.contrastive: Well, fish is Pisces and the crab is crawfish, but they're upside down.

reference: "No, son, what! said was Cancer. "
source: "Ne, synku, co jsem řekl byl Rak."

errors.contrastive: "No, son, what! said was crawfish. "

reference: Is it something, uh, quippy, you know, like, "Cancer sucks"?
source: Není to nějakej vtípek? Třeba "Rak je na draka"?

errors.contrastive: Is it something, uh, quippy, you know, like, "crawfish sucks"?

reference: I had a cancer sore on my lip once and it hurt so bad.
source: Jednou mě takovej rak štípl a moc to bolelo.

errors.contrastive: I had a crawfish sore on my lip once and it hurt so bad.

reference: Cancer and gout aren't working-class diseases, but they will be, believe me.
source: Rak a dna nejsou dělnické nemoci, ale brzo budou, věřte mi.

errors.contrastive: crawfish and gout aren't working-class diseases, but they will be, believe me.

reference: - He's a Cancer, I'm a Virgo.
source: - On je Rak a já Panna. - Ne.

errors.contrastive: - He's a crawfish, I'm a Virgo.

reference: You're a Gemini, and a Cancer... Aries. I'm a Libra.
source: Takže, ty jsi Blíženec, ty Rak, Skopec a já jsem Váhy.

errors.contrastive: You're a Gemini, and a crawfish... Aries. I'm a Libra.

reference: I found this site on the web lt says if I'm a Cancer and you're an Aquarius then the two of us are a perfect match!
source: Našel jsem tuhle stránku na webu. Ta tvrdí jestliže jsem Rak a ty Vodnář pak my dva jsme perfektní partie!

errors.contrastive: I found this site on the web lt says if I'm a crawfish and you're an Aquarius then the two of us are a perfect match!

reference: Where I studied theater superstition, under Professor Duane "Crawfish" Kenny.
source: Měla jsem tam předmět divadelní pověry, který učil profesor Duane "Rak" Kenny.

errors.contrastive: Where I studied theater superstition, under Professor Duane "cancer" Kenny.

reference: Veal, crab cake, crawfish, brandy-infused Creole tomato sauce.
source: Telecí, krabí karbenátky, rak, rajčatová omáčka s brandy.

errors.contrastive: Veal, crab cake, cancer, brandy-infused Creole tomato sauce.

reference: The old man's eyes was running out on stems like a crawfish, and his tongue blacker than a chow dog's.
source: -Ten chlap měl oči vykulený jako rak, a jazyk modrej jako Čau-Čau-

errors.contrastive: The old man's eyes was running out on stems like a cancer, and his tongue blacker than a chow dog's.

reference: If the creature kills me, I just hope it doesn't make me into a sandwich and leave it in the fridge where some crawfish can get at it.
source: Když mě to stvoření zabije, doufám, že si ze mě neudělá sendvič a nenechá mě v ledničce, kde se kě mně dostane kdejaký rak.

errors.contrastive: If the creature kills me, I just hope it doesn't make me into a sandwich and leave it in the fridge where some cancer can get at it.

reference: I cannot say that this delicious crawfish etufay is normal.
source: Nemůžu říct, že tento delikátní rak je normální.

errors.contrastive: I cannot say that this delicious cancer etufay is normal.

reference: They didn't realise I'm the man behind the curtain, the wizard.
source: Oni si neuvědomují , že jsemmuž za oponou ,průvodce .

errors.contrastive: They didn't realise I'm the man behind the curtain, the guidebook.
They didn't realise I'm the man behind the curtain, the guide.

reference: The wizard, dark you, he is right by her side.
source: Průvodce, tmavý ty, , že je přímo u ní.

errors.contrastive: The guidebook, dark you, he is right by her side.
The guide, dark you, he is right by her side.

reference: There's no way to get back to the wizard.
source: Neexistuje žádný způsob, jak dostat se zpátky do průvodce.

errors.contrastive: There's no way to get back to the guidebook.
There's no way to get back to the guide.

reference: All: * I think I'll try defying gravity * ♪ And nobody in all of Oz ♪ ♪ no wizard that there is or was ♪
source: All : * Myslím, že se budu snažit vzpírat gravitaci * d A nikdo v celé Oz d d žádný průvodce, který je nebo byl d d je někdy to , aby mě dolů !

errors.contrastive: All: * I think I'll try defying gravity * ♪ And nobody in all of Oz ♪ ♪ no guidebook that there is or was ♪
All: * I think I'll try defying gravity * ♪ And nobody in all of Oz ♪ ♪ no guide that there is or was ♪

reference: Well, without the key to Oz, there's no way we can get back to the wizard.
source: No, bez klíče do země Oz, neexistuje žádný způsob, jak můžeme dostat zpět do průvodce.

errors.contrastive: Well, without the key to Oz, there's no way we can get back to the guidebook.
Well, without the key to Oz, there's no way we can get back to the guide.

reference: They're gonna fix the key to Oz, find the wizard, and put you back to where you belong.
source: Jsou to bude oprava klíčem k Oz, najít průvodce, A dát zpátky , kam patříte.

errors.contrastive: They're gonna fix the key to Oz, find the guidebook, and put you back to where you belong.
They're gonna fix the key to Oz, find the guide, and put you back to where you belong.

reference: I have to say that the interactive guide was too complicated and, to tell the truth, incomprehensible to the ordinary citizen.
source: Musím konstatovat, že interaktivní průvodce je až příliš složitý a po pravdě řečeno pro běžného občana nesrozumitelný.

errors.contrastive: I have to say that the interactive wizard was too complicated and, to tell the truth, incomprehensible to the ordinary citizen.

reference: You see, before war, I am Tokyo guide for American.
source: Vy víte, před válkou, já byl Tokio průvodce pro Američany.

errors.contrastive: You see, before war, I am Tokyo wizard for American.

reference: Our guide, Maya, explained that the authorities liked to put together prisoners who got on each other’s nerves.
source: Náš průvodce, Maya, nám vysvětlila, že představitelé vězení dávali rádi dohromady ty vězně, kteří si šli vzájemně na nervy.

errors.contrastive: Our wizard, Maya, explained that the authorities liked to put together prisoners who got on each other’s nerves.

reference: From this date, all national institutions and bodies start to apply the new rules on social security coordination which are taken into account throughout this guide.
source: Od tohoto data začnou všechny vnitrostátní instituce a orgány uplatňovat nová pravidla týkající se koordinace sociálního zabezpečení, jimiž se zabývá tento průvodce.

errors.contrastive: From this date, all national institutions and bodies start to apply the new rules on social security coordination which are taken into account throughout this wizard.

reference: By decisively adopting the necessary measures and taking the lead in cooperating with the other central banks in industrialised countries, the European Central Bank has served as our guide throughout this period and has substantially contributed to preventing huge financial collapse.
source: Evropská centrální banka svým rozhodným přijetím všech nezbytných opatření a převzetím vůdčí role při spolupráci s ostatními centrálními bankami průmyslových zemí slouží jako bezpečný průvodce tímto obdobím a zásadním způsobem přispěla k odvrácení finančního kolapsu obrovských rozměrů.

errors.contrastive: By decisively adopting the necessary measures and taking the lead in cooperating with the other central banks in industrialised countries, the European Central Bank has served as our wizard throughout this period and has substantially contributed to preventing huge financial collapse.

reference: I was five miles out, working as a guide for the Acme mines.
source: 5 mil odsud, jsem průvodce u Acme mines.

errors.contrastive: I was five miles out, working as a wizard for the Acme mines.

reference: On the Republican side, hacks, spin masters, and many people who ought to have known better suddenly developed an extraordinary appreciation for something called the "CPS Household Survey of Employment" as a supposed guide to month-to-month changes in the labor market.
source: Na republikánské straně se u stranických pisálků, odborníků na ovlivňování veřejného mínění i mnoha lidí, kteří by měli mít na víc, náhle vyvinula mimořádná slabost pro cosi s názvem „Průzkum CPS o zaměstnanosti domácností“ jakožto pro údajného průvodce měsíčními změnami na trhu práce.

errors.contrastive: On the Republican side, hacks, spin masters, and many people who ought to have known better suddenly developed an extraordinary appreciation for something called the "CPS Household Survey of Employment" as a supposed wizard to month-to-month changes in the labor market.

reference: When drafting this Guide, the Commission widely consulted public authorities in the Member States and many other interested parties and stakeholders.
source: Tento průvodce byl vytvořen hlavně pro veřejné orgány, ale také snadějí, že bude inspirací ipro odběratele vsou-kromém sektoru.

errors.contrastive: When drafting this wizard, the Commission widely consulted public authorities in the Member States and many other interested parties and stakeholders.

reference: The adoption of the European Network of Ombudsmen statement and increased cooperation in this area are vital, and we look forward to the launch of the new website, which will include an interactive guide to assist citizens.
source: Přijetí prohlášení o Evropské síti veřejných ochránců práv a rozšířená spolupráce v této oblasti mají zásadní význam a těšíme se na spuštění nových internetových stránek, které budou obsahovat také interaktivního průvodce na pomoc občanům.

errors.contrastive: The adoption of the European Network of Ombudsmen statement and increased cooperation in this area are vital, and we look forward to the launch of the new website, which will include an interactive wizard to assist citizens.

reference: And in between, there was a riding instructor and an Alpine guide.
source: A mezi tím byl učitel jízdy na koni a alpský průvodce.

errors.contrastive: And in between, there was a riding instructor and an Alpine wizard.

reference: President Barack Obama’s 2010 National Security Strategy nurtures broad policy aspirations – “[n]ow we must position the United States to champion mutual interests among nations and peoples” – but falls short as a practical guide.
source: Strategie národní bezpečnosti prezidenta Baracka Obamy z roku 2010 rozvíjí široké politické aspirace – „v současnosti musíme Spojené státy profilovat tak, aby prosazovaly společné zájmy států a národů“ –, leč jako praktický průvodce selhává.

errors.contrastive: President Barack Obama’s 2010 National Security Strategy nurtures broad policy aspirations – “[n]ow we must position the United States to champion mutual interests among nations and peoples” – but falls short as a practical wizard.

reference: The addresses of the main insurance and pension institutions are given in Section 3 of this guide.
source: Adresy nejdůležitějších institucí najdete uvnitř tohoto průvodce v bodu 3.

errors.contrastive: The addresses of the main insurance and pension institutions are given in Section 3 of this wizard.

reference: In January 2009, I launched an interactive guide on my new website, which is accessible in all 23 EU languages.
source: V lednu roku 2009 jsem na našich stránkách spustil nového interaktivního průvodce, který je přístupný ve všech 23 jazycích EU.

errors.contrastive: In January 2009, I launched an interactive wizard on my new website, which is accessible in all 23 EU languages.

reference: - That's all right, Miss Duval. I didn't expect a guide dressed like Mr Gates.
source: Taky jsem nečekala průvodce v obleku, jako má pan Gates.

errors.contrastive: - That's all right, Miss Duval. I didn't expect a wizard dressed like Mr Gates.

reference: Addresses and useful information are given at the end of this guide.
source: Adresy a užitečné informace jsou uvedeny na konci tohoto průvodce.

errors.contrastive: Addresses and useful information are given at the end of this wizard.

reference: I welcome the Commission's initiative to publish a Guide on this Directive so that information on the rights that can be enjoyed by citizens can be made accessible not only to them, but also to local and regional authorities in the Member States.
source: Vítám iniciativu Komise zveřejnit průvodce k této směrnici, aby informace o právech, která mohou občané využívat, mohly být zpřístupněny nejen jim, ale i místním a regionálním orgánům v členských státech.

errors.contrastive: I welcome the Commission's initiative to publish a wizard on this Directive so that information on the rights that can be enjoyed by citizens can be made accessible not only to them, but also to local and regional authorities in the Member States.

reference: Of course, if you must know, it was an Alpine guide.
source: Ovšem, pokud to musíte vědět, byl to alpský průvodce.

errors.contrastive: Of course, if you must know, it was an Alpine wizard.

reference: After all that has happened in the intervening years to demonstrate the dangers inherent in these flaws, and a plethora of summits and conferences, a 2008 guide to financial regulation ought now to be hopelessly out of date.
source: Po událostech uplynulých let, jež názorně předvedly rizika, která z těchto nedostatků plynou, a po bezpočtu summitů a konferencí by dnes průvodce po finanční regulaci roku 2008 měl být zcela zastaralý.

errors.contrastive: After all that has happened in the intervening years to demonstrate the dangers inherent in these flaws, and a plethora of summits and conferences, a 2008 wizard to financial regulation ought now to be hopelessly out of date.

reference: A methodological guide was also produced and distributed at the same time, which addresses key issues for the success of the project, including how to understand children’s capacities.
source: Současně byl vyroben a distribuován metodologický průvodce, který se věnuje klíčovým otázkám důležitým pro úspěch projektu, včetně toho, jak se přiblížit dětskému chápání.

errors.contrastive: A methodological wizard was also produced and distributed at the same time, which addresses key issues for the success of the project, including how to understand children’s capacities.

reference: Might it be possible, Commissioner, for you to distribute a kind of small guide to help our fellow citizens adopt good habits?
source: Bylo by možné, paní komisařko, abyste zajistila distribuci malého průvodce, který by pomohl našim spoluobčanům osvojit si správné návyky?

errors.contrastive: Might it be possible, Commissioner, for you to distribute a kind of small wizard to help our fellow citizens adopt good habits?

reference: They told me today there's such a thing as a banana etiquette.
source: Dneska mi řekli, že existuje věc jako je banánová etiketa.

errors.contrastive: They told me today there's such a thing as a banana label.

reference: Well, that's mighty white of you. But, uh, putt putt etiquette says you got to wait till we finish shooting.
source: To je od vás moc vznešené, ale golfová etiketa říká, že musíte počkat dokud neskončíme.

errors.contrastive: Well, that's mighty white of you. But, uh, putt putt label says you got to wait till we finish shooting.

reference: Well, condom etiquette, it's hard for women, you know?
source: Ta etiketa s kondomy je pro ženy těžká, víš?

errors.contrastive: Well, condom label, it's hard for women, you know?

reference: Proper breeding. Lack of etiquette. All of it lacking.
source: Pořádný vychování...nedostatečná etiketa, všechno z toho chybí.

errors.contrastive: Proper breeding. Lack of label. All of it lacking.

reference: Nevertheless, there is an etiquette to this office.
source: Tak či tak, v této kanceláři platí určitá etiketa.

errors.contrastive: Nevertheless, there is an label to this office.

reference: "Sexual etiquette." I've never heard of such a thing!
source: "Sexuální etiketa." Nikdy jsem nic podobného neslyšela.

errors.contrastive: "Sexual label." I've never heard of such a thing!

reference: Servant etiquette and proper table linens for formal dinner parties, how to be the belle of the ball, and what to look for when buying a Chinese gardener.
source: Služebnická etiketa, správné prostírání na formální večerní party, jak se stát královnou plesu, a na co se dívat, když kupujete čínského zahradníka.

errors.contrastive: Servant label and proper table linens for formal dinner parties, how to be the belle of the ball, and what to look for when buying a Chinese gardener.

reference: "it is so easy to commit embarrassing blunders, but etiquette tells us just what is expected of us and guards us from all humiliation and discomfort."
source: "Dopustit se trapných omylů je snadné, ale etiketa nám říká, co se od nás očekává, a chrání nás před ponížením a rozpaky."

errors.contrastive: "it is so easy to commit embarrassing blunders, but label tells us just what is expected of us and guards us from all humiliation and discomfort."

reference: But, you idiot, that is just the point. Just to show you how bloody stupid all this etiquette is.
source: Chci ukázat všem, jak hloupá je celá etiketa.

errors.contrastive: But, you idiot, that is just the point. Just to show you how bloody stupid all this label is.

reference: I mean, what's the etiquette in these situations?
source: Chci říct, jaká je v těchto situacích ta správná etiketa?

errors.contrastive: I mean, what's the label in these situations?

reference: Yeah, well, basic party etiquette... navigate, network, and never overstay your welcome. Nice.
source: Jo, to je základní etiketa party... proplout, navázat styky a nikdy nezůstat příliš dlouho.

errors.contrastive: Yeah, well, basic party label... navigate, network, and never overstay your welcome. Nice.

reference: Grace, sexual etiquette demands you don't talk about one person when you're with another person.
source: Grace, sexuální etiketa vyžaduje, abys nemluvila o někom, když jsi zrovna s někým jiným.

errors.contrastive: Grace, sexual label demands you don't talk about one person when you're with another person.

reference: All their etiquette issues go along with a healthy dose of superstition.
