errors.contrastive: I don't see that snoopy little thermite as a romantic jewel thief.

reference: Workforce mobility. I am really looking forward to the debates in the various national parliaments, and especially my own, over how we want to amend labour law in order to achieve a more flexible and more mobile workforce.
source: Mobilita pracovní síly: já se opravdu těším na diskuse v jednotlivých národních parlamentech, zejména v tom našem, jak chceme měnit zákoník práce, aby byl flexibilnější, abychom dosáhli vyšší mobility pracovní síly.

errors.contrastive: Workforce mobility. I am really looking forward to the debates in the various national parliaments, and especially my own, over how we want to amend labour code in order to achieve a more flexible and more mobile workforce.

reference: Harvard's law class of'93 is going to be able to hold its reunion in a phone booth.
source: Harvardský zákoník, třída 93, umožňuje vyjednat opětné sjednocení v telefonní budce.

errors.contrastive: Harvard's code class of'93 is going to be able to hold its reunion in a phone booth.

reference: The third issue highlighted by Ms. Bonino is the quaint Italian labor law that allows a dismissed worker to go to court and seek reinstatement.
source: Třetím tématem, na které se zaměřila paní Bonino, je prapodivný italský zákoník práce, který umožňuje, aby se propuštěný dělník odebral k soudu a dožadoval se tam opětovného získání ztraceného pracovního místa.

errors.contrastive: The third issue highlighted by Ms. Bonino is the quaint Italian labor code that allows a dismissed worker to go to court and seek reinstatement.

reference: Icelandic labour law states that you should have a job contract not later than two months after your job has started.The job contract should state what your salary is.
source: Islandský zákoník práce stanovuje, že byste měli dostat pracovní smlouvu do dvou měsíců od nástupu. Ve smlouvě by měla být stanovena výše platu.

errors.contrastive: Icelandic labour code states that you should have a job contract not later than two months after your job has started.The job contract should state what your salary is.

reference: Honey, I'm looking up state law and there seem to be so many legal loopholes.
source: Zlato, pročítám si státní zákoník a zdá se, že je tu mnoho právních mezer.

errors.contrastive: Honey, I'm looking up state code and there seem to be so many legal loopholes.

reference: But the evisceration of US labor law also reflects the extraordinary power of America's culture of rights. Rights are universal and are held only by individuals, which means that a company CEO enjoys them just as much as his office clerk.
source: Podíváme-li se však na americký zákoník práce zblízka, zjistíme, že se v něm odráží pozoruhodná síla americké kultury práv. Práva jsou univerzální a mají je jen jednotlivci, což znamená, že generální ředitel na ně má stejný nárok jako úředník, který je pod ním.

errors.contrastive: But the evisceration of US labor code also reflects the extraordinary power of America's culture of rights. Rights are universal and are held only by individuals, which means that a company CEO enjoys them just as much as his office clerk.

reference: He dug around and found you... are you sitting down? - a Federal Civil Rights law.
source: Vyhrabal a našel ti, sedíš... federální občansko-právní zákoník.

errors.contrastive: He dug around and found you... are you sitting down? - a Federal Civil Rights code.

reference: And they don't put it on their time card, but they still sign charts, which happens to release them from the protection of federal labor law.
source: A nezapsaly to do své píchačky, ale přesto podepisují dokumenty, čímž přímo porušují federální zákoník práce.

errors.contrastive: And they don't put it on their time card, but they still sign charts, which happens to release them from the protection of federal labor code.

reference: The real objective of the report therefore appears to be more ambitious than the creation of a European civil code, with which I cannot agree.
source: Skutečný cíl této zprávy se proto zdá být ambicióznější, a sice vytvořit evropský občanský zákoník, s čímž nemohu souhlasit.

errors.contrastive: The real objective of the report therefore appears to be more ambitious than the creation of a European civil law, with which I cannot agree.

reference: We'll wait till she's through soaking in the hot tub... then I'm gonna inquire if she's acquainted with the Napoleonic Code.
source: Počkáme, až se vyválí ve vaně, a pak zjistím, jestli zná Napoleonův zákoník.

errors.contrastive: We'll wait till she's through soaking in the hot tub... then I'm gonna inquire if she's acquainted with the Napoleonic law.

reference: While an international legal code that defines cyber attacks more clearly, together with cooperation on preventive measures, can help, such arms-control solutions are not likely to be sufficient.
source: Mezinárodní zákoník, který by kybernetické útoky jasněji definoval, by sice společně s kooperací na preventivních opatřeních mohl pomoci, není však pravděpodobné, že by taková řešení na způsob kontroly zbrojení byla dostatečná.

errors.contrastive: While an international legal law that defines cyber attacks more clearly, together with cooperation on preventive measures, can help, such arms-control solutions are not likely to be sufficient.

reference: However, as a result of a testamentary parental partition inter vivos, as provided for under the former Article 1167 of the Netherlands Civil Code, all assets and liabilities of the estate passed to Ms Arens-Sikken, as the surviving spouse.
source: Nicméně na základě institutu testamentárního rodičovského rozdělení pozůstalosti (testamentaire ouderlijke boedelverdeling) ve smyslu bývalého článku 1167 Burgerlijke Wetboek (občanský zákoník) přešla veškerá aktiva a pasiva pozůstalosti na pozůstalou manželku, tedy na D. Arens-Sikken.

errors.contrastive: However, as a result of a testamentary parental partition inter vivos, as provided for under the former Article 1167 of the Netherlands Civil law, all assets and liabilities of the estate passed to Ms Arens-Sikken, as the surviving spouse.

reference: The same goes for any provision, and any criminal code.
source: To platí pro jakékoliv ustanovení a jakýkoliv trestní zákoník.

errors.contrastive: The same goes for any provision, and any criminal law.

reference: I mean, there's no stupid guy code or anything, is there?
source: Chci říct, není tu něco jako hloupej chlapskej zákoník nebo tak něco, že ne?

errors.contrastive: I mean, there's no stupid guy law or anything, is there?

reference: A new labor code has been adopted, but delivers scant liberalization because it does not reduce the mandatory severance pay of three months' salary and enhances the role of the official trade unions.
source: Schválen byl také nový zákoník práce, který ale přináší jen skrovnou liberalizaci, neboť nesnižuje povinné tříměsíční odchodné a posiluje roli oficiálních odborů.

errors.contrastive: A new labor law has been adopted, but delivers scant liberalization because it does not reduce the mandatory severance pay of three months' salary and enhances the role of the official trade unions.

reference: Under the Civil Code, employers are obliged to continue paying a sick employee at least 70% of his or her wage or salary during the first two years of illness.
source: Občanský zákoník zavazuje zaměstnavatele, aby pokračoval ve vyplácení odměny svému nemocnému zaměstnanci během prvních dvou let nemoci, a to ve výši nejméně 70 % mzdy.

errors.contrastive: Under the Civil law, employers are obliged to continue paying a sick employee at least 70% of his or her wage or salary during the first two years of illness.

reference: (RO) Mr President, the Romanian Government has adopted, by establishing liability, a new Labour Code which infringes Romanians' right to social protection.
source: (RO) Pane předsedající, rumunská vláda ve vlastní odpovědnosti přijala nový pracovní zákoník, který porušuje právo Rumunů na sociální ochranu.

errors.contrastive: (RO) Mr President, the Romanian Government has adopted, by establishing liability, a new Labour law which infringes Romanians' right to social protection.

reference: Battery against peace officer, Penal Code Section 242 "et seq. " I love the Latin.
source: Násilnosti proti obhájci. Trestní zákoník ustanovení § 242 a násl. Miluju latinu.

errors.contrastive: Battery against peace officer, Penal law Section 242 "et seq. " I love the Latin.

reference: Likewise, the economists Betsey Stevenson and Justin Wolfers, pioneers of “lovenomics,” cite the tax code as a reason for not marrying.
source: Ekonomové Betsey Stevensonová a Justin Wolfers, průkopníci „láskonomie,“ zase za důvod, proč žijí jako nesezdaný pár, označují daňový zákoník.

errors.contrastive: Likewise, the economists Betsey Stevenson and Justin Wolfers, pioneers of “lovenomics,” cite the tax law as a reason for not marrying.

reference: Under the provisions of labour law (Code of Obligations), employers are bound to continue to pay workers who are temporarily unable to work due to illness and maternity.
source: V případě nemoci a mateřství má zaměstnavatel podle ustanovení pracovního práva (zákoník povinností) povinnost pokračovat po omezenou dobu ve výplatě platu pracovníkovi v pracovní neschopnosti.

errors.contrastive: Under the provisions of labour law (law of Obligations), employers are bound to continue to pay workers who are temporarily unable to work due to illness and maternity.

reference: The Penal Code: Article 301 has already been mentioned, that is quite clear.
source: Trestní zákoník: článek 301 jsme už zmínili, to je celkem jasné.

errors.contrastive: The Penal law: Article 301 has already been mentioned, that is quite clear.

reference: If we start ignoring the Code, the whole thing falls apart.
source: Jestli začneme ignorovat zákoník, celá naše věc ztroskotá.

errors.contrastive: If we start ignoring the law, the whole thing falls apart.

reference: But the chief culprit is France’s own labor code – a forest of regulations that offers the strongest employment protection anywhere in the world.
source: Hlavní příčinou je ovšem francouzský zákoník práce – houština regulací, která nabízí nejsilnější ochranu pracovního místa na celém světě.

errors.contrastive: But the chief culprit is France’s own labor law – a forest of regulations that offers the strongest employment protection anywhere in the world.

reference: Recent examples are the new Czech Penal Code, in which offences of possession for personal use that involve cannabis, or its active component THC, attract a lower maximum penalty than those involving other substances.
source: K»nedávným příkladům patří nový český trestní zákoník, který za delikt držení drogy pro vlastní potřebu v»případě konopí nebo jeho aktivní složky THC ukládá nižší horní mez trestní sazby než v»případě jiných látek.

errors.contrastive: Recent examples are the new Czech Penal law, in which offences of possession for personal use that involve cannabis, or its active component THC, attract a lower maximum penalty than those involving other substances.

reference: In addition, the Criminal Code should be made stricter without delay, to avoid the occurrence of similar disasters taking human lives in the future.
source: Navíc by měl být bez otálení zpřísněn trestní zákoník, aby se zabránilo opakování podobných katastrof se ztrátami na životech v budoucnosti.

errors.contrastive: In addition, the Criminal law should be made stricter without delay, to avoid the occurrence of similar disasters taking human lives in the future.

reference: A new tax code was adopted, with lower and fewer taxes, notably a flat income tax of 13%.

source: Ustanovení § 46 části VI uvedeného zákoníku ve znění účinném od 1. ledna 2005 (dále jen „zákoník sociálního zabezpečení“) stanoví:

Thanks partly to the availability of computer programs and online matches, there has been a mini-boom in check interest among young people in many countries.

reference: Only the emerging and developing economies of Asia could effectively contribute to lifting global demand through a coordinated effort aimed at boosting domestic consumption, which, in turn, would stimulate additional investment.

reference: The US, in particular, could intensify its pursuit of bilateral deals, by which it is able to impose increasingly inappropriate policy priorities on smaller nations.
source: Zejména USA by mohly zintenzívnit úsilí o bilaterální smlouvy, jejichž prostřednictvím mohou vnucovat menším státům stále nepřiměřenější politické priority.

errors.contrastive: The US, in particular, could intensify its efforts of bilateral deals, by which it is able to impose increasingly inappropriate policy priorities on smaller nations.
The US, in particular, could intensify its endeavor of bilateral deals, by which it is able to impose increasingly inappropriate policy priorities on smaller nations.
The US, in particular, could intensify its effort of bilateral deals, by which it is able to impose increasingly inappropriate policy priorities on smaller nations.
The US, in particular, could intensify its endeavour of bilateral deals, by which it is able to impose increasingly inappropriate policy priorities on smaller nations.

reference: The Commission proposal amending the regulation on the common organisation of the market in milk and milk products provides for several important technical adjustments, which will clearly also lead to improvements.
source: Návrh Komise, kterým se mění nařízení o společné organizaci trhu s mlékem a mléčnými výrobky obsahuje řadu důležitých technických úprav, které rovněž zjevně vedou ke zlepšení.

errors.contrastive: The Commission proposal amending the order on the common organisation of the market in milk and milk products provides for several important technical adjustments, which will clearly also lead to improvements.

reference: If DI Denton is under suspicion, you need to issue her with a Regulation 15 Notice.
source: Pokud je inspektor Dentonová podezřelá, musíte jí doručit oznámení dle Nařízení 15.

errors.contrastive: If DI Denton is under suspicion, you need to issue her with a order 15 Notice.

reference: Of course, there are clear rules about how responsibility for refugees is delineated: according to the so-called Dublin Regulation, the first EU member state into which a refugee crosses is responsible for that person’s asylum application.
source: Samozřejmě, existují jasná pravidla, jimiž je odpovědnost za uprchlíky vytýčena: podle takzvaného Dublinského nařízení odpovědnost za žádost o azyl nese první členský stát EU, jehož hranice běženec překročí.

errors.contrastive: Of course, there are clear rules about how responsibility for refugees is delineated: according to the so-called Dublin order, the first EU member state into which a refugee crosses is responsible for that person’s asylum application.

reference: In the specific cases provided for by the Treaties, the adoption of a regulation, directive or decision by the European Parliament with the participation of the Council, or by the latter with the participation of the European Parliament, shall constitute a special legislative procedure.
source: Ve zvláštních případech stanovených Smlouvami je přijetí nařízení, směrnice nebo rozhodnutí Evropským parlamentem za účasti Rady nebo Radou za účasti Evropského parlamentu zvláštním legislativním postupem.

errors.contrastive: In the specific cases provided for by the Treaties, the adoption of a order, directive or decision by the European Parliament with the participation of the Council, or by the latter with the participation of the European Parliament, shall constitute a special legislative procedure.

reference: I therefore consider that the European Parliament is being too hasty and over-stepping its brief in asking that the Regulation on the introduction of liquids onto aircraft should not be implemented unless new proof is produced in support of such implementation.
source: Proto se domnívám, že Evropský parlament jedná unáhleně a překračuje svou pravomoc, žádá-li, aby se nařízení o převážení tekutin na palubě letadla přestalo uplatňovat, dokud nebude předložen nový důkaz podporující jeho uplatnění.

errors.contrastive: I therefore consider that the European Parliament is being too hasty and over-stepping its brief in asking that the order on the introduction of liquids onto aircraft should not be implemented unless new proof is produced in support of such implementation.

reference: You want me to circumvent every administrative regulation... on behalf of a colored helper?
source: Chceš po mně, abych obešel všechny administrativní nařízení... ve jménu barevného pomocníka?

errors.contrastive: You want me to circumvent every administrative order... on behalf of a colored helper?

reference: I recognize that every new regulation has unintended adverse consequences, but this does not mean reform should be abandoned.
source: Chápu, že každé nové nařízení má nezáměrné negativní dopady, ale to neznamená, že by se od reformy mělo ustoupit.

errors.contrastive: I recognize that every new order has unintended adverse consequences, but this does not mean reform should be abandoned.

reference: The Council, acting in accordance with a special legislative procedure, shall adopt a regulation laying down the multiannual financial framework.
source: Rada přijme zvláštním legislativním postupem nařízení, kterým se stanoví víceletý finanční rámec.

errors.contrastive: The Council, acting in accordance with a special legislative procedure, shall adopt a order laying down the multiannual financial framework.

reference: Then we should ask Member States to draw up plans to prevent forest fires and help them, encourage them, to finance these through a specific financing instrument similar to that in the old 1992 regulation.
source: Pak bychom měli požádat členské státy, aby vypracovaly plány na zabránění lesním požárům, a pomoci jim, podpořit je a poskytnout finanční prostředky na realizaci těchto plánů prostřednictvím zvláštního nástroje financování, podobného nástroji ze starého nařízení z roku 1992.

errors.contrastive: Then we should ask Member States to draw up plans to prevent forest fires and help them, encourage them, to finance these through a specific financing instrument similar to that in the old 1992 order.

reference: What we have here is your Royalty Airlines amenities kit containing airport codes and regulation manuals, your registration packet, campus rules, and information about our mentor program.
source: Tady máme vaši Royalty Airlines výbavu, která obsahuje letištní kódy a nařízení, registraci, ubytovací řád, a informace o našem vzdělávacím kurzu.

errors.contrastive: What we have here is your Royalty Airlines amenities kit containing airport codes and order manuals, your registration packet, campus rules, and information about our mentor program.

reference: In economic matters, disagreements on, say, a single EU regulation should not be allowed to mask the fact that no member state, new or old, has ever contested the internal market.
source: V hospodářských záležitostech bychom neměli dovolit, aby neshody řekněme kolem jediného nařízení EU zastřely skutečnost, že ani jediný stát, ať nový, či starý, nikdy nevznesl námitku proti vnitřnímu trhu.

errors.contrastive: In economic matters, disagreements on, say, a single EU order should not be allowed to mask the fact that no member state, new or old, has ever contested the internal market.

reference: — acts of the Council adopted pursuant to a Council regulation concerning measures to protect trade within the meaning of Article 207 of the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union;
source: — aktů Rady přijatých podle nařízení Rady týkajícího se opatření na ochranu obchodu ve smyslu článku 207 Smlouvy o fungování Evropské unie,

errors.contrastive: — acts of the Council adopted pursuant to a Council order concerning measures to protect trade within the meaning of Article 207 of the Treaty on the Functioning of the European Union;

reference: Given the nutritional importance of school milk, however, the aid for products falling within that regulation should be increased substantially, from EUR 16.11 per 100 kg to EUR 18.15 per 100 kg.
source: Vzhledem k významu školního mléka pro výživu by však měla být podpora pro výrobky, které spadají do oblasti působnosti uvedeného nařízení, výrazně zvýšena, a to z 16,11 EUR na 100 kg na 18,15 EUR na 100 kg.

errors.contrastive: Given the nutritional importance of school milk, however, the aid for products falling within that order should be increased substantially, from EUR 16.11 per 100 kg to EUR 18.15 per 100 kg.

reference: But because of the oil cartels and corrupt government regulation we and the rest of the world have been forced to use gasoline for over 100 years.
source: Jenže ropně kartely a nařízení zkorumpovaně vlády... nás a zbytek světa už 100 let nutí používat benzín.

errors.contrastive: But because of the oil cartels and corrupt government order we and the rest of the world have been forced to use gasoline for over 100 years.

reference: Would things be the same if the bill were called "Regulation 75"?
source: Jak by to asi vypadalo, kdyby se zákon jmenoval ,,Nařízení 75"?

errors.contrastive: Would things be the same if the bill were called "order 75"?

reference: The European Council may, unanimously, adopt a decision authorising the Council to act by a qualified majority when adopting the regulation referred to in the first paragraph.
source: Evropská rada může jednomyslně přijmout rozhodnutí, které Radě umožní při přijímání nařízení uvedeného v prvním pododstavci rozhodovat kvalifikovanou většinou.

errors.contrastive: The European Council may, unanimously, adopt a decision authorising the Council to act by a qualified majority when adopting the order referred to in the first paragraph.

reference: The way in which this Regulation has been applied across the EU has varied, giving rise to inconsistencies and manifest unfairness, and any review must address this aspect as a matter of urgency.
source: Způsob, jakým bylo toto nařízení v rámci EU uplatňováno, se různil, čímž vznikla nejednotnost a očividná nespravedlnost, každá revize musí tento aspekt naléhavě řešit.

errors.contrastive: The way in which this order has been applied across the EU has varied, giving rise to inconsistencies and manifest unfairness, and any review must address this aspect as a matter of urgency.

reference: You have now out of service in one section of the Filoz era shall, in any consequence of any law or regulation be discharged from such service but shall be delivered up on claim of the party to whom such service may be due.
source: Máte mimo provoz jednu sekci éry Filoz. Bude v důsledku jakéhokoliv zákona nebo nařízení propuštěn ze služby, ale bude vydán na základě stížnosti strany, které tato služba náleží.

errors.contrastive: You have now out of service in one section of the Filoz era shall, in any consequence of any law or order be discharged from such service but shall be delivered up on claim of the party to whom such service may be due.

reference: The ordinary legislative procedure shall consist in the joint adoption by the European Parliament and the Council of a regulation, directive or decision on a proposal from the Commission.
source: Řádný legislativní postup spočívá v tom, že Evropský parlament a Rada přijímají společně na návrh Komise nařízení, směrnice nebo rozhodnutí.

errors.contrastive: The ordinary legislative procedure shall consist in the joint adoption by the European Parliament and the Council of a order, directive or decision on a proposal from the Commission.

reference: in writing. - I voted against this Resolution which seeks to repeal the existing regulation, introduced last year, that restricts liquids on board aircraft.
source: písemně. - Hlasoval jsem proti tomuto usnesení, jehož cílem je zrušit současné nařízení zavedené v minulém roce a omezující přinášení tekutin na palubu letadla.

errors.contrastive: in writing. - I voted against this Resolution which seeks to repeal the existing order, introduced last year, that restricts liquids on board aircraft.

reference: The ruling or order by the European Court of Justice must be implemented once and for all, and the European rules on waste collection and disposal must be implemented in that region.
source: Rozsudek nebo nařízení Soudního dvora musí být konečně provedeno a tento region musí dodržovat evropská pravidla pro sběr a likvidaci odpadů.

errors.contrastive: The ruling or regulation by the European Court of Justice must be implemented once and for all, and the European rules on waste collection and disposal must be implemented in that region.

reference: It is the order of this court that these chiefs be incarcerated until such time as the detachment of the United States Cavalry be made available to escort them and the Comanche nation to Fort Sill.
source: Z nařízení tohoto soudu budou tito náčelníci uvězněni, dokud se nedostaví jednotka kavalerie U. S., která je a zbytek Komančů doprovodí do Fort Sill.

errors.contrastive: It is the regulation of this court that these chiefs be incarcerated until such time as the detachment of the United States Cavalry be made available to escort them and the Comanche nation to Fort Sill.

reference: The Propaganda Department of China’s ruling Communists have now issued an order banning any kind of reviews or commemoration of this disaster as part of the Party’s bid to make the Chinese forget about that lost decade.
source: Oddělení propagandy vládnoucí Komunistické strany Číny nyní vydalo nařízení, které zakazuje jakékoliv hodnocení či oslavu této katastrofy – jde o součást stranické snahy přimět Číňany, aby na toto ztracené desetiletí zapomněli.

errors.contrastive: The Propaganda Department of China’s ruling Communists have now issued an regulation banning any kind of reviews or commemoration of this disaster as part of the Party’s bid to make the Chinese forget about that lost decade.

source: CRDS byl zaveden článkem 141 nařízení č. 96-50 ze dne 24. ledna 1996 o úhradě sociálního dluhu (JORF ze dne 25. ledna 1996, s.

errors.contrastive: The CRDS was introduced by Article 141 of regulation No 96-50 of 24 January 1996 on repayment of the social debt (JORF of 25 January 1996, p.

reference: Court enforcement officers are being sent to enforce this order.
source: Pro vymáhání tohoto nařízení jsou vysíláni státní dozorčí úředníci.

errors.contrastive: Court enforcement officers are being sent to enforce this regulation.

reference: The 47th Emergency Internal Security Tribunal for the SW Region as authorized by executive order no. 302...
source: 47. výjimečný tribunál pro vnitřní bezpečnost v jichovýchodní oblasti je podle vládního nařízení číslo 302...

errors.contrastive: The 47th Emergency Internal Security Tribunal for the SW Region as authorized by executive regulation no. 302...

reference: An imperial order in 1890 outlined the objectives of education: the Confucian concepts of loyalty, obedience, and filial piety were to be transferred from the family to the nation.
source: Císařské nařízení v roce 1890 nastínilo cíle vzdělávání: konfuciánské koncepce věrnosti, poslušnosti a synovské úcty se měly přesunout z rodiny na národ.

errors.contrastive: An imperial regulation in 1890 outlined the objectives of education: the Confucian concepts of loyalty, obedience, and filial piety were to be transferred from the family to the nation.

reference: Similar reforms were introduced by the Education Reform (Northern Ireland) Order 1989.
source: Podobné reformy zavedlo Nařízení o reformě vzdělávání (Severního Irska) z roku 1989.

errors.contrastive: Similar reforms were introduced by the Education Reform (Northern Ireland) regulation 1989.

reference: I myself am a victim of a violation of this principle in France, as I am still being prosecuted by order of the government in an affair in which I have, nonetheless, been proved totally innocent by the Court of Cassation.
source: Sám jsem obětí porušování této zásady ve Francii, protože mě stále nařízení vlády trestně stíhá ve věci, v níž mě kasační soud uznal zcela nevinným.

errors.contrastive: I myself am a victim of a violation of this principle in France, as I am still being prosecuted by regulation of the government in an affair in which I have, nonetheless, been proved totally innocent by the Court of Cassation.

reference: In 1933, he was visited by an astonished forester who notified him of an order that fires outdoors were forbidden for fear of endangering this "natural" forest.
source: V roce 1933 ho navštívil udivený lesník a upozornil ho o nařízení, že rozdělávat oheň venku je zakázané kvůli ohrožování tohoto "přírodního" pralesa.

errors.contrastive: In 1933, he was visited by an astonished forester who notified him of an regulation that fires outdoors were forbidden for fear of endangering this "natural" forest.

reference: The upcoming election, to be held under the illegal Provisional Constitutional Order (PCO) implemented following President Pervez Musharraf’s state of emergency on November 3, is such a case, which is why my party and its coalition partners are boycotting the vote.
source: Blížící se volby, které se uskuteční na základě nezákonného Dočasného ústavního nařízení (PCO) zavedeného po 3. listopadu, kdy prezident Parvíz Mušaraf vyhlásil výjimečný stav, jsou právě takovým případem. Z tohoto důvodu budou moje strana a její koaliční partneři hlasování bojkotovat.

errors.contrastive: The upcoming election, to be held under the illegal Provisional Constitutional regulation (PCO) implemented following President Pervez Musharraf’s state of emergency on November 3, is such a case, which is why my party and its coalition partners are boycotting the vote.

reference: The mother appeals against the award of custody and the return order
source: Matka se odvolala proti svěření péče o dítě otci a proti nařízení navrácení dítěte.

errors.contrastive: The mother appeals against the award of custody and the return regulation

reference: (FI) Mr President, caning by order of a court, where the person receiving the punishment is tied to a frame and his or her back and buttocks are beaten with a stick, is unethical and violates human dignity.
source: (FI) Vážený pane předsedající, bití z nařízení soudu, při kterém je trest vykonáván tak, že odsouzený je připoután k rámu a dostává rány holí přes záda či hýždě, je neetické a porušuje lidskou důstojnost.

errors.contrastive: (FI) Mr President, caning by regulation of a court, where the person receiving the punishment is tied to a frame and his or her back and buttocks are beaten with a stick, is unethical and violates human dignity.

reference: His identity has been electronically cloaked and that only happens by executive order.
source: Jeho identita je elektronicky maskována. A to může být jen z vládního nařízení.

errors.contrastive: His identity has been electronically cloaked and that only happens by executive regulation.

reference: From the outset, the Defense Ministry was skeptical of Putin's order to include anti-terrorism on the military agenda.
source: Ministerstvo obrany se vůči Putinovu nařízení začlenit antiterorismus do vojenské agendy stavělo již od počátku skepticky.

errors.contrastive: From the outset, the Defense Ministry was skeptical of Putin's regulation to include anti-terrorism on the military agenda.

reference: The social debt repayment contribution (the ‘CRDS’) was introduced by Article 141 of Order No 96-50 of 24 January 1996 concerning repayment of the social debt.
source: Příspěvek na úhradu sociálního dluhu (dále jen „CRDS“) byl zaveden článkem 141 nařízení č. 96-50 ze dne 24. ledna 1996 o úhradě sociálního dluhu 9.

errors.contrastive: The social debt repayment contribution (the ‘CRDS’) was introduced by Article 141 of regulation No 96-50 of 24 January 1996 concerning repayment of the social debt.

reference: It seems that, under the terms of the state of emergency declared on 23 May, an Order dated 30 May authorised the Mayors of Rome, Naples and Milan to implement certain measures.
source: Vyplývá z nich, že v rámci výjimečného stavu vyhlášeného 23. května umožňuje nařízení ze 30. května starostům Říma, Neapole a Milána přijímat určitá opatření.

errors.contrastive: It seems that, under the terms of the state of emergency declared on 23 May, an regulation dated 30 May authorised the Mayors of Rome, Naples and Milan to implement certain measures.

reference: The German command has given out a firm order not to stop you!
source: Německé velení vydalo nařízení, že vás nesmí nikdo zadržovat.

errors.contrastive: The German command has given out a firm regulation not to stop you!

reference: 1469; ‘the Order of 1969’), authorisation to open and operate an artificial insemination centre may be accorded to natural or legal persons.
source: 1469, dále jen „nařízení z roku 1969“), může být povolení založit a provozovat inseminační stanici uděleno fyzickým nebo právnickým osobám.

errors.contrastive: 1469; ‘the regulation of 1969’), authorisation to open and operate an artificial insemination centre may be accorded to natural or legal persons.

reference: As far as this specific issue is concerned, the order for Guantánamo maintains the facility for the CIA to 'abduct terrorist suspects' and take them to secret prisons.
source: Co se týče této konkrétní otázky, nařízení týkající se Guantánama ponechává zařízení CIA, aby "násilím odvedla podezřelé z terorismu" a zavřela je do tajných vězení.

errors.contrastive: As far as this specific issue is concerned, the regulation for Guantánamo maintains the facility for the CIA to 'abduct terrorist suspects' and take them to secret prisons.

reference: The president is not here,I'm the administrator,what can I do for you?
source: Ředitel zde není, jsem správce, mohu pro vás něco udělat?

errors.contrastive: The president is not here,I'm the steward,what can I do for you?

reference: While US Chief Administrator Paul Bremer recently vested authority in a number of judges, their powers are extremely limited, and apply only to present violations, not the sustained abuses of human rights that defined Saddam's regime.
source: Hlavní americký civilní správce Iráku Paul Bremer sice nedávno udělil pravomoci řadě soudců, jejich faktická moc je vsak mimořádně omezená a týká se pouze současných porusení zákona, nikoliv trvalého porusování lidských práv, které charakterizovalo režim Saddáma Husajna.

errors.contrastive: While US Chief steward Paul Bremer recently vested authority in a number of judges, their powers are extremely limited, and apply only to present violations, not the sustained abuses of human rights that defined Saddam's regime.

reference: You could also, for example, give the role of ‘local data administrator’ to a user in your authority’s IT department.
source: Mohli byste také například přidělit úlohu „místní správce údajů“ uživateli v oddělení IT svého příslušného orgánu.

errors.contrastive: You could also, for example, give the role of ‘local data steward’ to a user in your authority’s IT department.

reference: Laugh if you will, Susan, but he is the greatest administrator the world has ever seen.
source: Klidně se směj, jestli chceš, Susan. Ale je to ten nejlepší správce, jakého kdy svět spatřil.

errors.contrastive: Laugh if you will, Susan, but he is the greatest steward the world has ever seen.

reference: The system is overseen by a central administrator at EU level who, through an independent transaction log, checks each transaction for any irregularities.
source: Na úrovni EU na systém dohlíží ústřední správce, který prostřednictvím nezávislého protokolu transakcí kontroluje veškeré operace a hledá jakékoli nesrovnalosti.

errors.contrastive: The system is overseen by a central steward at EU level who, through an independent transaction log, checks each transaction for any irregularities.

errors.contrastive: Her descendent will now hatch in the gall's centre, consume the flesh of the resident larva and take over the gall.
Her descendant will now hatch in the gall's centre, consume the flesh of the resident larva and take over the gall.

reference: Well, the ship has notified me that the offspring now needs a name...
source: Tak ta loď mě upozornila, že potomek teď potřebuje jméno...

errors.contrastive: Well, the ship has notified me that the descendent now needs a name...
Well, the ship has notified me that the descendant now needs a name...

reference: If I had been your biological offspring would you have left me on Omicron Theta?
source: Kdybych byl tvůj biologický potomek, nechala bys mě na Omicronu?

errors.contrastive: If I had been your biological descendent would you have left me on Omicron Theta?
If I had been your biological descendant would you have left me on Omicron Theta?

reference: You jump from one personality to another, just like a grasshopper.

errors.contrastive: You jump from one personality to another, just like a filly.

reference: It was a grasshopper at my last school, so this is definitely an upgrade.
source: Na minulé škole to byla kobylka, takže je to rozhodně zlepšení.

errors.contrastive: It was a filly at my last school, so this is definitely an upgrade.

reference: Well, look like the grasshopper found himself a blade of grass to sit upon!
source: Hmm, vypadá to, že si kobylka našla - stéblo trávy, na který si sedne! - To je moc.

errors.contrastive: Well, look like the filly found himself a blade of grass to sit upon!

reference: I'm like the grasshopper who sang all summer.
source: Jsem jak ta kobylka, co celé léto zpívala.

errors.contrastive: I'm like the filly who sang all summer.

reference: And then, in a strange turn of events, a grasshopper took advantage of me!
source: A pak záhadným řízením osudu se na mně ještě ukájela kobylka!

reference: "...when they shall be afraid of that which is high, "and fears shall bein the way, "and the almond tree shall flourish, and the grasshopper shall be a burden..."
source: Ano i vysokosti báti se budou, a úrazu na cestě, a kvésti bude mandlový strom, tak že i kobylka těžká bude...

errors.contrastive: "...when they shall be afraid of that which is high, "and fears shall bein the way, "and the almond tree shall flourish, and the filly shall be a burden..."

reference: He was the sensei, and I was the grasshopper.

errors.contrastive: He was the sensei, and I was the filly.

reference: How cruel A grasshopper trapped Under a warrior's helmet
source: Jak je to kruté kobylka uvězněná přilbou vojáka. -

errors.contrastive: How cruel A filly trapped Under a warrior's helmet

reference: So I jumped like a grasshopper and walked on my tippy toes and watched everyone else eat their cookies.
source: Takže jsem skákalal jako kobylka a chodila po špičkách prstů a sledovala, jak všichni ostatní jí své sušenky.

errors.contrastive: So I jumped like a filly and walked on my tippy toes and watched everyone else eat their cookies.

reference: Apart from our cocktail of the day... which is the Grasshopper.
source: Až na náš dnešní koktejl, kterým je Kobylka.

errors.contrastive: Apart from our cocktail of the day... which is the filly.

reference: I thought grasshopper was gonna come out of his nose. I'm so sorry you missed it.
source: Myslela jsem, že mu ta kobylka vyleze z nosu.

errors.contrastive: I thought filly was gonna come out of his nose. I'm so sorry you missed it.

errors.contrastive: To a flea, even the sound of a filly is like thunder.

reference: Well, this old filly still has a few races to run, a couple of mountains to climb.
source: No, tahle stará kobylka má stále pár závodů k uběhnutí, pár hor ke slezení. Dobře, jdi na to, ...

errors.contrastive: If you fancy a bet, I've got a little grasshopper won't let you down.

errors.contrastive: I knew about his fundraiser, so I bought a ticket walked right up to him and said, "Harrison, it's Fast grasshopper."'

errors.contrastive: Valentina knows there's not a grasshopper that I can't break.

reference: My little filly, she made sacrifices all over the place.
source: Moje kobylka, ta se obětovala úplně ve všem.

errors.contrastive: My little grasshopper, she made sacrifices all over the place.

reference: Speaking of that, who was that little filly that dropped you off over here, Nolan?
source: Když o tom mluvíme, kdo byla ta kobylka, která tě sem přivezla, Nolane?

errors.contrastive: Speaking of that, who was that little grasshopper that dropped you off over here, Nolan?

reference: The back doorknob of the pizza shop was wiped clean, but they did find Nick's prints all over the pizza oven.

source: Uvědomil jsem si, že když se probudím a na dveřích je klika zevnitř, je to dobrý den.

reference: This is not the doorknob, but when it's finished with you, you're going to wish it was.

errors.contrastive: All of us speaking on this item are aware that the longitude of proceedings is a nightmare for the European institutions, and therefore obviously also a nightmare for the citizens of Europe.

reference: Doctor, I read a statement you made. You felt the average length of a man's penis should be 19 inches.
source: Doktore, četl jsem proslov, kde jste psal že si myslíte, že průměrná délka mužského penisu má být 50 cm

errors.contrastive: Doctor, I read a statement you made. You felt the average longitude of a man's penis should be 19 inches.

reference: For vessels used in small-scale coastal fishing (overall length of less than 12 metres), the new engine may be equal in power to the one being replaced, but not more powerful.
source: U lodí pro drobný pobřežní rybolov (celková délka do 12 metrů) může mít nový motor stejný výkon jako starý, ale ne vyšší.

errors.contrastive: For vessels used in small-scale coastal fishing (overall longitude of less than 12 metres), the new engine may be equal in power to the one being replaced, but not more powerful.

reference: The amount or length of maternity leave certainly does not determine the decision to start a family or whether or not to have a child.
source: O vlastním rozhodnutí založit rodinu a mít či nemít dítě jistě nerozhoduje výše ani délka mateřské dovolené.

errors.contrastive: The amount or longitude of maternity leave certainly does not determine the decision to start a family or whether or not to have a child.

reference: An acre is the area of a rectangle... whose length is one furlong... and whose width is one chain.
source: Pole má obdélníkový tvar... jehož délka je 1 míle... a šířka je...

errors.contrastive: An acre is the area of a rectangle... whose longitude is one furlong... and whose width is one chain.

reference: Advanced vocational training (e.g. secretarial and office work) consists of ciclos formativos (training cycles) divided into modules of variable length related to a variety of professional fields.
source: Pokročilá profesní příprava (např. v oboru sekretářské a kancelářské práce) se uskutečňuje v ciclos formativos, které jsou rozděleny do modulů, jejichž délka se mění podle příslušného oboru.

errors.contrastive: Advanced vocational training (e.g. secretarial and office work) consists of ciclos formativos (training cycles) divided into modules of variable longitude related to a variety of professional fields.

reference: We believe that it is important that we agree with the Member States on '2020 Vision', because if we do then this would certainly reduce the length of further debates about what we want to do in Europe.
source: Považujeme za důležité, že se nám podařilo dohodnout se s členskými státy na Vizi 2020, protože se tím jistě omezí délka dalších diskusí o budoucnosti v Evropě.

errors.contrastive: We believe that it is important that we agree with the Member States on '2020 Vision', because if we do then this would certainly reduce the longitude of further debates about what we want to do in Europe.

reference: There was the Battle of Marathon and then this bloke ran 26 miles, the length of a marathon, and he said, "We won the Battle of Marathon," and dropped dead.
source: Byla tam Bitva u Marathonu. a pak ten borec běžel 26 mil, délka maratonu, doběhl a řekl, "Vyhráli jsme bitvu u Maratonu," a spadl mrtvý na zem.

errors.contrastive: There was the Battle of Marathon and then this bloke ran 26 miles, the longitude of a marathon, and he said, "We won the Battle of Marathon," and dropped dead.

reference: We'll check the fourth proof against the index again, and see if any other words are missing.
source: Porovnáme znovu rejstřík a čtvrtou korekturu. Musíme se ujistit, že nechybí další slova.

errors.contrastive: We'll check the fourth proof against the register again, and see if any other words are missing.

reference: I have the Progeny Index on the computer: a compilation of thoroughbred bloodlines.
source: Mám na počítači Progeny lndex - rejstřík rodokmenu plnokrevníku.

errors.contrastive: I have the Progeny register on the computer: a compilation of thoroughbred bloodlines.

reference: I mean, I've skimmed the index in WHSmith's, saved myself the £1.99.
source: Proletěl jsem si rejstřík v WHSmith's a ušetřil jsem si $1.99.

errors.contrastive: I mean, I've skimmed the register in WHSmith's, saved myself the £1.99.

reference: It appears to be an index for plans and technical drawings of various inventions.
source: Vypadá to na rejstřík pro plány a technické výkresy různých vynálezů.

errors.contrastive: It appears to be an register for plans and technical drawings of various inventions.

reference: Codenamed Chaos, the CIA's illegal domestic operations lasted almost 7 years compiling a computer index of 300,000 citizens and organizations and extensive files on more than 7,000 individuals, but failed to prove communist involvement.
source: S krycím názvem Chaos, nelegální domácí operace CIA trvala téměř 7 let sestavovali počítačový rejstřík 300.000 občanů a uspořádávali rozsáhlé soubory o více jak 7.000 osobách, ale nepodařilo se prokázat spojení s komunisty.

errors.contrastive: Codenamed Chaos, the CIA's illegal domestic operations lasted almost 7 years compiling a computer register of 300,000 citizens and organizations and extensive files on more than 7,000 individuals, but failed to prove communist involvement.

reference: Can you believe a book as thick as that hasn't got an index?
source: Věřila bys tomu že tak tlustá kniha jako tahle nemá rejstřík?

errors.contrastive: Can you believe a book as thick as that hasn't got an register?

reference: Leads are not followed up, conclusions are selective, no index.
source: Co je důležité, to nikdo nevyšetřuje, závěry jsou ad hoc, žádný rejstřík.

errors.contrastive: Leads are not followed up, conclusions are selective, no register.

reference: These limits have to be respected, so a public register may not be the best solution.
source: Tato omezení musejí být dodržena, a veřejný rejstřík tudíž nemusí být tím nejlepším řešením.

errors.contrastive: These limits have to be respected, so a public index may not be the best solution.

reference: There's not a single register at Companies House, not one e-mail, not even a text.
source: Není jediný rejstřík v Domě společností, žádný e-mail, dokonce ani smska.

errors.contrastive: There's not a single index at Companies House, not one e-mail, not even a text.

reference: The Agency shall establish and keep up to date a register of downstream users who have made a notification in accordance with paragraph 1.
source: Agentura vytvoří a aktualizuje rejstřík následných uživatelů, kteří provedli oznámení podle odstavce 1.

errors.contrastive: The Agency shall establish and keep up to date a index of downstream users who have made a notification in accordance with paragraph 1.

reference: One telling example currently in evidence is Canada, which is seeking to set up a compulsory register for all large vessels passing through the Northwest Passage from July 2010.
source: Jedním z výmluvných případů je Kanada, která se snaží založit povinný rejstřík všech velkých plavidel, které proplouvají Severozápadní cestou, s platností od července 2010.

errors.contrastive: One telling example currently in evidence is Canada, which is seeking to set up a compulsory index for all large vessels passing through the Northwest Passage from July 2010.

reference: The business register There is a new corporation established in the name of Colonel.
source: Bingo, okresní rejstřík. Nedávno byla zapsaná nová společnost na plukovníkovo jméno.

errors.contrastive: The business index There is a new corporation established in the name of Colonel.

reference: The Commission register of interest representatives (14) celebrated its first anniversary in 2009.
source: V roce 2009 oslavil rok své existence rejstřík Komise zástupců zájmových skupin (14).

errors.contrastive: The Commission index of interest representatives (14) celebrated its first anniversary in 2009.

reference: We are complementing the register with a number of things, such as comitology and all the expert groups.
source: Tento rejstřík doplňujeme řadou záležitostí, jako je postup rozhodování ve výborech a skupiny expertů.

errors.contrastive: We are complementing the index with a number of things, such as comitology and all the expert groups.

reference: No, I'm still not getting anything. Could you try it in a higher register?
source: Ne... stále nic... nemohl byste použít vyšší rejstřík?

errors.contrastive: No, I'm still not getting anything. Could you try it in a higher index?

reference: It was presented in the Commission communication of 27 may ‘European transparency initiative: A framework for relations with interest representatives (register and code of conduct)’ (1).
source: Kodex byl předložen ve sdělení Komise z 27. května s názvem „Evropská iniciativa pro transparentnost – rámcová pravidla pro styk se zástupci zájmových skupin (rejstřík a etický kodex)“ (1).

errors.contrastive: It was presented in the Commission communication of 27 may ‘European transparency initiative: A framework for relations with interest representatives (index and code of conduct)’ (1).

reference: Your last question, number 5, concentrates on the public register of documents and the Ombudsman's draft recommendation in the 'Statewatch' complaint.
source: Vaše poslední otázka číslo 5 se soustředí na veřejný rejstřík dokumentů a návrh doporučení ochránce práv spojený se stížností nevládní organizace Statewatch.

errors.contrastive: Your last question, number 5, concentrates on the public index of documents and the Ombudsman's draft recommendation in the 'Statewatch' complaint.

reference: The recorder will make a copy for the register of sentences so that it may be certified and subsequently filed.
source: Rekordér bude vytvořit kopii pro rejstřík trestů tak, že to může být uznáno a následně archivované.

errors.contrastive: The recorder will make a copy for the index of sentences so that it may be certified and subsequently filed.

reference: The aim is also to create a unique register for all geographical indications (for wines, spirits and agricultural products and foodstuffs) while preserving the specificities of each system.
source: Cílem je také vytvořit jedinečný rejstřík pro všechna zeměpisná označení (pro vína, lihoviny a zemědělské výrobky a potraviny) při zachování specifických prvků každého systému.

errors.contrastive: The aim is also to create a unique index for all geographical indications (for wines, spirits and agricultural products and foodstuffs) while preserving the specificities of each system.

reference: However - and I was very honest in trying to answer one of the five questions - I am not convinced that the best thing is to have one register.
source: Nejsem však přesvědčena - a v tom, jak jsem se snažila odpovědět na všech pět otázek, jsem byla velmi upřímná - že nejlepším řešením je mít jeden rejstřík.

errors.contrastive: However - and I was very honest in trying to answer one of the five questions - I am not convinced that the best thing is to have one index.

reference: To make it easier to find documents that might be requested, the General Secretariat of the Council makes available on the internet a public register of Council documents.
source: Pro snazší vyhledávání dokumentů, o jejichž poskytnutí lze požádat, dává generální sekretariát Rady prostřednictvím internetu k dispozici veřejný rejstřík dokumentů Rady.

errors.contrastive: To make it easier to find documents that might be requested, the General Secretariat of the Council makes available on the internet a public index of Council documents.

reference: As already stated, the new Register also contains an amendment to the Rules of Procedure.
source: Jak už jsem zmínil, nový rejstřík rovněž obsahuje změnu jednacího řádu.

errors.contrastive: As already stated, the new index also contains an amendment to the Rules of Procedure.

reference: On 23 June the European Commission launched its online register of interest representatives.
source: Komise dne 23. června spustila on-line rejstřík zástupců zájmových skupin.

errors.contrastive: On 23 June the European Commission launched its online index of interest representatives.

reference: Parliament has maintained its own quasi-obligatory register of lobbyists from as long ago as 1996, as well as a very precise code of conduct.
source: Parlament vede svůj vlastní zčásti povinný rejstřík lobbistů již od roku 1996 stejně jako velmi přesně stanovený kodex chování.

errors.contrastive: Parliament has maintained its own quasi-obligatory index of lobbyists from as long ago as 1996, as well as a very precise code of conduct.

reference: These declarations shall be made annually in writing and, without prejudice to paragraph 1, be entered in a register held by the Agency which is accessible to the public, on request, at the Agency's offices.
source: Tato prohlášení učiní každý rok písemně, a aniž je dotčen odstavec 1, zapisují se do rejstřík uvedeného agenturou, který je na požádání dostupný veřejnosti v kancelářích agentury.

errors.contrastive: These declarations shall be made annually in writing and, without prejudice to paragraph 1, be entered in a index held by the Agency which is accessible to the public, on request, at the Agency's offices.

reference: I can give you one example of what can be done, which is that I have already made my own correspondence register available on the Internet, so you can see my correspondence and documents.
source: Mohu vám dát jeden příklad, co může být učiněno - zpřístupnila jsem rejstřík své korespondence na internetu, takže můžete vidět mou korespondenci a mé dokumenty.

errors.contrastive: I can give you one example of what can be done, which is that I have already made my own correspondence index available on the Internet, so you can see my correspondence and documents.

reference: The Public Register section of the Council website contains references to over a million Council documents from 1999 onwards.
source: Veřejný rejstřík na internetových stránkách Rady obsahuje odkazy na více než milion dokumentů Rady od roku 1999.

errors.contrastive: The Public index section of the Council website contains references to over a million Council documents from 1999 onwards.

reference: Hydrogen is the simplest of gases, But it has a very special property.
source: Vodík je nejjednodušší z plynů, ale má velmi zvláštní vlastnost.

errors.contrastive: Hydrogen is the simplest of gases, But it has a very special attribute.
Hydrogen is the simplest of gases, But it has a very special quality.

reference: Where sufficient weight of evidence for the presence or absence of a particular dangerous property is available:
source: Existují-li dostatečně průkazné důkazy, že látka má nebo nemá určitou nebezpečnou vlastnost,

errors.contrastive: Where sufficient weight of evidence for the presence or absence of a particular dangerous attribute is available:
Where sufficient weight of evidence for the presence or absence of a particular dangerous quality is available:

reference: This shape-shifting property explains why the chameleon has yet to be spotted in our particle accelerators.
source: Tato vlastnost měnění tvaru vysvětluje, proč chameleóni musí být spatřeni v našich urychlovačích částic.

errors.contrastive: This shape-shifting attribute explains why the chameleon has yet to be spotted in our particle accelerators.
This shape-shifting quality explains why the chameleon has yet to be spotted in our particle accelerators.

reference: — other available data indicate that the substance may have a dangerous property that cannot be detected in a short-term toxicity study, or
source: — jiné dostupné údaje naznačují, že látka může mít nebezpečnou vlastnost, kterou nelze odhalit studií subakutní toxicity, nebo

errors.contrastive: — other available data indicate that the substance may have a dangerous attribute that cannot be detected in a short-term toxicity study, or
— other available data indicate that the substance may have a dangerous quality that cannot be detected in a short-term toxicity study, or

reference: Energy scientifically is a property that things have that we say technically allow us to do work or make things move
source: Energie, vědecky, je vlastnost, která je vlastní věcem, technicky řečeno nám umožňuje pracovat a pohybovat věcmi.

errors.contrastive: Energy scientifically is a attribute that things have that we say technically allow us to do work or make things move
Energy scientifically is a quality that things have that we say technically allow us to do work or make things move

reference: For every physicochemical property, the assessment shall entail an evaluation of the inherent capacity of the substance to cause the effect resulting from the manufacture and identified uses.
source: Pro každou fyzikálně-chemickou vlastnost zahrnuje posouzení vyhodnocení toho, nakolik mohou vlastnosti látky vyvolat daný účinek při výrobě a určených použitích.

errors.contrastive: For every physicochemical attribute, the assessment shall entail an evaluation of the inherent capacity of the substance to cause the effect resulting from the manufacture and identified uses.
For every physicochemical quality, the assessment shall entail an evaluation of the inherent capacity of the substance to cause the effect resulting from the manufacture and identified uses.

reference: Yet all this complexity stems from just one incredibly simple equation. This equation has a very important property.
source: taková komplexnost a přesto vše pochází z jednoho jednoduchého vzorce tento vzorec má velice důležitou vlastnost

errors.contrastive: Yet all this complexity stems from just one incredibly simple equation. This equation has a very important attribute.
Yet all this complexity stems from just one incredibly simple equation. This equation has a very important quality.

reference: — further testing on vertebrate animals for that property shall be omitted,

reference: The second property of your excellent sherry is the warming of the blood, which, before cold and settled, left the liver white and pale which is the badge of pusillanimity and cowardice.
source: Druhá vlastnost takového znamenitého šery jest, že rozehřeje krev, která, dřív chladná a usazená, nechávala játra bílými a bledými, což je známkou malomyslnosti a zbabělství.

errors.contrastive: The second attribute of your excellent sherry is the warming of the blood, which, before cold and settled, left the liver white and pale which is the badge of pusillanimity and cowardice.
The second quality of your excellent sherry is the warming of the blood, which, before cold and settled, left the liver white and pale which is the badge of pusillanimity and cowardice.

reference: — the substance may have a dangerous property that cannot be detected in a 90-day study.
source: — látka může mít nebezpečnou vlastnost, kterou není možné odhalit v 90denní studii.

errors.contrastive: — the substance may have a dangerous attribute that cannot be detected in a 90-day study.
— the substance may have a dangerous quality that cannot be detected in a 90-day study.

reference: The simplest explanation that's been proposed for the phenomenon of dark energy is that there's an intrinsic property of space itself that makes it want to expand.
source: Nejjednodušší vysvětlení, které byla navrženo pro fenomén temné energie je, že existuje skutečná vlastnost samotného vesmíru, která ho nutí se rozšiřovat.

The simplest explanation that's been proposed for the phenomenon of dark energy is that there's an intrinsic quality of space itself that makes it want to expand.

reference: It's this property that tells us what the stars are made of.
source: Tato vlastnost nám říká, z čeho jsou hvězdy.

errors.contrastive: It's this attribute that tells us what the stars are made of.
It's this quality that tells us what the stars are made of.

reference: Sign this deed, and the property is all yours.
source: Podepsat tento skutek, a vlastnost je celá vaše.

errors.contrastive: Sign this deed, and the attribute is all yours.
Sign this deed, and the quality is all yours.

reference: You put one foot on that property... she can have your ass thrown in jail.
source: dát vám jednu nohu na tuto vlastnost ... ona může mít svůj zadek ve vězení.

errors.contrastive: You put one foot on that attribute... she can have your ass thrown in jail.

It turned out that this crystal owns quality amend chemical composition of substances.

reference: If you believe you may seize my property simply because you need it, well then, so does any burglar.
source: Pokud si myslíte, že může zabavit můj vlastnost jednoduše proto, že ji budete potřebovat, Dobře tedy, tak jako každá zloděje.

errors.contrastive: If you believe you may seize my attribute simply because you need it, well then, so does any burglar.
If you believe you may seize my quality simply because you need it, well then, so does any burglar.

reference: Each liquefied thing provides an instance of the property of being liquid.
source: Každá zkapalněná věc má tu vlastnost, že je tekutá.

errors.contrastive: Each liquefied thing provides an instance of the attribute of being liquid.
Each liquefied thing provides an instance of the quality of being liquid.

reference: There was also that clever little guy with the white beard who said "property is theft".
source: Tam byl také tak chytrý malý chlápek s bílým vousem, který řekl, "Vlastnost je krádež".

errors.contrastive: There was also that clever little guy with the white beard who said "attribute is theft".
There was also that clever little guy with the white beard who said "quality is theft".

reference: There is no inherent psycho-pharmacological property of the drug which pushes one toward another drug.
source: Není žádný farmako-psychologická vlastnost drogy, která by vás tlačila do jiné drogy

errors.contrastive: There is no inherent psycho-pharmacological attribute of the drug which pushes one toward another drug.
There is no inherent psycho-pharmacological quality of the drug which pushes one toward another drug.

reference: And the strong magnetic property of the particles is what keeps the door from just crumbling into dust.
source: Silná magnetická vlastnost částic brání zdi v tom, aby se přeměnila na prach je to skvělý způsob, jak schovat dveře.

errors.contrastive: And the strong magnetic attribute of the particles is what keeps the door from just crumbling into dust.

errors.contrastive: And it has one further property, which Aysheaia could not have had.
And it has one further quality, which Aysheaia could not have had.

reference: Punctuality, sir, is an attribute I pride myself on.
source: Dochvilnost je vlastnost, na které si zakládám, pane.

errors.contrastive: Punctuality, sir, is an property I pride myself on.
Punctuality, sir, is an quality I pride myself on.

reference: Now to recap, what is the number one attribute All med students share with this skeleton?
source: Rekapitulace, jaká je nejdůležitější vlastnost, kterou mají všichni medici společnou s touto kostrou?

errors.contrastive: Now to recap, what is the number one property All med students share with this skeleton?
Now to recap, what is the number one quality All med students share with this skeleton?

reference: But when you put the chips down and life gets tough, I hide behind that one label, that one attribute.
source: Ale když uklidíš konfety a život je zase těžký, tak se schovám za tenhle jediný štít, který mám, za tuhle jedinou vlastnost.

errors.contrastive: But when you put the chips down and life gets tough, I hide behind that one label, that one property.
But when you put the chips down and life gets tough, I hide behind that one label, that one quality.

reference: It'd the only attribute I dhare with the Almighty.
source: To je jediná vlastnost, kterou sdílím s Všemohoucím.

errors.contrastive: It'd the only property I dhare with the Almighty.
It'd the only quality I dhare with the Almighty.

reference: Truth is that your innermost fear is in fact your most striking attribute.
source: Pravdou je, že váš nejniternější strach je ve skutečnosti vaše nejnápadnější vlastnost.

errors.contrastive: Truth is that your innermost fear is in fact your most striking property.
Truth is that your innermost fear is in fact your most striking quality.

reference: An attribute neither you nor your man Gannicus seem to share.
source: Vlastnost, kterou nesdílíte ani ty, ani tvůj muž Gannicus.

errors.contrastive: An property neither you nor your man Gannicus seem to share.
An quality neither you nor your man Gannicus seem to share.

reference: There's only one attribute I value more than experience... and that's initiative.
source: Víš, Kente, je jen jedna vlastnost které si cením více než zkušenosti... a to je iniciativa.

errors.contrastive: There's only one property I value more than experience... and that's initiative.
There's only one quality I value more than experience... and that's initiative.

reference: You just have alpha male attribute usually associated with a solitary existence.
source: Jen, že máš mužskou alfa vlastnost, která se obvykle pojí s osamělou existencí.

errors.contrastive: You just have alpha male property usually associated with a solitary existence.
You just have alpha male quality usually associated with a solitary existence.

reference: This quality, possessed by Sakharov to an unusual degree, made him impervious to fear.
source: Tato vlastnost, kterou byl v neobyčejné míře obdařen Sacharov, ho učinila odolným vůči strachu.

errors.contrastive: This property, possessed by Sakharov to an unusual degree, made him impervious to fear.

reference: - The very quality that gets you in trouble makes you potentially invaluable.

errors.contrastive: - The very property that gets you in trouble makes you potentially invaluable.

reference: Perhaps the flexibility that Obama and Romney have shown is not such a bad quality for a president after all.
source: Flexibilita, kterou projevují Obama s Romneym, možná přece jen není u prezidenta tak špatná vlastnost.

errors.contrastive: Perhaps the flexibility that Obama and Romney have shown is not such a bad property for a president after all.

reference: At least the Chinese have one good quality: they make no secret of their plans.
source: Číně se nedá upřít jedna dobrá vlastnost - netají se svými plány.

errors.contrastive: At least the Chinese have one good property: they make no secret of their plans.

errors.contrastive: Hors d'oeuvres, steak, Roquefort, and coffee.

reference: To beefsteak when you're hungry, whiskey when you're dry, to all the girls you'd ever want and heaven when you die.
source: Na biftek, když máš hlad, whiskey, když máš žízeň. Na všechny holky, který poznáš, a nebe, až umřeš.

source: Bál se, že by z nìj mohl být v pøíštím životì biftek.

reference: And that very night I`m gonna go to Sam Harry`s, order a big steak... and I`m gonna make a list of everybody who tried to fuck us this week!

reference: You know how often I have to drive that bus back and forth... so we can eat steak once a week?

errors.contrastive: You know how often I have to drive that bus back and forth... so we can eat beefsteak once a week?

reference: ♪ Our favourite diet! ♪ Just picture a great big steak Fried, roasted or stewed ♪ Oh, food!

errors.contrastive: ♪ Our favourite diet! ♪ Just picture a great big beefsteak Fried, roasted or stewed ♪ Oh, food!

source: Všichni bojujou za svoje prachy a za svůj biftek.

errors.contrastive: Everyone's fighting for their money and their beefsteak.

reference: 100,000 liras for a steak... the champagne and her tits to paw!
source: - Ještě ne. 100 tisíc za biftek, tři sekty a šáhnutí na kozy!

errors.contrastive: 100,000 liras for a beefsteak... the champagne and her tits to paw!

reference: Sweetie, Why would I have sex with a hamburger When I can make love to a steak? Oh, come on.
source: Miláčku, proč bych měl stát o karbanátek, když mám biftek?

errors.contrastive: Sweetie, Why would I have sex with a hamburger When I can make love to a beefsteak? Oh, come on.

reference: Monday, I'll have roast beef, Tuesday, chicken, Wednesday, steak, Thursday, I plan to be dead, so...
source: V pondělí si dám rostbíf, v úterý kuře, ve středu biftek, na čtvrtek plánuju, že umřu, takže...

reference: I'd like a steak, medium rare, three fried eggs over, French fries, and coffee, please.

errors.contrastive: I'd like a beefsteak, medium rare, three fried eggs over, French fries, and coffee, please.

reference: You bring me a body that smells like burnt steak... you force me to keep it till it rots, and you have the nerve to tell me that I make you sick?
source: Přivezete mi tělo, které páchne jako spálený biftek, nutíte mě, abych ho tu skladoval, dokud nezačne hnít, a pak máte tu drzost mi řict, že se vám ze mě dělá zle!

errors.contrastive: You bring me a body that smells like burnt beefsteak... you force me to keep it till it rots, and you have the nerve to tell me that I make you sick?

reference: How about a steak, medium well, please?
source: Můžete mi donést nějaký biftek ..polokrvavý - Samozřejmě pane. Oh, srdečná díky.

errors.contrastive: How about a beefsteak, medium well, please?

reference: Let's see, for dinner we have steak, potatoes peas.
source: K večeři budeme mít biftek, brambory, hrášek.

errors.contrastive: Let's see, for dinner we have beefsteak, potatoes peas.

reference: Someone please give me a job so I can buy my steak.
source: Dejte mi někdo práci, ať si můžu koupit biftek.

errors.contrastive: Someone please give me a job so I can buy my beefsteak.

reference: How about you eat my cheeseburger, and I'll eat your steak.

errors.contrastive: How about you eat my cheeseburger, and I'll eat your beefsteak.

reference: What do you feel like, fish, chicken, steak?
source: Na co máš chuť? Na rybu, na kuře, na biftek?

errors.contrastive: What do you feel like, fish, chicken, beefsteak?

reference: Steak tastes about the same only there's a lot more trimmings now, Gus.
source: Biftek chutná zhruba stejně, jen je k němu větší příloha, Gusi.

errors.contrastive: beefsteak tastes about the same only there's a lot more trimmings now, Gus.

reference: When we pulled that Klingon ship out of the gas giant,... did you get a look at their sensor array?
source: Když jsme vytáhli tu klingonskou loď z plynového obra, viděl jste jejich senzorové pole?

errors.contrastive: When we pulled that Klingon ship out of the gas giant,... did you get a look at their sensor field?

reference: A few years back, I was called in to reroute an emitter array on Zayra IV.
source: Před několika lety jsem musel přepojit emitorové pole na Zayra IV.

errors.contrastive: A few years back, I was called in to reroute an emitter field on Zayra IV.

reference: With the right field modulation, it might work but we'll need more power to the emitter array.
source: Se správnou modulací by to mohlo fungovat, ale budeme potřebovat hodně energie do pole emitorů. Tak dobře.

errors.contrastive: With the right field modulation, it might work but we'll need more power to the emitter field.

reference: Sir, we have lost external communications array, and we are experiencing power fluctuations throughout the power grid.
source: Pane, ztratili jsme vnější komunikační pole a napětí v celé síti kolísá.

errors.contrastive: Sir, we have lost external communications field, and we are experiencing power fluctuations throughout the power grid.

reference: And I bet the satellite array was down for ten minutes.
source: A vsadím se, že satelitní pole se na 10 minut vyplo.

errors.contrastive: And I bet the satellite field was down for ten minutes.

reference: I ran a diagnostic on all the systems that could shut down our defence array.
source: Udělal jsem diagnostiku všech systémů, které by mohly deaktivovat naše obranné pole.

errors.contrastive: I ran a diagnostic on all the systems that could shut down our defence field.

reference: A 50-terabyte redundant stripe raid-5 array for data processing and storage.
source: 50-terabytové záložní pole chráněné proti útokům na zpracování dat a jejich uložení.

errors.contrastive: A 50-terabyte redundant stripe raid-5 field for data processing and storage.

reference: Now see, what's this here in the schematic, a laser array?
source: Podívej, co je tohle tady v tom schématu? Je to laserové pole?

errors.contrastive: Now see, what's this here in the schematic, a laser field?

reference: Let me guess. The array is over there.
source: Budu hádat, to pole je na druhé straně.

errors.contrastive: Let me guess. The field is over there.

reference: A powerful sensor array prevents anyone from approaching the planet unnoticed.
source: Silné senzorové pole brání komukoli přiblížit se k planetě nepozorován.

errors.contrastive: A powerful sensor field prevents anyone from approaching the planet unnoticed.

reference: But how could this simple circular array of stones have given early man information about the stars?
source: Ale jak by toto prosté kruhové pole z kamenů mohlo dávnému člověku poskytnout nějakou informaci o hvězdách?

errors.contrastive: But how could this simple circular field of stones have given early man information about the stars?

reference: It consists of a receiver that decodes, then transmits to an electrode array,sending a signal to the brain.

errors.contrastive: It consists of a receiver that decodes, then transmits to an electrode field,sending a signal to the brain.

reference: We could reconfigure every sensor array to emit a single burst.
source: Mohli bychom překonfigurovat všechna senzorová pole na lodi k vyslání jediné vlny.

reference: The outcome will then depend on how we array our forces.

errors.contrastive: The outcome will then depend on how we field our forces.

reference: When Talas was working on Enterprise, she disrupted the main sensor array.
source: Když Talas pracovala na Enterprise narušila vaše hlavní senzorové pole.

errors.contrastive: When Talas was working on Enterprise, she disrupted the main sensor field.

reference: Right now, what we have is the Allen telescope array, an innovative new way to build a radio telescope, a large telescope out of small pieces.
source: To, co teď máme, je Allenovo radioteleskopické pole, což je nový způsob stavění radiových teleskopů, velký teleskop z malých kousků.

errors.contrastive: Right now, what we have is the Allen telescope field, an innovative new way to build a radio telescope, a large telescope out of small pieces.

errors.contrastive: The sensor field is burnt out and there's great damage to the central processor.

reference: 15 teams, two weeks and one long-range array.
source: 15 výzkumných týmů, dva týdny a jen jedno pole dálkových senzorů.

errors.contrastive: 15 teams, two weeks and one long-range field.

reference: Well, we can pretty much forget about subspace communications. The main control array was almost completely damaged by the beam.
source: Na subprostorovou komunikaci můžeme zapomenout, hlavní řídicí pole paprsek skoro zničil.

reference: It appears, however, that for a fairly narrow field such as mobile phone chargers, enough has not been done.

errors.contrastive: It appears, however, that for a fairly narrow array such as mobile phone chargers, enough has not been done.

errors.contrastive: Better clear the array! Over near the dog sled!

reference: Or the concept of the force field, which enables the concept of influence?
source: Anebo pojetí silového pole, které umožňuje koncepci vlivu?

errors.contrastive: Or the concept of the force array, which enables the concept of influence?

reference: A working tool user is usually in the direct noise field area of his tool; absorptive treatment of adjacent walls would be more effective for surrounding workers than for the tool user himself.
source: Uživatel pracovního nástroje bývá zpravidla v oblasti přímého zvukového pole nástroje; pohlcující úprava okolních stěn by byla účinnější pro okolní pracovníky než pro samotného uživatele nástroje.

reference: The Union has been advocating the capacity for monitoring types of food 'from field to fork', but it is essential to recognise that there is still a lot to do.

source: písemně. - (PL) Paní předsedající, kvalita je klíčovým slovem celého řetězce potravinářské výroby, doslova z pole až na stůl.

source: Někteří muži z pole cukrové třtiny na nás začali střílet.

errors.contrastive: SOME MEN IN THE CANE array STARTED SHOOTING AT US.

source: Ani muže z FSB ani oligarchii nezajímá hospodářská politika za hranice jejich bezprostředních zájmů. Přenechávají tedy toto pole liberálům, kteří provedli radikální daňovou reformu, pročistili státní rozpočet a díky omezení výměnného obchodu zkapitalizovali hospodářství.

errors.contrastive: Neither the FSB people nor the oligarchs focus on economic policy beyond their immediate interests, abandoning that array to the liberals, who radically reformed taxes, cleaned up the state budget, and monetized the economy by curbing barter.

reference: Also, the new results screen is more complete and easier to fill in, and an audit cannot be closed if this field is not completed.

reference: Such a certification system must cover the entire chain, i.e. from field to vehicle.
