reference: But Gazprom is worried about its upstream capabilities, as is evident from the decision to divert gas from its Shtokman field to Europe rather than liquify it for new North American markets.
source: Gazprom se však obává o své těžební kapacity, jak je patrné z jeho rozhodnutí odklonit plyn ze Štokmanovského pole do Evropy, místo aby ho zkapalňoval pro nové severoamerické trhy.

errors.contrastive: But Gazprom is worried about its upstream capabilities, as is evident from the decision to divert gas from its Shtokman array to Europe rather than liquify it for new North American markets.

reference: The model contains fluorescent graphical elements under UV light and a demetallised diffractive square-shaped foil is placed at the bottom-right part of the photograph field.
source: Dokument obsahuje fluorescenční grafické prvky viditelné pod UV světlem a čtyřhrannou odmetalizovanou difrakční fólii umístěnou na spodní pravé straně pole s fotografií.

errors.contrastive: The model contains fluorescent graphical elements under UV light and a demetallised diffractive square-shaped foil is placed at the bottom-right part of the photograph array.

reference: For example, political decisions determine how much fertiliser we should add to a corn field.
source: Například politická rozhodnutí určují, jaké množství hnojiva bychom měli přidat na kukuřičné pole.

errors.contrastive: For example, political decisions determine how much fertiliser we should add to a corn array.

reference: This man was in an infantry company ticked off to defend that field.
source: Tenhle muž byl v rotě pěchoty, která měla za úkol to pole hlídat.

errors.contrastive: This man was in an infantry company ticked off to defend that array.

reference: NAIROBI – When I met Eunice Wangari at a Nairobi coffee shop recently, I was surprised to hear her on her mobile phone, insistently asking her mother about the progress of a corn field in her home village, hours away from the big city.
source: NAIROBI – Nedávno jsem se v kavárně setkala s Eunice Wangariovou a překvapilo mě, jak se při rozhovoru mobilním telefonem vytrvale vyptává své matky na zrání kukuřičného pole v její rodné vesnici, hodiny cesty vzdálené od velkoměsta, kde jsme seděly.

errors.contrastive: NAIROBI – When I met Eunice Wangari at a Nairobi coffee shop recently, I was surprised to hear her on her mobile phone, insistently asking her mother about the progress of a corn array in her home village, hours away from the big city.

reference: Use this field if you want to select contracts by place of delivery.
source: Toto pole použijte v případě, že chcete zakázky vybírat podle místa provedení.

errors.contrastive: Use this array if you want to select contracts by place of delivery.

reference: This idea, which is pure provocation, was topped by the planned forced introduction of a holiday for Tibetans: 28 March is to be Serfs' Emancipation Day.
source: Tato myšlenka, která je pouhou provokací, byla dovršena plánovaným nuceným zavedením svátku pro Tibeťany: 28. březen má být Dnem osvobození nevolníků.

This idea, which is pure provocation, was topped by the planned forced introduction of a holiday for Tibetans: 28 March is to be Serfs' acquittal Day.

reference: You know, we have to say thank you to these women Who gave us the emancipation of women
source: Měli bychom poděkovat všem, kteří pracovali na osvobození žen.

errors.contrastive: You know, we have to say thank you to these women Who gave us the release of women
You know, we have to say thank you to these women Who gave us the acquittal of women

reference: After emancipation in the nineteenth century, the African-American communities remained impoverished and largely bereft of political rights.
source: Po osvobození v devatenáctém století zůstaly afroamerické komunity ožebračené a z velké části zbavené politických práv.

errors.contrastive: After release in the nineteenth century, the African-American communities remained impoverished and largely bereft of political rights.
After acquittal in the nineteenth century, the African-American communities remained impoverished and largely bereft of political rights.

reference: And so, on New Year's Day, 1863, just two years after the Russians had announced the emancipation of the serfs,
source: A tak na Nový rok 1863, jen dva roky poté, co v Rusku vyhlásili osvobození nevolníků,

And so, on New Year's Day, 1863, just two years after the Russians had announced the acquittal of the serfs,

reference: I signed the Emancipation Proclamation, what, a year and a half before my second election?
source: Podepsal jsem Prohlášení o osvobození otroků rok a půl před mým druhým znovuzvolením.

errors.contrastive: I signed the release Proclamation, what, a year and a half before my second election?
I signed the acquittal Proclamation, what, a year and a half before my second election?

reference: Hear, hear! You signed the Emancipation Proclamation. You've done all that could be done.
source: Podepsal jste Prohlášení o osvobození otroků, učinil vše, co lze očekávat.

errors.contrastive: Hear, hear! You signed the release Proclamation. You've done all that could be done.
Hear, hear! You signed the acquittal Proclamation. You've done all that could be done.

reference: Raines financed your son's emancipation. You wanted him dead for it.
source: Raines finacoval osvobození vašeho syna a vy jste ho za to chtěl mrtvého.

errors.contrastive: Raines financed your son's release. You wanted him dead for it.
Raines financed your son's acquittal. You wanted him dead for it.

reference: Lincoln announced his Emancipation Proclamation - that all the slaves in the rebel states would immediately be free.
source: Lincoln zveřejnil svou Proklamaci o osvobození - všichni otroci v jižanských státech jsou okamžitě svobodní.

errors.contrastive: Lincoln announced his release Proclamation - that all the slaves in the rebel states would immediately be free.
Lincoln announced his acquittal Proclamation - that all the slaves in the rebel states would immediately be free.

reference: We must remember that the lonely struggle taking place in a heavily guarded compound in Rangoon, is part of the much larger struggle, worldwide, for the emancipation, of the human spirit from political tyranny and psychological subjection.
source: Musíme pamatovat, že osamělý boj odehrávající se v těžce hlídané izolaci v Rangúnu, je součást mnohem většího boje, celosvětově, za osvobození lidského ducha od politické tyranie psychologického útlaku a poroby.

errors.contrastive: We must remember that the lonely struggle taking place in a heavily guarded compound in Rangoon, is part of the much larger struggle, worldwide, for the release, of the human spirit from political tyranny and psychological subjection.

We must remember that the lonely struggle taking place in a heavily guarded compound in Rangoon, is part of the much larger struggle, worldwide, for the acquittal, of the human spirit from political tyranny and psychological subjection.

reference: Radical Republican autocrat, ruling by fiat and martial law, affixed his name to his heinous and illicit Emancipation Proclamation promising it would hasten the end of the war, which yet rages on and on.
source: Váš radikální republikánský samovládce, neochvějně vládnoucí díky válečným zákonům a nařízením, spojil své jméno s tím ohavným a nezákonným Prohlášením o osvobození otroků za slibů, že to uspíší konec války, která stále zuří.

errors.contrastive: Radical Republican autocrat, ruling by fiat and martial law, affixed his name to his heinous and illicit release Proclamation promising it would hasten the end of the war, which yet rages on and on.

Radical Republican autocrat, ruling by fiat and martial law, affixed his name to his heinous and illicit acquittal Proclamation promising it would hasten the end of the war, which yet rages on and on.

reference: Noam Shalit, the father of Gilad Shalit, an Israeli soldier who was abducted nearly four years ago, is counting on your full support to obtain Gilad's release.
source: Noam Šalit, otec Gilada Šalita, izraelského vojáka, který byl uneset před téměř čtyřmi roky, počítá s Vaší plnou podporou při Giladově osvobození.

errors.contrastive: Noam Shalit, the father of Gilad Shalit, an Israeli soldier who was abducted nearly four years ago, is counting on your full support to obtain Gilad's emancipation.

reference: Seems like... the release of these nations, the Egyptians, the Syrians, King Herod, to revert to the Jews, I wonder, is it because, as you say, they identify future with past that they have so many prophets?
source: Zdá se jako ... žádné osvobození národů jako Egypt, Sýrie ... Králi Herode, co si myslíš o Židech? Zajímalo by mě, mají tolik proroků, jak říkáš, protože ztotožňují budoucnost s minulostí?

errors.contrastive: Seems like... the emancipation of these nations, the Egyptians, the Syrians, King Herod, to revert to the Jews, I wonder, is it because, as you say, they identify future with past that they have so many prophets?

reference: During a meeting, which I attended, with a delegation from the International Press Institute to obtain the release of the BBC journalist Alan Johnston, abducted in Gaza in March, Abbas explained the PA’s inability and weakness.
source: Během schůzky s delegací z Mezinárodního tiskového institutu, jíž jsem se zúčastnil a jejímž cílem bylo zajistit osvobození reportéra BBC Alana Johnstona uneseného v březnu v Gaze, Abbás vysvětlil neschopnost a slabost palestinské samosprávy.

errors.contrastive: During a meeting, which I attended, with a delegation from the International Press Institute to obtain the emancipation of the BBC journalist Alan Johnston, abducted in Gaza in March, Abbas explained the PA’s inability and weakness.

reference: That release from the obligation of reimbursement is attributable solely to exceptional recognition of the effort nevertheless made by the exporter to contribute to the implementation of Community policy and it is possible only because it was expressly provided for by the legislature.
source: K tomuto osvobození od vrácení zálohy může dojít pouze při mimořádném uznání snahy vývozce přispět k uskutečnění politiky Společenství a je možné pouze v rozsahu, ve kterém je zákonodárce výslovně stanoví.

errors.contrastive: That emancipation from the obligation of reimbursement is attributable solely to exceptional recognition of the effort nevertheless made by the exporter to contribute to the implementation of Community policy and it is possible only because it was expressly provided for by the legislature.

reference: Action point for Europe: bring about the release of Aisha Bibi and the abolition of blasphemy laws in Pakistan.
source: Úkol pro Evropu: dosáhnout osvobození Asie Bibiové a zrušení zákona o rouhání v Pákistánu.

errors.contrastive: Action point for Europe: bring about the emancipation of Aisha Bibi and the abolition of blasphemy laws in Pakistan.

reference: This is being done in the name of trying to release a convicted killer from prison.
source: Bylo to učiněno ve jménu pokusu o osvobození usvědčeného vraha z vězení.

errors.contrastive: This is being done in the name of trying to emancipation a convicted killer from prison.

reference: I warmly welcome the release of the champion of the fight against discrimination against women, Khadijeh Moghaddam.
source: Vřele vítám osvobození významné bojovnice v boji proti diskriminaci žen Khadijeh Moghaddamové.

errors.contrastive: I warmly welcome the emancipation of the champion of the fight against discrimination against women, Khadijeh Moghaddam.

reference: I call upon the soul trapped inside and offer these terms for your release.
source: Propouštím tvou uvězněnou duši a nabízím tuto podmínku za tvé osvobození...

errors.contrastive: I call upon the soul trapped inside and offer these terms for your emancipation.

reference: You know that since my release, I have constantly thought about the fate of my unlucky brothers, those who are today chained to trees like animals, who remained in the jungle when I left.
source: Jak víte, od svého osvobození neustále myslím na osud svých nešťastných bratrů, kteří jsou dnes přivázání řetězy ke stromům jako zvířata, kteří po mém odchodu zůstali v pralese.

errors.contrastive: You know that since my emancipation, I have constantly thought about the fate of my unlucky brothers, those who are today chained to trees like animals, who remained in the jungle when I left.

reference: Welcome it as a release from the torture and torment of this cold life!
source: Vítám to jako osvobození od mučení a trápení tohoto chladného žití!

errors.contrastive: Welcome it as a emancipation from the torture and torment of this cold life!

reference: After your release on 2 June 2008 I had the honour of writing to you on behalf of the European Parliament and welcoming you back to freedom.
source: Po vašem osvobození 2. června 2008 jsem měl tu čest vám napsat jménem Evropského parlamentu a přivítat vás zpět na svobodě.

errors.contrastive: After your emancipation on 2 June 2008 I had the honour of writing to you on behalf of the European Parliament and welcoming you back to freedom.

reference: But then of course, theoretically, it's always possible to get another ostensible acquittal.
source: Ale teoreticky, vždy je tu možnost dosáhnout dalšího zdánlivého osvobození.

errors.contrastive: But then of course, theoretically, it's always possible to get another ostensible emancipation.

reference: The text does not even mention the 13 human rights activists whose immediate release President Pöttering demanded by letter.
source: Text se vůbec nezmiňuje o třinácti aktivistech v oblasti lidských práv, jejichž osvobození požadoval ve svém dopisu pan předseda Pöttering.

errors.contrastive: The text does not even mention the 13 human rights activists whose immediate emancipation President Pöttering demanded by letter.

reference: The Chronicles foretell of the release of the enemy... the ruin of the world, the final days of our age.
source: Letopisy předpověděly osvobození nepřítele, zničení světa a poslední dny našeho věku.

errors.contrastive: The Chronicles foretell of the emancipation of the enemy... the ruin of the world, the final days of our age.

reference: This means that we should recognise the efforts undertaken by the Egyptian authorities for their release and, in particular, support this country in the fight against human trafficking.
source: To znamená, že bychom měli uznat kroky, které podnikají egyptské orgány k jejich osvobození, a zejména podpořit tuto zemi v jejím boji proti obchodování s lidmi.

errors.contrastive: This means that we should recognise the efforts undertaken by the Egyptian authorities for their emancipation and, in particular, support this country in the fight against human trafficking.

reference: We demand the cancellation of martial law and the punishment of those who imposed it, the release of prisoners, and that trade unions to be allowed to operate...
source: Vyľadujeme zruąení výjimečného stavu, potrestání osob, které jsou vinni jeho zavedením, osvobození vězňů a činnosti svobodných odborových svazů.

errors.contrastive: We demand the cancellation of martial law and the punishment of those who imposed it, the emancipation of prisoners, and that trade unions to be allowed to operate...

reference: In my opinion, the onus is very much on us to demand the release of political prisoners and compliance with international human rights agreements before we can move on with the EU -Syria association agreement.
source: Podle mého názoru je především naší povinností žádat osvobození politických vězňů a dodržování mezinárodních smluv o lidských právech, než budeme moci postoupit k dohodě o přidružení mezi EU a Sýrií.

errors.contrastive: In my opinion, the onus is very much on us to demand the emancipation of political prisoners and compliance with international human rights agreements before we can move on with the EU -Syria association agreement.

reference: ¤ I beg for release and hear its sweet call ¤
source: ¤ Žebrám o osvobození a slyším jeho sladké volání ¤

errors.contrastive: ¤ I beg for emancipation and hear its sweet call ¤

reference: What was done for the recent release of the hostages on the Ponant and the Carré d'as shows that we have the means for effective action, provided that the will is there.
source: To, co bylo dokázáno při nedávném osvobození rukojmích z plavidel Ponant a Carré d'as ukazuje, že máme prostředky pro účinná opatření za předpokladu, že je zde vůle je využít.

errors.contrastive: What was done for the recent emancipation of the hostages on the Ponant and the Carré d'as shows that we have the means for effective action, provided that the will is there.

reference: People who seek spiritual contact directly who made that monotheist religions - Judaism, tinismul grow and Islam -- were sometimes instruments of release, other instruments of oppression, who have argued and discarded human spirit.
source: Lidé, kteří vyhledávají přímý dochovní kontakt uznávají, že monoteistická náboženství ať už se jedná o judaismus, křesťanství nebo islám byly kdysi představeny jako cesta k osvobození, se nyní staly nástrojem útlaku, manipulace a potlačení lidského ducha.

errors.contrastive: People who seek spiritual contact directly who made that monotheist religions - Judaism, tinismul grow and Islam -- were sometimes instruments of emancipation, other instruments of oppression, who have argued and discarded human spirit.

reference: Secondly, there will be an increase in intensive livestock farming, with all its adverse effects on the environment, and the third effect concerns methane production, as most of the meat will be beef.
source: Zadruhé, vzroste intenzivní chov zvířat se všemi negativními dopady na životní prostředí a třetí následek se týká tvorby metanu, protože většina masa bude hovězí.

errors.contrastive: Secondly, there will be an increase in intensive livestock farming, with all its adverse effects on the environment, and the third effect concerns methane production, as most of the meat will be bovine.

reference: Like roast beef, string beans, nice baked potato.
source: Stejně jako hovězí pečeně, fazole, příjemné pečené brambory.

errors.contrastive: Like roast bovine, string beans, nice baked potato.

reference: People who naively believed that cows ate grass discovered that beef cattle in feed lots may be fed anything from corn to fish meal, chicken litter (complete with chicken droppings), and slaughterhouse waste.
source: Lidé, kteří naivně věřili, že krávy pasou trávu, náhle zjistili, že ustájený hovězí dobytek lze krmit prakticky čímkoliv od obilí přes krmivo pro ryby a kuřecí podestýlku (včetně kuřecího trusu) až po odpad z jatek.

errors.contrastive: People who naively believed that cows ate grass discovered that bovine cattle in feed lots may be fed anything from corn to fish meal, chicken litter (complete with chicken droppings), and slaughterhouse waste.

reference: Without significant changes in eating habits, those figures are set to increase as living standards rise and more people can afford to eat beef, leading to greater demand for land to grow soya beans to feed the cattle.
source: Nedojde-li k výrazným změnám ve stravovacích návycích, tato čísla ještě vzrostou, neboť životní úroveň se zvyšuje a více lidí si může dovolit jíst hovězí, což vede k větší poptávce po půdě na pěstování sójových bobů jako krmiva pro dobytek.

errors.contrastive: Without significant changes in eating habits, those figures are set to increase as living standards rise and more people can afford to eat bovine, leading to greater demand for land to grow soya beans to feed the cattle.

reference: For the seven other authorised countries, only deboned and matured beef without offal can be exported to the European Union.
source: Dalších sedm zemí smí do Evropské unie dovážet pouze vykostěné a uleželé hovězí bez drobů.

errors.contrastive: For the seven other authorised countries, only deboned and matured bovine without offal can be exported to the European Union.

reference: The beef will seem less tough when she has invoked a blessing upon it.
source: To hovězí se nám bude zdát méně tuhé, když poprosíme o jeho požehnání.

errors.contrastive: The bovine will seem less tough when she has invoked a blessing upon it.

reference: Agriculture — Common organisation of the markets — Beef and veal — Premium for the maintenance of the suckler cow herd
source: Zemědělství – Společná organizace trhů – Hovězí a telecí maso – Prémie na zachování stáda krav bez tržní produkce mléka

errors.contrastive: Agriculture — Common organisation of the markets — bovine and veal — Premium for the maintenance of the suckler cow herd

reference: For example, in the food safety area in the first half of this year, an intensive programme of inspections was carried out, especially regarding beef, fishery products and poultry.
source: Například v oblasti nezávadnosti potravin byl během první poloviny tohoto roku proveden intenzivní program inspekcí zaměřených zejména na hovězí, rybí produkty a drůbež.

errors.contrastive: For example, in the food safety area in the first half of this year, an intensive programme of inspections was carried out, especially regarding bovine, fishery products and poultry.

reference: Forty tons of powder, 100 casks of beef and 1000 bushels of oats, sir.
source: 40 tun střelného prachu, hovězí a 1000 pytlů ovsa, pane.

errors.contrastive: Forty tons of powder, 100 casks of bovine and 1000 bushels of oats, sir.

reference: — support schemes for farmers producing … beef and veal …’
source: – režimy podpor pro zemědělce produkující […] hovězí a telecí maso […]“

errors.contrastive: — support schemes for farmers producing … bovine and veal …’

reference: Member of the Commission. - We work actively to tackle what are very complex vital sanitary barriers, and with this to help market the sale of European products like Irish beef and lamb.
source: členka Komise. - Aktivně se zabýváme velice složitými a zásadními hygienickými překážkami, abychom tak napomohli prodeji evropských výrobků, jako je irské hovězí a jehněčí maso.

errors.contrastive: Member of the Commission. - We work actively to tackle what are very complex vital sanitary barriers, and with this to help market the sale of European products like Irish bovine and lamb.

reference: It's time for you to take your place here, to produce beef for the war.
source: Je čas tady zůstat a vyrábět hovězí pro armádu.

errors.contrastive: It's time for you to take your place here, to produce bovine for the war.

reference: We think about cattle, beef, dairying, sheep, vegetables, wine and so on.
source: Máme na mysli skot, hovězí, mlékárenství, ovce, zeleninu, víno a tak dále.

errors.contrastive: We think about cattle, bovine, dairying, sheep, vegetables, wine and so on.

reference: You and all that over-priced beef you call a team.
source: Vy i všechno to předražený hovězí, kterýmu říkáte mužstvo.

errors.contrastive: You and all that over-priced bovine you call a team.

reference: This issue does merit it and, as one of the last veterans of the first battle of Brazilian beef, it is a pleasure to see so many familiar faces in the Chamber tonight.
source: Toto téma si ho zaslouží a já, jako jeden z posledních veteránů bitvy o brazilské hovězí, jsem potěšen, že dnes vidím ve sněmovně tolik známých tváří.

errors.contrastive: This issue does merit it and, as one of the last veterans of the first battle of Brazilian bovine, it is a pleasure to see so many familiar faces in the Chamber tonight.

reference: There's nothing like roast beef when a man's hungry.
source: Není nic lepšího, když má člověk hlad, než kus hovězí pečeně.

errors.contrastive: There's nothing like roast bovine when a man's hungry.

reference: Before a ban in 2007, 30 000 premises in Brazil exported beef to the EU.
source: Před zákazem z roku 2007 dováželo hovězí do EU 30 000 brazilských provozoven.

errors.contrastive: Before a ban in 2007, 30 000 premises in Brazil exported bovine to the EU.

reference: Will, all this time, this summer... all I've done is put up 22 jars of piccalilli... and I put down a corn beef in a crock.
source: Wille, celá tahle doba, tohle léto... a všechno, co mám je 22 zavařovaček se zeleninou... a dala jsem do spíže hovězí na kukuřici.

errors.contrastive: Will, all this time, this summer... all I've done is put up 22 jars of piccalilli... and I put down a corn bovine in a crock.

reference: Let us say loudly and clearly that, in order to import any kind of product to the EU, irrespective of whether this is shoes or beef, specific standards must be met.
source: Řekněme hlasitě a zřetelně, že pro dovoz jakéhokoliv druhu výrobků do Evropské unie, ať už se jedná o boty nebo hovězí, musí být splněny specifické standardy.

errors.contrastive: Let us say loudly and clearly that, in order to import any kind of product to the EU, irrespective of whether this is shoes or bovine, specific standards must be met.

reference: Well then, tell them we'll get some more beef just soon as possible.
source: Že seženeme nějaké hovězí hned, jak to půjde.

errors.contrastive: Well then, tell them we'll get some more bovine just soon as possible.

reference: These additional requirements include the full identification and registration of all animals in the national Brazilian system for bovine animals.
source: Tyto dodatečné požadavky zahrnují úplnou identifikaci a registraci všech zvířat v brazilském národním systému pro hovězí dobytek.

errors.contrastive: These additional requirements include the full identification and registration of all animals in the national Brazilian system for boeuf animals.
These additional requirements include the full identification and registration of all animals in the national Brazilian system for beef animals.

reference: This is, uh, bovine DNA, with trace amounts of E. coli, salmonella and listeria.
source: Toto je hovězí DNA, se stopovým množstvím E. coli, Salmonella a Listeria.

errors.contrastive: This is, uh, boeuf DNA, with trace amounts of E. coli, salmonella and listeria.
This is, uh, beef DNA, with trace amounts of E. coli, salmonella and listeria.

reference: Bovine animals whose meat is destined for the EU market must have remained within an authorised territory for at least a 90-day residency period.
source: Hovězí dobytek, jehož maso je určeno pro trh EU, musí zůstat v oblasti, která má oprávnění jej dovážet, po dobu minimálně 90 dnů.

errors.contrastive: boeuf animals whose meat is destined for the EU market must have remained within an authorised territory for at least a 90-day residency period.
beef animals whose meat is destined for the EU market must have remained within an authorised territory for at least a 90-day residency period.

reference: But from that disaster rose Central City's greatest hero, cattle rancher Bobby "Bovine" Mcfeely.
source: Ale od té katastrofy růže Central City N's největším hrdinou, Chovatel dobytka Bobby "hovězí" Mcfeely.

errors.contrastive: But from that disaster rose Central City's greatest hero, cattle rancher Bobby "boeuf" Mcfeely.
But from that disaster rose Central City's greatest hero, cattle rancher Bobby "beef" Mcfeely.

reference: At the slaughterhouse, the bovine animals cannot come into contact with other animals that do not comply with the above conditions and have to undergo an ante-mortem health inspection and show no clinical signs of disease 24 hours prior to slaughter.
source: Na jatkách nesmí hovězí dobytek přijít do kontaktu s jinými zvířaty, která nesplňují výše uvedené podmínky, a před poražením musí podstoupit zdravotní prohlídku, která musí prokázat, že 24 hodin před porážkou zvíře nemá žádné klinické známky nemoci.

errors.contrastive: At the slaughterhouse, the boeuf animals cannot come into contact with other animals that do not comply with the above conditions and have to undergo an ante-mortem health inspection and show no clinical signs of disease 24 hours prior to slaughter.

At the slaughterhouse, the beef animals cannot come into contact with other animals that do not comply with the above conditions and have to undergo an ante-mortem health inspection and show no clinical signs of disease 24 hours prior to slaughter.

reference: You know, my rectal electro-ejaculator is rated for bovine use only, but I could let you rent it.
source: Můj rektální elektroejakulátor je určen jen pro hovězí účely, ale můžu ti ho půjčit.

errors.contrastive: You know, my rectal electro-ejaculator is rated for boeuf use only, but I could let you rent it.
You know, my rectal electro-ejaculator is rated for beef use only, but I could let you rent it.

reference: However, it should equally apply to chlorinated chicken imported from the United States and to bovine growth hormones in milk.
source: Měla by se však uplatňovat i na chlorované kuřecí dovážené ze Spojených států a hovězí růstové hormony v mléku.

errors.contrastive: However, it should equally apply to chlorinated chicken imported from the United States and to boeuf growth hormones in milk.
However, it should equally apply to chlorinated chicken imported from the United States and to beef growth hormones in milk.

reference: So today we are going to replace our diseased pig's valve with one made of bovine tissue.
source: Dnes nahradíme nemocnou chlopeň jinou, vyrobenou z hovězí tkáně.

errors.contrastive: So today we are going to replace our diseased pig's valve with one made of boeuf tissue.
So today we are going to replace our diseased pig's valve with one made of beef tissue.

reference: As a strictly precautionary measure, all farms were blocked; their commercial activities suspended; there were laying hen, fattening poultry, goose, pig, dairy cattle, bovine and rabbit farms.
source: V rámci přísně obezřetnostních opatření byly všechny farmy zablokovány; jejich obchodní aktivity pozastaveny; jednalo se o slepičí farmy, výkrmny drůbeže, husí a prasečí farmy, chovatele mléčného skotu, hovězí a králičí farmy.

errors.contrastive: As a strictly precautionary measure, all farms were blocked; their commercial activities suspended; there were laying hen, fattening poultry, goose, pig, dairy cattle, boeuf and rabbit farms.
As a strictly precautionary measure, all farms were blocked; their commercial activities suspended; there were laying hen, fattening poultry, goose, pig, dairy cattle, beef and rabbit farms.

reference: SEE FANNY THE FAT LADY, OVER 450 POUNDS OF BOVINE BEAUTY.
source: Uvidíte Fanny, tlustou dámu, více než 225 kilo hovězí krásy.

errors.contrastive: SEE FANNY THE FAT LADY, OVER 450 POUNDS OF boeuf BEAUTY.
SEE FANNY THE FAT LADY, OVER 450 POUNDS OF beef BEAUTY.

reference: And then I realized Dr. Burke can transplant a bovine mitral valve instead of the pig.
source: A tak může zrealizovat Dr. Burke transplantaci hovězí chlopně místo vepřové.

errors.contrastive: And then I realized Dr. Burke can transplant a boeuf mitral valve instead of the pig.
And then I realized Dr. Burke can transplant a beef mitral valve instead of the pig.

reference: Those hairs you found on the scaffold: not human, bovine.
source: Ty chlupy, co jsi našel na lešení nejsou lidské, ale hovězí.

errors.contrastive: Those hairs you found on the scaffold: not human, boeuf.
Those hairs you found on the scaffold: not human, beef.

reference: You were the only hotel guest who had both a bovine facial and vip access to the rooftop floor.
source: Byla jste jediný hotelový host, který měl hovězí zábal a VIP vstup na střechu hotelu.

errors.contrastive: You were the only hotel guest who had both a boeuf facial and vip access to the rooftop floor.
You were the only hotel guest who had both a beef facial and vip access to the rooftop floor.

reference: What a wonderful surprise... to find a fellow bovine joining the ranks.
source: Co překvapení wondeuful... najít kolegu hovězí připojovat se k pozicím.

errors.contrastive: What a wonderful surprise... to find a fellow boeuf joining the ranks.
What a wonderful surprise... to find a fellow beef joining the ranks.

reference: Uh, Sara found more plaster and bovine hair in Crenshaw's car.
source: Sara našla další omítku a hovězí chlupy v autě Crenshawa.

errors.contrastive: Uh, Sara found more plaster and boeuf hair in Crenshaw's car.
Uh, Sara found more plaster and beef hair in Crenshaw's car.

reference: You have lots of vitamins, minerals, all kinds of proteins, including a little something I like to call bovine serum albumin which you get from eating the animals mentioned.
source: Máte spoustu vitamínů, minerálů. Všechny druhy bílkovin. Dokonce i maličkost, kterou rád nazývám hovězí sérum albumin.

errors.contrastive: You have lots of vitamins, minerals, all kinds of proteins, including a little something I like to call boeuf serum albumin which you get from eating the animals mentioned.
You have lots of vitamins, minerals, all kinds of proteins, including a little something I like to call beef serum albumin which you get from eating the animals mentioned.

reference: So you'll never guess what bovine stem cells are used for these days.
source: To bys nevěřil,na co se ty hovězí buňky používají.

errors.contrastive: So you'll never guess what boeuf stem cells are used for these days.
So you'll never guess what beef stem cells are used for these days.

reference: A bovine ain't been born that can resist my charms.
source: Hovězí nebyl narozen to může bránit se mým kouzlům.

errors.contrastive: A boeuf ain't been born that can resist my charms.
A beef ain't been born that can resist my charms.

reference: I ended up getting a bovine valve which is a cow valve.
source: Já skončil s hovězí chlopní, což je chlopeň z krávy.

errors.contrastive: I ended up getting a boeuf valve which is a cow valve.
I ended up getting a beef valve which is a cow valve.

reference: Enjoy you the frozen, sweetened bovine secretion... as we take this short flight to Happy Humanstown.
source: Užijte si vaši mražené, slazené hovězí výměšky, při vašem krátkém letu do Šťastného Městolidu.

errors.contrastive: Enjoy you the frozen, sweetened boeuf secretion... as we take this short flight to Happy Humanstown.
Enjoy you the frozen, sweetened beef secretion... as we take this short flight to Happy Humanstown.

reference: But the canal was only the first step toward the promised land.
source: Ale kanál byl jen prvním krokem na cestě k zaslíbené zemi.

errors.contrastive: But the channel was only the first step toward the promised land.

reference: A bit further, the Vistula Canal separates the inland port from the northern port, built in the early 1970s.

errors.contrastive: A bit further, the Vistula channel separates the inland port from the northern port, built in the early 1970s.

reference: 'I came to a hump-backed bridge over a canal.
source: "Přiběhla jsem k vypoulenému mostu přes kanál."

errors.contrastive: 'I came to a hump-backed bridge over a channel.

reference: Port activity at Gdansk is divided between the inland port on the Vistula Canal and the northern port, seen here, which opens directly onto the Gulf of Gdansk.
source: Přístavní aktivita se v Gdaňsku dělí mezi vnitřní přístav, kanál Visly a severní přístav (viz foto), který je přímo otevřený do Gdaňského zálivu.

errors.contrastive: Port activity at Gdansk is divided between the inland port on the Vistula channel and the northern port, seen here, which opens directly onto the Gulf of Gdansk.

reference: Albert Canal, Belgium, dropped into Crete, '41...
source: Albertův kanál v Belgii, potom vysazen na Krétě.

errors.contrastive: Albert channel, Belgium, dropped into Crete, '41...

reference: The PDA screen can also show old photographs, such as the visit of King Boudewijn to the Maas oods of 1984, the earlier swing bridges over the South Willems canal, and even Stokkem as a carnival town in full celebration.
source: Na obrazovce kapesního počítače (PDA) se též objevují staré fotografie, na nichž uvidíme například návštěvu krále Boudewijna, který se přijel podívat na záplavy na řece Maas v roce 1984, staré padací mosty přes jižní Willemův kanál nebo karneval ve Stokkemu.

errors.contrastive: The PDA screen can also show old photographs, such as the visit of King Boudewijn to the Maas oods of 1984, the earlier swing bridges over the South Willems channel, and even Stokkem as a carnival town in full celebration.

reference: The rumors the Aguaruna spread who were against us... uh, for example, said that we would cut - we would dig a canal between the two river systems - between Rio Marañón and further up between, uh...
source: Aquarunové, kteří byli proti nám, šířili různé pomluvy jako třeba že řeky propojíme, že mezi oběma řekami vykopeme kanál mezi Rio Marańón a tam dál, jak se jmenuje...

errors.contrastive: The rumors the Aguaruna spread who were against us... uh, for example, said that we would cut - we would dig a channel between the two river systems - between Rio Marañón and further up between, uh...

reference: But the Suez Canal was a very great and splendid undertaking.
source: Ale Suezký kanál je skvělý, přímo vynikající nápad.

errors.contrastive: But the Suez channel was a very great and splendid undertaking.

reference: I want you to amend that report to state that the canal will be of international value.
source: Chci, abyste oznámil, že kanál bude mít mezinárodní hodnotu.

errors.contrastive: I want you to amend that report to state that the channel will be of international value.

reference: The canal - perfect venue for the emotional bump-off 'cos if I start screaming, there's no-one to hear.
source: Vodní kanál - - perfektní místo pro citovou popravu. Protože když začnu řvát, nikdo mě neuslyší.

errors.contrastive: The channel - perfect venue for the emotional bump-off 'cos if I start screaming, there's no-one to hear.

reference: Acting on a hunch, I spent several months in Buenos Aires as Blind Pew, returning through the Panama Canal as Ratty, in Toad of Toad Hall.
source: Veden tušením, strávil jsem několik měsíců v Buenos Aires jako slepý Kostelnička, Panamský kanál jsem přeplul jako krysa Šušara z Žabákových dobrodružství.

errors.contrastive: Acting on a hunch, I spent several months in Buenos Aires as Blind Pew, returning through the Panama channel as Ratty, in Toad of Toad Hall.

reference: "Have you seen the canals?" "I am a canal."
source: "Viděl jsi kanály?" "Já jsem kanál."

errors.contrastive: "Have you seen the canals?" "I am a channel."

reference: Canal number 3329 on newberry road between 103rd and fountain.
source: Yeah. Kanál číslo 3329 na Newberry road mezi 103-tí a fontánou.

errors.contrastive: channel number 3329 on newberry road between 103rd and fountain.

reference: The first canal in Britain was built by the Romans: ...the Fosse Dyke in Lincoln.
source: První umělý kanál v Británii postavili Římané v Lincolnu.

errors.contrastive: The first channel in Britain was built by the Romans: ...the Fosse Dyke in Lincoln.

reference: The Erie Canal left the Hudson above Albany and carried clear across to the Great Lakes.
source: Erijský kanál se odpojil z Hudsonu nad Albany a směřoval rovnou k Velkým jezerům.

errors.contrastive: The Erie channel left the Hudson above Albany and carried clear across to the Great Lakes.

reference: All right, so, uh, we find out what canal, we'll be able to figure out where our suspect was prior to the ransom handoff.
source: Správně, takže, uh, našli jsme, který kanál, budeme shopní představit si, kde náš podezřelýpravděpodobně drží uneseného.

errors.contrastive: All right, so, uh, we find out what channel, we'll be able to figure out where our suspect was prior to the ransom handoff.

reference: The Yangtze was part of a vast waterway known as the Grand Canal that linked Hangzhou with Beijing 1,000 miles to the north.
source: Yangtze byla součástí rozsáhlé vodní cesty známé jako Velký Kanál, který spojoval Hangzhou s Pekingem 1.000 mil na sever.

errors.contrastive: The Yangtze was part of a vast waterway known as the Grand channel that linked Hangzhou with Beijing 1,000 miles to the north.

reference: It takes about ten minutes to cross the canal if you are lucky enough to find yourself a boat.
source: Jenom deset minut trvá dostat se přes kanál, pokud budeš mít štěstí a seženeš člun.

errors.contrastive: It takes about ten minutes to cross the channel if you are lucky enough to find yourself a boat.

reference: Can't make her understand that the canal... which she and Udin bathe in and drink from carries disease.
source: Nemohl jsme ji přinutit, pochopit že kanál... ve kterém se ona a Udin koupají a pijí z něj přináší nemoci.

errors.contrastive: Can't make her understand that the channel... which she and Udin bathe in and drink from carries disease.

reference: Phileas Fogg went through it Without stopping by the Suez Canal.
source: Phileas Fogg projel Egyptem přes Suezský Kanál bez zastavení.

errors.contrastive: Phileas Fogg went through it Without stopping by the Suez channel.

reference: Mr President, last month, the Catalan Public Television channel (TV3) was shut down in Valencia by the regional Valencian government.
source: Pane předsedající, minulý měsíc regionální valencijská vláda zrušila katalánský veřejný televizní kanál (TV3) ve Valencii.

errors.contrastive: Mr President, last month, the Catalan Public Television canal (TV3) was shut down in Valencia by the regional Valencian government.

reference: - Emergency channel D. - l can't break through their force field.
source: - Nouzový kanál D. - Nemohu prorazit jejich silové pole.

errors.contrastive: - Emergency canal D. - l can't break through their force field.

reference: The credit channel also is not working properly, as banks have hoarded most of the extra liquidity from QE, creating excess reserves rather than increasing lending.
source: Ani úvěrový kanál řádně nefunguje, neboť banky většinu přílivu likvidity z QE hromadí a vytvářejí si raději nadměrné rezervy, než aby rozšířily půjčování.

errors.contrastive: The credit canal also is not working properly, as banks have hoarded most of the extra liquidity from QE, creating excess reserves rather than increasing lending.

reference: Finally on 9 March, Mr DIAMANDOUROS gave an interview to Mr Nikos ROUSSIS of Canali Voulis (Parliament Channel) Television of Greece.
source: Dne 9. b%ezna poskytl nakonec pan DIAMANDOUROS rozhovor Nikosovi ROUSSISOVI %ecké televizní stanice Canali Voulis (parlamentní kanál).

errors.contrastive: Finally on 9 March, Mr DIAMANDOUROS gave an interview to Mr Nikos ROUSSIS of Canali Voulis (Parliament canal) Television of Greece.

reference: Extrajudicial proceedings provide a valuable channel for citizens, and fortunately we have SOLVIT for cases concerning the internal market, a resource that citizens should make use of.
source: Mimosoudní řízení poskytují občanům cenný kanál a my naštěstí máme pro řešení případů týkajících se vnitřního trhu SOLVIT, zdroj, který by občané měli využívat.

errors.contrastive: Extrajudicial proceedings provide a valuable canal for citizens, and fortunately we have SOLVIT for cases concerning the internal market, a resource that citizens should make use of.

reference: We found a fisherman who led us to Scotland by the channel.
source: Našli jsme muže s rybářskou lodí, který nás vzal přes kanál do Skotska.

errors.contrastive: We found a fisherman who led us to Scotland by the canal.

reference: Turn on any TV channel and there they are: glamorous, decent, and smart.
source: Zapněte si kterýkoli televizní kanál a tu je máte: oslniví, slušní a pohotoví.

errors.contrastive: Turn on any TV canal and there they are: glamorous, decent, and smart.

reference: Network ‘Open Channel’ Working with media in the village by Anja S c h w ep p e - K ö n i g E - m a i l : Anja.Schweppe-Koenig@medienwerkstatt.org
source: Síť „Otevřený kanál“: práce s médii v obci

errors.contrastive: Network ‘Open canal’ Working with media in the village by Anja S c h w ep p e - K ö n i g E - m a i l : Anja.Schweppe-Koenig@medienwerkstatt.org

reference: Cross-border cooperation between Member States' police forces has a privileged channel in Europol.
source: Výsadní kanál pro mezinárodní spolupráci mezi policejními sbory členských států poskytuje Europol.

errors.contrastive: Cross-border cooperation between Member States' police forces has a privileged canal in Europol.

reference: Two light buoys mean a safe channel between the world over.
source: Dvě světelné bóje značí bezpečný kanál ve světě okolo nás.

errors.contrastive: Two light buoys mean a safe canal between the world over.

reference: This channel is ignored for one good reason: exchange-rate policies are fundamentally of the beggar-thy-neighbor variety.
source: Tento kanál se opomíjí z jednoho dobrého důvodu: politiky měnových kurzů ve své podstatě ožebračují ostatní země.

errors.contrastive: This canal is ignored for one good reason: exchange-rate policies are fundamentally of the beggar-thy-neighbor variety.

reference: First,there is the supply-side channel, because oil is an important input factor in the productionprocess.
source: Zaprvé existuje kanál na straně nabídky, jelikož ropa je významným vstupním faktorem výrobníhoprocesu.

errors.contrastive: First,there is the supply-side canal, because oil is an important input factor in the productionprocess.

reference: In addition, my party and the other members of the PPE-DE Group regard human rights as one of the cornerstones of our foreign policy activities and a key channel for expressing our views at global level.
source: Moje strana a další členové skupiny PPE-DE kromě toho považují lidská práva za jeden ze základů našich činností v oblasti zahraniční politiky a za klíčový kanál pro vyjádření našich stanovisek na celosvětové úrovni.

errors.contrastive: In addition, my party and the other members of the PPE-DE Group regard human rights as one of the cornerstones of our foreign policy activities and a key canal for expressing our views at global level.

reference: The Earl of Richmond. Crossed the Channel with a full army and joined Stanley at Bosworth.
source: Hrabě z Richmondu překročil kanál s celou armádou a připojil se ke Stanleyovi u Bosworthu.

errors.contrastive: The Earl of Richmond. Crossed the canal with a full army and joined Stanley at Bosworth.

reference: The Saudi-owned satellite news channel Al Arabiya has also reported the hacking of its Twitter feed by the “Electronic Syrian Army,” a shadowy group most likely comprised of free-lance operatives with the direct or indirect support of the Syrian government.
source: Rovněž saúdský satelitní zpravodajský kanál Al-Arabíja oznámil, že jeho účet na Twitteru napadla „Elektronická syrská armáda“ – stínová skupina, kterou s největší pravděpodobností tvoří nezávislí operativci těšící se přímé či nepřímé podpoře syrské vlády.

errors.contrastive: The Saudi-owned satellite news canal Al Arabiya has also reported the hacking of its Twitter feed by the “Electronic Syrian Army,” a shadowy group most likely comprised of free-lance operatives with the direct or indirect support of the Syrian government.

reference: Expansion works involve expanding the swinging circle, widening the entry channel and laying out a new quay.
source: Rozšíření znamená zvětšit otočný kruh, rozšířit vstupní kanál a připravit návrh nového mola.

errors.contrastive: Expansion works involve expanding the swinging circle, widening the entry canal and laying out a new quay.

reference: A body whose so-called public television channel quotes the 'Prophet' inciting the murder of Jews should receive not a cent - not one single cent - more in development funds.
source: Orgán, jehož takzvaný veřejný televizní kanál citací "Proroka" podněcuje k vraždění Židů, by již neměl dostat ani haléř - ani jediný haléř - z rozvojových fondů.

errors.contrastive: A body whose so-called public television canal quotes the 'Prophet' inciting the murder of Jews should receive not a cent - not one single cent - more in development funds.

reference: The admiral planned to create an underground channel between Huang Ho and the Yangtze kiang.
source: Admirál si přál, aby podzemní kanál spojil řeky Huang-he a Jang-c'-ťiang.

errors.contrastive: The admiral planned to create an underground canal between Huang Ho and the Yangtze kiang.

reference: First, there is the open channel, which gives a larger share of votes to the nations contributing more to organizations such as the IMF and the World Bank.
source: Za prvé je to otevřený kanál, který zemím, jež do organizací jako MMF nebo Světová banka přispívají větším dílem, dává větší podíl hlasů.

errors.contrastive: First, there is the open canal, which gives a larger share of votes to the nations contributing more to organizations such as the IMF and the World Bank.

reference: Representatives can provide an effective channel of communication with the workforce and assist workers in understanding and using health and safety information.
source: Zástupci pracovníků mohou představovat účinný komunikační kanál mezi oběma stranami a pomoci pracovníkům pochopit informace týkající se jejich zdraví a bezpečnosti a postupovat podle nich.

errors.contrastive: Representatives can provide an effective canal of communication with the workforce and assist workers in understanding and using health and safety information.

reference: A pause in the negotiations on enhancing relations with Israel is called for in view of such excessive military action.
source: S ohledem na tak rozsáhlou vojenskou akci je požadována pauza ve vyjednáváních o posílení vztahů s Izraelem.

errors.contrastive: A rest in the negotiations on enhancing relations with Israel is called for in view of such excessive military action.

reference: There's a pause, yes, but that's all.
source: Je to pauza, ano, ale to je vše.

errors.contrastive: There's a rest, yes, but that's all.

reference: When nothing is moving in the right direction, the most appropriate step might be to press the pause button.
source: Když se nic neposouvá správným směrem, nejvhodnějším krokem může být stisknout tlačítko „pauza“.

errors.contrastive: When nothing is moving in the right direction, the most appropriate step might be to press the rest button.

reference: And now, the pause is too long to ignore.
source: A teď, ta pauza už byla moc dlouhá než abys ji jen přešel.

errors.contrastive: And now, the rest is too long to ignore.

reference: After any such media-stoked scandal, there should be a pause to allow better norms to take root.
source: Po každém takovém mediálně rozvířeném skandálu by měla následovat pauza, aby mohly zakořenit nové normy.

errors.contrastive: After any such media-stoked scandal, there should be a rest to allow better norms to take root.

reference: AND WHAT YOU HEARD WAS A PAUSE. LIKE THERE AGAIN.
source: a to, co jste nezaslechli, byla pauza... jako opět nyní.

errors.contrastive: AND WHAT YOU HEARD WAS A rest. LIKE THERE AGAIN.

reference: And there's this really uncomfortable pause, and Sajak was like, "No..."
source: A pak fakt nepříjemná pauza, a Sajak na to, "Ne.

errors.contrastive: And there's this really uncomfortable rest, and Sajak was like, "No..."

reference: As the morale officer on this ship, I insist that a break in the workload is both healthy and necessary.
source: Jako důstojník přes morálku na této lodi trvám na tom, že krátká pauza během práce je zdravá a nezbytná.

errors.contrastive: As the morale officer on this ship, I insist that a rest in the workload is both healthy and necessary.

reference: We are going to pause to set a little light, and then we are going to rush again right away.
source: Pauza kvůli instalaci nového světla. Pak budeme pokračovat.

errors.contrastive: We are going to rest to set a little light, and then we are going to rush again right away.

reference: To facilitate the broadcast media, we will precede each announcement with a 5 secs. tone, followed by a 1 sec. pause.
source: Každé ohlášení předchází pětisekundový signál stálý, přerušovaný 1- sekundová pauza.

errors.contrastive: To facilitate the broadcast media, we will precede each announcement with a 5 secs. tone, followed by a 1 sec. rest.

reference: The slight pause is for the stewards Who are repairing the sound of music.
source: Menší pauza je kvůli pořadatelům, kteří musí opravit překážku "zvuky hudby".

errors.contrastive: The slight rest is for the stewards Who are repairing the sound of music.

reference: But when I put the kiss in at the end of Thelma and Louise... that gave people pause.
source: Když dávám na konci filmu "Thelma a Louisa" polibek... vzniká pro diváky pauza.

errors.contrastive: But when I put the kiss in at the end of Thelma and Louise... that gave people rest.

reference: And at the end of every exhale... there was this pause, and I thought, "That's it. It's over."
source: A na konci každého výdechu... nastala pauza, a ja myslela, "To je ono.

errors.contrastive: And at the end of every exhale... there was this rest, and I thought, "That's it. It's over."

reference: - You sound like you could use a break.
source: - Vypadáš, jako by se ti hodila pauza.

errors.contrastive: - You sound like you could use a rest.

reference: Chase, your break's been over for ten minutes.
source: Chaseová. Co to děláte? Vaše pauza skončila před deseti minutama.

errors.contrastive: Chase, your rest's been over for ten minutes.

reference: This pause is just expanding, and expanding, like this out of control thing.
source: Ta pauza se prostě zvětšovala a zvětšovala. totálně se mi vymikala z rukou.

errors.contrastive: This rest is just expanding, and expanding, like this out of control thing.

reference: Another 1 0 minutes, then we break for lunch.
source: Ještě deset minut, pak je pauza na oběd.

errors.contrastive: Another 1 0 minutes, then we rest for lunch.

reference: It's not a break, Alex, if you're all the way across the continent.
source: To není pauza, Alex, když budeš na druhém konci světadílu.

errors.contrastive: It's not a rest, Alex, if you're all the way across the continent.

reference: There will be a 20 minute recess before proceeding with this inquiry.
source: Teď bude k dispozici dvacetiminutová pauza před pokračováním tohoto vyšetřování.

errors.contrastive: There will be a 20 minute rest before proceeding with this inquiry.

reference: I hope that means they're takin' a break.
source: Doufám, že to znamená, že přijde pauza..

errors.contrastive: I hope that means they're takin' a rest.

reference: Always on time. Ten-minute rest stop, right back on the road.
source: Vždycky na čas. Deset minut pauza a jede dál.

errors.contrastive: Always on time. Ten-minute recess stop, right back on the road.
Always on time. Ten-minute break stop, right back on the road.
Always on time. Ten-minute pause stop, right back on the road.

reference: There's a great pier a couple of hours from here.
source: Kde je skvělé molo jen pár hodin od tud.

errors.contrastive: There's a great catwalk a couple of hours from here.
There's a great runway a couple of hours from here.

reference: That morning, Sheng and I rushed to the pier
source: To ráno, Sheng a já, jsme se hnali na molo.

errors.contrastive: That morning, Sheng and I rushed to the catwalk
That morning, Sheng and I rushed to the runway

reference: Suppose Rhoda did follow the Daigle child onto the wharf.
source: Dejme tomu, že Rhoda šla za Daiglem na molo.

errors.contrastive: Suppose Rhoda did follow the Daigle child onto the catwalk.
Suppose Rhoda did follow the Daigle child onto the runway.

reference: Go to Pier 23 in Miami. Pick up crate number 1444, and deliver its contents... to the Republican National Convention in Dallas in nine days.
source: Jdi na molo 12 v Miami, vyzvedni bednu 1444, a převez to co v ní je... na Národní zasedání Republikánů v Dallasu za devíti dnů.

errors.contrastive: Go to catwalk 23 in Miami. Pick up crate number 1444, and deliver its contents... to the Republican National Convention in Dallas in nine days.
Go to runway 23 in Miami. Pick up crate number 1444, and deliver its contents... to the Republican National Convention in Dallas in nine days.

reference: Okay, Miguel, we gotta move fast. -On three, we jump out and head for the dock. -Good.
source: Dobrá, Migueli, až napočítám do tří, vyskočíme na molo.

errors.contrastive: Okay, Miguel, we gotta move fast. -On three, we jump out and head for the catwalk. -Good.
Okay, Miguel, we gotta move fast. -On three, we jump out and head for the runway. -Good.

reference: And somehow that meant that I wanted armed sea lions to patrol the wharf.
source: A nějak z toho vyznělo, že jsem chtěla, aby ozbrojení lachtani hlídali molo.

errors.contrastive: And somehow that meant that I wanted armed sea lions to patrol the catwalk.
And somehow that meant that I wanted armed sea lions to patrol the runway.

reference: Pier 16, exactly my thought, exactly my thought.
source: Molo 16! Já to věděl! Výborně, Kirby!

errors.contrastive: catwalk 16, exactly my thought, exactly my thought.
runway 16, exactly my thought, exactly my thought.

source: Přísahal bych, že na lístku stálo molo 39.

errors.contrastive: I could've sworn the ticket said catwalk 39.
I could've sworn the ticket said runway 39.

reference: The pier became so quiet, we could hear each other breathe.
source: Molo ztichlo, mohli jsme slyšet dech každého z nás.

errors.contrastive: The catwalk became so quiet, we could hear each other breathe.
The runway became so quiet, we could hear each other breathe.

reference: You can't even go to the end of that dock, because you're afraid to walk in her footsteps.
source: Nedokážeš dojít ani na to molo, protože se bojíš,že by si šla v jejích šlépějích.

errors.contrastive: You can't even go to the end of that catwalk, because you're afraid to walk in her footsteps.
You can't even go to the end of that runway, because you're afraid to walk in her footsteps.

reference: Well... we all went down to the pier at dawn to watch it arrive.
source: No, všichni jsme šli za svítání na molo a dívali se jak přijíždí.

errors.contrastive: Well... we all went down to the catwalk at dawn to watch it arrive.
Well... we all went down to the runway at dawn to watch it arrive.

reference: I hung around cinemas, went on the pier.
source: Čekal jsem u kin, šel jsem na molo.

errors.contrastive: I hung around cinemas, went on the catwalk.
I hung around cinemas, went on the runway.

reference: He tried to pull himself back on the wharf... after he fell in the water.
source: Snažil se vylézt zpátky na molo... potom, co spadl do vody.

errors.contrastive: He tried to pull himself back on the catwalk... after he fell in the water.
He tried to pull himself back on the runway... after he fell in the water.

reference: Now remember, everybody. You are not to go out on that pier... or near the boathouse!
source: Nebudete chodit na molo... a k tomu domku!

errors.contrastive: Now remember, everybody. You are not to go out on that catwalk... or near the boathouse!

reference: The samurai class, like a heavy log, will soon sink from its own weight.
source: Samurajská třída, jako těžká kláda, brzy se potopí svou vlastní vahou.

errors.contrastive: The samurai avenue, like a heavy log, will soon sink from its own weight.

reference: India has an emerging middle class of several hundred million, and English is an official language, spoken by 50-100 million people.
source: V Indii vzniká střední třída několika set milionů lidí a jedním z oficiálních jazyků je angličtina, jíž hovoří 50-100 milionů osob.

errors.contrastive: India has an emerging middle avenue of several hundred million, and English is an official language, spoken by 50-100 million people.

reference: — Class 41: ‘Educational, formative and entertainment services; cinema and recording studies, rent of videos, concourse (scattering), installation of televisions and radiophones, production of films’.
source: – třída 41: „Služby výchovy, vzdělávání a zábavy; kulturní aktivity; filmová a nahrávací studia; pronájem videofilmů; soutěže (oddech a rekreace); výroba rozhlasových a televizních programů“.

errors.contrastive: — avenue 41: ‘Educational, formative and entertainment services; cinema and recording studies, rent of videos, concourse (scattering), installation of televisions and radiophones, production of films’.

reference: As part of the process of democratisation, it is important for the political class in Nicaragua to take the steps mentioned in the Resolution, which I support.
source: Jako součást procesu demokratizace je důležité, aby politická třída v Nikaragui přijala opatření uvedená v usnesení, které podporuji.

errors.contrastive: As part of the process of democratisation, it is important for the political avenue in Nicaragua to take the steps mentioned in the Resolution, which I support.

reference: Actually, I was thinking of becoming a bum doctor, but the proctology class was full.

errors.contrastive: Actually, I was thinking of becoming a bum doctor, but the proctology avenue was full.

reference: That middle class was beginning to play a more significant role in shaping domestic and international Russian policy under Dmitri Medvedev.

errors.contrastive: That middle avenue was beginning to play a more significant role in shaping domestic and international Russian policy under Dmitri Medvedev.

reference: — ‘Leather and imitations of leather, and goods made of these materials and not included in other classes; animal skins; trunks and travelling bags; umbrellas, parasols and walking sticks; whips, harness and saddlery’ (Class 18);

reference: Europeans may be more cheerful, believing that the Chinese market will open not only for European engineering products and machine tools to equip the new workshop of the world, but also for luxury goods and even the tourism demanded by a new and affluent Chinese middle class.
source: Evropané mohou být veselejší, neboť věří, že čínský trh se otevře nejen pro evropské strojírenské výrobky a obráběcí stroje, jimiž se bude chtít nová dílna světa vybavit, ale také pro luxusní zboží, a dokonce turistiku, jež nová, movitá čínská střední třída poptává.

errors.contrastive: Europeans may be more cheerful, believing that the Chinese market will open not only for European engineering products and machine tools to equip the new workshop of the world, but also for luxury goods and even the tourism demanded by a new and affluent Chinese middle avenue.

errors.contrastive: — avenue 5: ‘Scented air fresheners products’;

errors.contrastive: There was an idea, originally derived from Ricardo and Marx, that the capitalist avenue needed a “reserve army of the unemployed” to maintain its profit share.

reference: For instance, the Greek Orthodox seminary of Halki remains closed since 1971; the Assyrian Christians who fled to Germany and Sweden during the war with the PKK have been stripped of their Turkish citizenship, preventing them from claiming back their homes lost in the conflict.
source: Například řecký ortodoxní seminář v Halki je od roku 1971 zavřený, asyrští křesťané, kteří utekli do Německa a Švédska během války s PKK, byli zbaveni svého tureckého občanství, takže potom nemohli žádat zpět své domovy, o které přišli během konfliktu.

reference: A few weeks ago my group organised a seminar at Parliament in Brussels, and I was very struck by certain of our visitors who were at the sharp end of such anti-competitive action, ironically in the cement industry.
source: Před několika týdny zorganizovala naše skupina v Parlamentu v Bruselu seminář a mě velmi překvapili někteří účastníci, kterých se porušování hospodářské soutěže nejvíce týká, paradoxně v odvětví výroby cementu.

errors.contrastive: A few weeks ago my group organised a seminary at Parliament in Brussels, and I was very struck by certain of our visitors who were at the sharp end of such anti-competitive action, ironically in the cement industry.

reference: I need a drink before the other brother arrives to finish the seminar.

reference: During the Cold War, open cultural exchanges – such as the Salzburg Seminar, which enabled young people to engage with one another – demonstrated that contact among populations is far more meaningful.
source: Otevřené kulturní výměny během studené války – jako byl Salcburský seminář, který umožňoval mladým lidem zapojovat se do společné činnosti – ukázaly, že mnohem smysluplnějším nástrojem je kontakt mezi obyvateli.

errors.contrastive: During the Cold War, open cultural exchanges – such as the Salzburg seminary, which enabled young people to engage with one another – demonstrated that contact among populations is far more meaningful.

reference: It was the rst time that a Leader+ Observatory seminar had been held in a new Member State, and it provided an initial platform of exchange between those Leader actors primarily from these countries.
source: Bylo to poprvé, kdy se seminář Observatoře programu Leader+ konal v novém členském státě, který poskytl výchozí platformu pro výměnu zkušeností mezi aktéry Leader zejména z těchto států.

errors.contrastive: It was the rst time that a Leader+ Observatory seminary had been held in a new Member State, and it provided an initial platform of exchange between those Leader actors primarily from these countries.

source: Řada globálních výzev – namátkou změna klimatu, obchod, vyčerpávání zdrojů, mezinárodní bezpečnost, kybernetické války a šíření jaderných zbraní – bude tudíž vzbuzovat vážnější obavy.

reference: Any abuse by one or more undertakings of a dominant position within the internal market or in a substantial part of it shall be prohibited as incompatible with the internal market insofar as it may affect trade between Member States.
source: S vnitřním trhem je neslučitelné, a proto zakázané, aby jeden nebo více podniků zneužívaly dominantního postavení na vnitřním trhu nebo na jeho podstatné části, pokud to může ovlivnit obchod mezi členskými státy.

reference: The increase in international trade and greater mobility within the EU heighten the danger of international outbreaks of infectious diseases within the EU or their transmission to Europe from more distant continents.
source: Zvýšený mezinárodní obchod, zvýšená mobilita v EU zvyšují hrozbu mezinárodních epidemií infekčních onemocnění v EU, resp. jejich přenosu ze vzdálenějších kontinentů do Evropy.

reference: While two were assessed as effective (01 — Economic and Financial Affairs and 03 — Competition, 12 — Internal Market and 20 — Trade), one related to the policy area 02 — Enterprise was assessed as only partially effective in ensuring the regularity of payments.
source: Dva byly označeny za účelné (01 – Hospodářské a finanční věci a 03 – Hospodářská soutěž, 12 – Vnitřní trh a 20 – Obchod), ale systém týkající se oblasti politiky 02 – Podniky byl z hlediska zajišťování správnosti plateb vyhodnocen pouze jako částečně účelný.

errors.contrastive: While two were assessed as effective (01 — Economic and Financial Affairs and 03 — Competition, 12 — Internal Market and 20 — store), one related to the policy area 02 — Enterprise was assessed as only partially effective in ensuring the regularity of payments.

reference: At a time when all justice and home affairs matters of Member States are soon going to fall within supranational competence under the Treaty of Lisbon, a kernel of intergovernmental resistance seems to remain: we are very glad about this.
source: V době, kdy všechny záležitosti spravedlnosti a vnitřních věcí členských států budou brzy spadat do nadnárodní kompetence na základě Lisabonské smlouvy, jádro mezivládního odboje, jak se zdá, přetrvává: jsme velmi rádi, že tomu tak je.

errors.contrastive: At a time when all justice and home affairs matters of Member States are soon going to fall within supranational competence under the Treaty of Lisbon, a nucleus of intergovernmental resistance seems to remain: we are very glad about this.

reference: He developed a kernel, and got it working faster than we got ours working, and got it to work very nicely and solidly.
source: Vyvinul jádro a chodilo mu dříve, než fungovalo naše, a chodilo mu pěkně a stabilně.

errors.contrastive: He developed a nucleus, and got it working faster than we got ours working, and got it to work very nicely and solidly.

reference: Chirac's outburst is so damaging to European unity precisely because it undermines this most fundamental kernel of trust.
source: Chirakův výbuch je tak ničivý pro evropskou jednotu právě proto, že podkopává toto nejzákladnější jádro důvěry.

errors.contrastive: Chirac's outburst is so damaging to European unity precisely because it undermines this most fundamental nucleus of trust.

reference: The nut finally cracks and exposes a rich, oily kernel.
source: Ořech se nakonec rozlomí a ukáže bohaté, olejnaté jádro.

errors.contrastive: The nut finally cracks and exposes a rich, oily nucleus.

reference: The fact that the word “democracy” derives from ancient Greek, and that one can discern the kernel of democratic thought in Greek philosophy, by no means implies that democracy is embedded in the West’s political DNA.
source: Skutečnost, že slovo „demokracie“ pochází ze starého Řecka a že jádro demokratického smýšlení lze nalézt v řecké filozofii, v žádném případě neznamená, že demokracie je zakódovaná v politické DNA Západu.

errors.contrastive: The fact that the word “democracy” derives from ancient Greek, and that one can discern the nucleus of democratic thought in Greek philosophy, by no means implies that democracy is embedded in the West’s political DNA.

reference: And their intention was eventually to develop a kernel to sit underneath those and be the center of the operating system.
source: a jejich záměrem bylo posléze vyvinout jádro, které by pod tím vším sedělo a bylo centrem operačního systému.

errors.contrastive: And their intention was eventually to develop a nucleus to sit underneath those and be the center of the operating system.

reference: Although the Saudis were not included in President Bush’s “axis of evil,” some American policymakers now view the country as a “kernel of evil.”
source: Ačkoli Saúdskou Arábii Bush nezařadil do své "osy zla", někteří američtí politici dnes zemi vidí "jádro zla".

errors.contrastive: Although the Saudis were not included in President Bush’s “axis of evil,” some American policymakers now view the country as a “nucleus of evil.”

reference: When Linus developed the kernel he wasn't doing it for the GNU project.
source: [RICHARD STALLMAN, zakladatel projektu GNU] Když Linux vyvinul jádro, nedělal to pro projekt GNU.

errors.contrastive: When Linus developed the nucleus he wasn't doing it for the GNU project.

reference: There is a kernel of truth to many of the concerns cited above, especially with respect to the current inflation problem.
source: Mnohé z výše uvedených obav mají pravdivé jádro, zejména co se týče současného inflačního problému.

errors.contrastive: There is a nucleus of truth to many of the concerns cited above, especially with respect to the current inflation problem.

reference: Um, if we reconfigure this kernel, we're gonna save a lot of time and money.
source: Když přeprogramujeme tohle jádro, ušetříeme kupu času a peněz.

errors.contrastive: Um, if we reconfigure this nucleus, we're gonna save a lot of time and money.

reference: The thesis of the human potential movement was that there was something really good down in there and if you took these layers off what you were going to wind up with was a kernel, a something that was innately self-expressive
source: Teze hnutí lidského potenciálu byla, že tam dole ve vás je něco opravdu dobré a pokud odložíte vrstvy ocitnete se uprostřed něčeho jako jádro, něčeho, co je vrozeně snažící se vyjádřit sebe samé,

errors.contrastive: The thesis of the human potential movement was that there was something really good down in there and if you took these layers off what you were going to wind up with was a nucleus, a something that was innately self-expressive

reference: We decided to divide up the kernel which traditionally had been one program, to divide it up into a lot of smaller programs that would send messages to each other asynchronously to, to communicate.
source: Rozhodli jsme se rozdělit jádro, které tradičně tvořil jediný program, rozdělit ho do mnoha menších programů které si budou navzájem asynchronně posílat zprávy, aby spolu mohli komunikovat.

errors.contrastive: We decided to divide up the nucleus which traditionally had been one program, to divide it up into a lot of smaller programs that would send messages to each other asynchronously to, to communicate.

reference: The 'Global Village Construction Set' is an open source enterprise kernel consisting of the 50 key industrial machines that reinvent local production. bringing wealth back to communities.
source: "Stavební sada pro globální vesnici" je jádro podniku volně dostupných zdrojů, skládající se z 50 klíčových průmyslových strojů, které znovu oživí místní výrobu a přinesou tak zpět bohatství do komunit.

errors.contrastive: The 'Global Village Construction Set' is an open source enterprise nucleus consisting of the 50 key industrial machines that reinvent local production. bringing wealth back to communities.

reference: Rule number one, every lie is built on a kernel of truth.
source: Pravidlo číslo jedna, každá lež má pravdivé jádro.

errors.contrastive: Rule number one, every lie is built on a nucleus of truth.

reference: You are just a murky shadow, a hard kernel of indifference, a neutral gaze avoiding the gaze of others.
source: Jsi jen kalný stín, tvrdé jádro lhostejnosti, prázdný pohled, vyhýbající se pohledu druhých.

errors.contrastive: You are just a murky shadow, a hard nucleus of indifference, a neutral gaze avoiding the gaze of others.

reference: I've got honey pot farms hidden behind uml kernel data packets and a first generation honeynet I personally programmed.
source: Ale můžeš vsadit svou pěknou prdelku, že je dostanu. Nastražila jsem do systému... začarovaný jádro, který brání... v přístupu programům a datům... a osobně jsem ho naprogramovala.

errors.contrastive: I've got honey pot farms hidden behind uml nucleus data packets and a first generation honeynet I personally programmed.

reference: Well, maybe there's a kernel of truth to it, Mel.
source: No , možná, že je jádro pravdy na tom , Mel .

errors.contrastive: Well, maybe there's a nucleus of truth to it, Mel.

reference: With a generative model, the system would use a... basic generative kernel of a tree.
source: Pomocí generativního modelu by systém mohl používat pouze jádro toho stromu.

reference: The kernel of light at the center will be the only part of the Sun that endures, a white dwarf star that will go on shining dimly for another 100 billion years.

reference: Secondly, the project has been received in many countries as yet another attempt to create a two-speed Europe, whose nucleus is formed by the economically most competitive states.

reference: If we blow it up to the size of a sphere that fits in this room, the nucleus would still be invisible.

errors.contrastive: If we blow it up to the size of a sphere that fits in this room, the kernel would still be invisible.

reference: Because the egg that receives the new nucleus has to reprogram it quickly – teaching it to give the instructions necessary to construct an entire human being - genes that should be “turned on” might well be “turned off,” and vice versa.

reference: From a nucleus of nine craftsmen in the region of Salzkammergut, the project has constantly expanded its scope of activity.
