source: Tedy, kdyby po mně Kitty chtěla, abych střílel mandle na nějaké komunisty, nebyl by to problém.

errors.contrastive: I mean, if kitty wanted me to shoot the tonsils at some communists, that I could do.
I mean, if kitty wanted me to shoot the tonsil at some communists, that I could do.

reference: Should I put raisins or almonds in the cookies?
source: Měla bych do toho koláče dát rozinky nebo mandle?

errors.contrastive: Should I put raisins or tonsils in the cookies?
Should I put raisins or tonsil in the cookies?

reference: "Her eyes are like almonds, her lips are like rosebuds".
source: "Její oči jsou jako mandle, její rty jsou jako růžová poupata".

errors.contrastive: "Her eyes are like tonsils, her lips are like rosebuds".
"Her eyes are like tonsil, her lips are like rosebuds".

reference: Yeah, she wants, uh... pink candy almonds with "Maya and Dink forever" stamped on them.
source: Jo, chce růžové sladké mandle, na kterých bude vytištěno "Maya a Dink navždy."

errors.contrastive: Yeah, she wants, uh... pink candy tonsils with "Maya and Dink forever" stamped on them.
Yeah, she wants, uh... pink candy tonsil with "Maya and Dink forever" stamped on them.

reference: We'll start with a Maltese dish which they serve as an "hors d'oeuvre." Liver, honey, almonds and a variety of sauces.
source: Začneme maltézskou mísu jež bude podána jako "Hors d'oeuvre." Játra, med, mandle a k tomu různé druhy omáček.

errors.contrastive: We'll start with a Maltese dish which they serve as an "hors d'oeuvre." Liver, honey, tonsils and a variety of sauces.
We'll start with a Maltese dish which they serve as an "hors d'oeuvre." Liver, honey, tonsil and a variety of sauces.

reference: So, Ken, did you get to sample those almonds I gave you?
source: Kene, už jsi ochutnal ty mandle, co jsem ti dal?

errors.contrastive: So, Ken, did you get to sample those tonsils I gave you?
So, Ken, did you get to sample those tonsil I gave you?

reference: Talbot's serving her blood for dinner, and she's only supposed to be eating almonds.
source: Talbot jí posílá večeři a nemá jíst nic jinýho než mandle.

errors.contrastive: Talbot's serving her blood for dinner, and she's only supposed to be eating tonsils.
Talbot's serving her blood for dinner, and she's only supposed to be eating tonsil.

reference: I found chunks of macadamias, almonds and cashews.
source: Našel jsem tam jenom makadamie, mandle a kešu.

errors.contrastive: I found chunks of macadamias, tonsils and cashews.
I found chunks of macadamias, tonsil and cashews.

reference: - Or crab, tiger and almonds, very unusual.
source: Anebo kraba, tygra a mandle, velice nekonvenční.

errors.contrastive: - Or crab, tiger and tonsils, very unusual.
- Or crab, tiger and tonsil, very unusual.

reference: Do you know where the almonds I made for Table 5 went?
source: Nevíš kam se poděly mandle, které jsem udělala pro stůl 5?

errors.contrastive: Do you know where the tonsils I made for Table 5 went?
Do you know where the tonsil I made for Table 5 went?

reference: You'd have taken me around the corner and rolled up a newspaper.
source: Ty by sis mě odvedl za roh a vzal stočené noviny.

errors.contrastive: You'd have taken me around the horn and rolled up a newspaper.

reference: Could you send a taxicab promptly... to the corner of Sherman and DeSoto?
source: Pošlete prosím ihned taxíka... na roh ulic Shermanovy a DeSotovy.

errors.contrastive: Could you send a taxicab promptly... to the horn of Sherman and DeSoto?

reference: Spot this Cougar on the corner for me, will ya?
source: Buď tak hodnej a dej toho modrýho za roh.

errors.contrastive: Spot this Cougar on the horn for me, will ya?

reference: You love it. When you live here 56 years and know every corner... it's easy to love it all.
source: Když tady žijete 56 let a znáte každý roh, snadno si to zamilujete.

errors.contrastive: You love it. When you live here 56 years and know every horn... it's easy to love it all.

reference: She always said: "never worry about getting married... someday you'll turn the right corner and meet the right man."
source: Vždycky říkala: "Se svatbou si hlavu nelámej. Jednou zahneš za správný roh a potkáš toho pravého."

errors.contrastive: She always said: "never worry about getting married... someday you'll turn the right horn and meet the right man."

reference: Notify Scotland Yard to have a plain-clothes man posted on every corner.
source: Oznamte Scotlandu Yardu, ať postaví na každý roh policistu.

errors.contrastive: Notify Scotland Yard to have a plain-clothes man posted on every horn.

reference: '22 paces from the north corner of the building... '..plant your plastic explosive.
source: 22 kroků na sever roh budovy Dal jsem výbušninu.. ...

errors.contrastive: '22 paces from the north horn of the building... '..plant your plastic explosive.

reference: I turn behind the corner, you'll quickly leave and hide in a cafe.
source: Zahnu za roh, Vy rychle vyskočíte a schováte se v kavárně.

errors.contrastive: I turn behind the horn, you'll quickly leave and hide in a cafe.

reference: I'll run to the corner, pick you up some nice ground round.
source: Tak já zaběhnu na roh a přinesu ti nějaký pěkný koleno.

errors.contrastive: I'll run to the horn, pick you up some nice ground round.

reference: So I'm gonna-- There's this drive-in that I go to at Riverside and Victory, on the corner.
source: Takže chci... Pojedu do autokina na roh Riverside a Victory.

errors.contrastive: So I'm gonna-- There's this drive-in that I go to at Riverside and Victory, on the horn.

reference: Back in Paris a year ago, if you'd gone... around the right corner at the right time... you and Isabelle might have bumped into each other accidentally.
source: Před rokem v Paříži, kdybys zahnul... za ten správný roh ve správnou chvíli, mohli jste do sebe s Isabelle náhodou narazit.

errors.contrastive: Back in Paris a year ago, if you'd gone... around the right horn at the right time... you and Isabelle might have bumped into each other accidentally.

reference: We'll have to go to the corner and wait for a bus.
source: Budeme muset jít na roh a počkat na autobus.

errors.contrastive: We'll have to go to the horn and wait for a bus.

reference: Promise not to watch me go beyond the corner.
source: Slib mi, že se nebudeš divat, až zajdu za roh.

errors.contrastive: Promise not to watch me go beyond the horn.

reference: ...185, group 26, corner 185, that is correct.
source: ...185, skupina 26, roh 185, to je správně.

errors.contrastive: ...185, group 26, horn 185, that is correct.

reference: No, Rose, go to the corner and open a stand!
source: Ne Rose, jdi na roh a otevři si tam stánek.

errors.contrastive: No, Rose, go to the horn and open a stand!

reference: I forgot to tell you not to go past the corner!
source: Neřekl jsem ti, že nemáš přetáhnout za roh.

errors.contrastive: I forgot to tell you not to go past the horn!

reference: When you go into a corner, lean like you're trying to kill yourself.
source: Jakmile dojedeš na roh, nahni se jak nejvíc to pujde! Davej pozor!

errors.contrastive: When you go into a horn, lean like you're trying to kill yourself.

reference: - You want me to go and look round the corner, sir? - Yes.
source: Chcete abych se šel podívat za roh,pane?

errors.contrastive: - You want me to go and look round the horn, sir? - Yes.

reference: V.M. Purishkevich, Bessarabian landowner, ultra-rightist ...from which one can see every corner of Holy Russia.
source: V.M. Purishkevich, Bessarabijský velkostatkář, krajní pravičák ...odkud každý může vidět každý roh Svaté Rusi.

errors.contrastive: V.M. Purishkevich, Bessarabian landowner, ultra-rightist ...from which one can see every horn of Holy Russia.

reference: In exactly two minutes, you go around the corner into the Cafe '80s.
source: Přesně za dvě minuty půjdeš za roh do Cafe '80.

errors.contrastive: In exactly two minutes, you go around the horn into the Cafe '80s.

reference: This goes for the whole of the Horn of Africa and not least for the Swedish citizen, Dawit Isaak, who is imprisoned in Eritrea.
source: To platí pro celý Africký roh a v neposlední řadě i pro švédského občana Dawita Isaaka, který je uvězněn v Eritreji.

errors.contrastive: This goes for the whole of the corner of Africa and not least for the Swedish citizen, Dawit Isaak, who is imprisoned in Eritrea.

reference: Literally, "one horned." "Unus," one, and "cornu," a horn.
source: Doslova jednorohý. Unus, jeden a cornu, roh.

errors.contrastive: Literally, "one horned." "Unus," one, and "cornu," a corner.

reference: Second, fertility rates and population growth in the Horn of Africa continue to be extremely high, even as children perish in the famine.
source: Za druhé Africký roh i nadále vykazuje mimořádně vysokou porodnost a populační růst, přestože děti umírají hladem.

errors.contrastive: Second, fertility rates and population growth in the corner of Africa continue to be extremely high, even as children perish in the famine.

reference: I also think that the Horn of Africa is possibly the poorest region in the world.
source: Domnívám se, že Africký roh je pravděpodobně také nejchudším regionem na světě.

errors.contrastive: I also think that the corner of Africa is possibly the poorest region in the world.

reference: I hooked it on a horn, opened it up a little.
source: Zavadil jsem s ní o roh. Rána se otevřela.

errors.contrastive: I hooked it on a corner, opened it up a little.

reference: In the Middle East, North Africa, and the region stretching from the Sahel to the Horn of Africa, there are about 20 million displaced people; civil wars, widespread violence, and failed states are becoming the norm.
source: Na Blízkém východě, v severní Africe a v regionu táhnoucím se od Sahelu po Africký roh žije asi 20 milionů bezprizorních lidí; občanské války, rozšířené násilí a zkrachovalé státy se stávají normou.

errors.contrastive: In the Middle East, North Africa, and the region stretching from the Sahel to the corner of Africa, there are about 20 million displaced people; civil wars, widespread violence, and failed states are becoming the norm.

reference: author. - (PT) Yesterday in Mogadishu there were incitements to attack African Union forces - such is the scale of the tragedy and loss of control that are destroying Somalia and inflaming the entire Horn of Africa.
source: autorka. - (PT) Včera došlo ve městě Mogadišu k podněcování útoků na jednotky Africké unie - takový je rozsah tragédie a ztráty kontroly, která ničí Somálsko a postihuje celý Africký roh.

errors.contrastive: author. - (PT) Yesterday in Mogadishu there were incitements to attack African Union forces - such is the scale of the tragedy and loss of control that are destroying Somalia and inflaming the entire corner of Africa.

reference: Then you know what happens if the horn is placed back in the forehead of Dagoth.
source: Pak víte co se stane, bude-li roh vrácen na Dagothovo čelo.

errors.contrastive: Then you know what happens if the corner is placed back in the forehead of Dagoth.

reference: The constant instability in the region is one of the causes of the problems which the Horn of Africa is facing during the process of economic, social and political development.
source: Trvalá nestabilita v regionu je jednou z příčin problémů, kterým Africký roh čelí v rámci procesu hospodářského, sociálního a politického rozvoje.

errors.contrastive: The constant instability in the region is one of the causes of the problems which the corner of Africa is facing during the process of economic, social and political development.

reference: I had to give you a horn they could see!
source: Ne! Musela jsem ti přidat roh, který mohou vidět!

errors.contrastive: I had to give you a corner they could see!

reference: EU partnership in the Horn of Africa (vote)
source: Roh Afriky: regionální politické partnerství Evropské unie pro mír, bezpečnost a rozvoj (hlasování)

errors.contrastive: EU partnership in the corner of Africa (vote)

reference: Maybe it's best if we find Buffalo Horn before fighting.
source: Ještě předtím by bylo lepší najít "Bůvolí roh".

errors.contrastive: Maybe it's best if we find Buffalo corner before fighting.

reference: In this spirit, the Commission supports your proposal to nominate a special representative for the Horn.
source: V tomto duchu Komise podporuje váš návrh jmenovat zvláštního zástupce pro Africký roh.

errors.contrastive: In this spirit, the Commission supports your proposal to nominate a special representative for the corner.

reference: Lucifer's shining horn lights up the gory carrion feast and the dance, where devils play on a horsehead with a cats tail.
source: Zářící roh nad čelem Luciferovým osvětluje žranici z masa zdechlin a tanec, kde ďábli hrají na koňskou hlavu a dutý kočičí ocas.

errors.contrastive: Lucifer's shining corner lights up the gory carrion feast and the dance, where devils play on a horsehead with a cats tail.

reference: Madam President, Somalia lies on the Somalian Peninsula, known as the Horn of Africa, and is an ethnically and religiously homogeneous state.
source: jménem skupiny UEN. - (PL) Paní předsedající, Somálsko leží na Somálském poloostrově, který je znám jako Africký roh a je etnicky a nábožensky homogenním státem.

errors.contrastive: Madam President, Somalia lies on the Somalian Peninsula, known as the corner of Africa, and is an ethnically and religiously homogeneous state.

reference: Don't you be a'feared of tootin' your horn.
source: Copak se a'feared z tootin 'vašeho roh.

errors.contrastive: Don't you be a'feared of tootin' your corner.

reference: on behalf of the ALDE Group. - Mr President, the Horn of Africa is a dreadful region where internal and regional conflicts continue to undermine peace and security.
source: jménem skupiny ALDE. - Pane předsedající, Africký roh je hrůzným regionem, kde pokračující vnitřní a regionální konflikty nadále znemožňují mír a nastolení bezpečnosti.

errors.contrastive: on behalf of the ALDE Group. - Mr President, the corner of Africa is a dreadful region where internal and regional conflicts continue to undermine peace and security.

reference: The Bosporus, the Golden Horn! We'll land directly under the windows of the Sultan's palace!
source: Bospor, Zlatý roh, přistaneme rovnou pod okny sultánova paláce.

errors.contrastive: The Bosporus, the Golden corner! We'll land directly under the windows of the Sultan's palace!

reference: Mr President, the Horn of Africa is currently a real powder keg, not only due to the situation of total instability in Somalia and Sudan, but also in the three countries that Mr Kaczmarek, Mr Hutchinson and I had the pleasure of visiting.
source: Pane předsedající, Africký roh je v současné době skutečným sudem se střelným prachem, nejen kvůli totální nestabilitě v Somálsku a Súdánu, ale i v dalších třech zemích, které jsem měl možnost, spolu s pány Kaczmarekem a Hutchinsonem, navštívit.

errors.contrastive: Mr President, the corner of Africa is currently a real powder keg, not only due to the situation of total instability in Somalia and Sudan, but also in the three countries that Mr Kaczmarek, Mr Hutchinson and I had the pleasure of visiting.

reference: Another blast on that horn and even the trees will come alive.
source: Ještě jedno zatroubení na roh, a i ty stromy ožijí.

errors.contrastive: Another blast on that corner and even the trees will come alive.

reference: The opposite - secrecy and the withholding of documents - creates mistrust and a sense of not being involved, and can sometimes aid in the development of corruption and the abuse of power.
source: Protiklad - utajování a zadržování dokumentů - způsobuje nedůvěru a pocit neúčasti a může někdy přispívat k rozvoji korupce a zneužití moci.

errors.contrastive: The contrast - secrecy and the withholding of documents - creates mistrust and a sense of not being involved, and can sometimes aid in the development of corruption and the abuse of power.

reference: Wait, that's the opposite of how my blood causes cells to regenerate.
source: Počkat, to je protiklad toho, jak moje krev buňky regeneruje.

errors.contrastive: Wait, that's the contrast of how my blood causes cells to regenerate.

reference: It's basically a life-extending Jacuzzi, located in a place that's the opposite of life-extending.
source: Je to v podstatě lázeň prodlužující život, umístěna na místě, které je protiklad prodloužení života.

errors.contrastive: It's basically a life-extending Jacuzzi, located in a place that's the contrast of life-extending.

reference: That Leela volunteered to join you on a goodwill tour, that's -- that's proof that she is a patriotic woman -- The opposite of seditious.
source: To, že Leela souhlasila, že se k vám při cestě přidá, dokazuje, že je to patriotka, tedy protiklad buřičky.

errors.contrastive: That Leela volunteered to join you on a goodwill tour, that's -- that's proof that she is a patriotic woman -- The contrast of seditious.

reference: If I did fancy old people, which I don't, that would make me the opposite of a paedo.
source: Pokud bych náhodou měl náklonost k starším lidem, kterou nemám, tak bych byl protiklad pedofila.

errors.contrastive: If I did fancy old people, which I don't, that would make me the contrast of a paedo.

reference: So you're saying that the man in between is your equal and opposite?
source: Takže ten muž mezi námi je jako vy, ale protiklad?

errors.contrastive: So you're saying that the man in between is your equal and contrast?

reference: The formula on that paper has now turned into the formula for the virus. You've left the mirror universe, so it's turned back into its opposite. (LAUGHS)
source: Myslím, že zjistíš, že z toho vzorce na papíře, je teď vzorec toho viru, protože jsi opustil zrcadlový vesmír, takže se to obrátilo ve svůj protiklad.

errors.contrastive: The formula on that paper has now turned into the formula for the virus. You've left the mirror universe, so it's turned back into its contrast. (LAUGHS)

reference: You look like the opposite Of a gutter eater.
source: Vlastně vypadáte jako protiklad někoho, kdo jí z okapů.

errors.contrastive: You look like the contrast Of a gutter eater.

reference: Chance meeting your perfect other, your perfect opposite, your protector and endangerer.
source: Máš šanci, že potkáš svůj dokonalý protějšek, svůj ideální protiklad, osobu, která tě ochrání i ohrozí.

errors.contrastive: Chance meeting your perfect other, your perfect contrast, your protector and endangerer.

reference: The two sides are opposite, as different as day and night.
source: Tyto dvě strany jsou protiklad... tak odlišný, jako den a noc.

errors.contrastive: The two sides are contrast, as different as day and night.

reference: In some ways it's the total opposite of anger.
source: - To, můj příteli je... Někdo říká, že je to úplný protiklad oproti zlosti.

errors.contrastive: In some ways it's the total contrast of anger.

reference: On the contrary, people who are not so much sceptical... as fond of paradoxes are amusing, and the essence of paradox is... to look for the opposite in the face of what seems a self-evident idea.
source: Naopak, ti kteří nejsou tak skeptičtí... jako spíše založení na paradoxech, jsou zábavní, a podstatou paradoxu je... hledat protiklad tváří tvář tomu, co se zdá jako samozřejmost.

errors.contrastive: On the contrary, people who are not so much sceptical... as fond of paradoxes are amusing, and the essence of paradox is... to look for the contrast in the face of what seems a self-evident idea.

reference: Suddenly, the light went on when Kate said: "Obviously we can't do that. "But if we do the exact opposite,
source: Pak ale zničehonic Kate napadlo, že nemůžem udělat tu róbu takhle, ale můžeme ušít ušít přesný protiklad.

errors.contrastive: Suddenly, the light went on when Kate said: "Obviously we can't do that. "But if we do the exact contrast,

reference: If there is someone like me in the world... and I'm at one end of the spectrum... couldn't there be someone else... the opposite of me at the other end?
source: Když existuje člověk jako já, a já jsem na jednom konci spektra, nemohl by být na druhé straně můj protiklad?

errors.contrastive: If there is someone like me in the world... and I'm at one end of the spectrum... couldn't there be someone else... the contrast of me at the other end?

reference: Which is why it's good that you've found the opposite of Marissa.
source: Proto je dobře, že sis našel protiklad Marissy.

errors.contrastive: Which is why it's good that you've found the contrast of Marissa.

reference: And if you wanted the diametric opposite of Carl Boenish that would be Jean Boenish.
source: A kdybyste si chtěli představit naprostý protiklad Carla Boenishe byla by to Jean Boenish.

errors.contrastive: And if you wanted the diametric contrast of Carl Boenish that would be Jean Boenish.

reference: The only bad guy here is you, stan, And the opposite of the man that I married and a coward, And I am pretty sure
source: Jediný zločinec jsi ty Stan a protiklad člověka za kterého jsem se provdala a a jsem si jistá že to nemůžu vydržet památky na tebe.

errors.contrastive: The only bad guy here is you, stan, And the contrast of the man that I married and a coward, And I am pretty sure

reference: That boy is the exact opposite of the type we're looking for.
source: Poslouchejte, tenhle ubohej kluk je přesný protiklad člověka, kterýho my hledáme.

errors.contrastive: That boy is the exact contrast of the type we're looking for.

reference: I'm the only child my father's scared of because I'm the total opposite because I wanted to be.
source: jsem jediný dítě, kterýho se kdy táta bál, protože jsem jeho protiklad, protože jsem chtěl být.

errors.contrastive: I'm the only child my father's scared of because I'm the total contrast because I wanted to be.

reference: The contrast with China, tragically struck by a violent earthquake last week, is remarkable.
source: Protiklad s Čínou, kterou minulý týden postihlo silné zemětřesení, je pozoruhodný.

errors.contrastive: The opposite with China, tragically struck by a violent earthquake last week, is remarkable.

reference: So, I was thinking about doing this contrast between dialog and chorus in Sophocles.
source: Pojala bych to jako protiklad v dialogu a chóru v Sofoklovi.

errors.contrastive: So, I was thinking about doing this opposite between dialog and chorus in Sophocles.

reference: What a contrast to the openness and promptness of China in helping the survivors in Sichuan!
source: Jaký protiklad v porovnání s otevřeností a ochotou Číny, která se snažila pomoci lidem v provincii Si-čchuan, těm, kteří přežili!

errors.contrastive: What a opposite to the openness and promptness of China in helping the survivors in Sichuan!

reference: It gives the necessary contrast to all that you covet... to all that is good... and therein lies our mutual problem.
source: Je to nezbytný protiklad, po kterém dychtíš... po všem, co je dobré... a v tom leží náš vzájemný problém.

errors.contrastive: It gives the necessary opposite to all that you covet... to all that is good... and therein lies our mutual problem.

reference: It's OK to notice what you don't want because that gives you contrast and you say, "this is what I do want."
source: Je dobré si všímat toho, co nechcete, aby jste znali protiklad toho, co chcete, pak si můžete říct, "to je to, co chci."

errors.contrastive: It's OK to notice what you don't want because that gives you opposite and you say, "this is what I do want."

reference: Lieutenant, company passed word for us to pull back to the ridge and dig in.
source: Poručíku, rota dostala pokyn stáhnout se zpátky na hřeben a zakopat se.

errors.contrastive: Lieutenant, company passed word for us to pull back to the comb and dig in.

reference: Don't avoid that dog leg. Over the ridge and down along the creek.
source: Kratší je to přes hřeben a dolů kolem potoka.

errors.contrastive: Don't avoid that dog leg. Over the comb and down along the creek.

reference: Captain, this ridge extends for a kilometre in either direction.
source: Kapitáne, ten hřeben se táhne kilometr v obou směrech.

errors.contrastive: Captain, this comb extends for a kilometre in either direction.

reference: Suicide Trail through Nightmare Canyon, or shortcut at Satan's Ridge?
source: Sebevrahovou cestou skrz Kaňon přízraků nebo zkratkou přes Čertův hřeben?

errors.contrastive: Suicide Trail through Nightmare Canyon, or shortcut at Satan's comb?

reference: If those Americans don't hold that ridge... -...your inventory will be shot to hell.
source: Když Američani neudrží tenhle hřeben váš katalóg vezme za své.

errors.contrastive: If those Americans don't hold that comb... -...your inventory will be shot to hell.

reference: I can glide to the water if I can clear the ridge.
source: Mohu doplachtit do vody, když přeletím ten hřeben.

errors.contrastive: I can glide to the water if I can clear the comb.

reference: Why dont you go to the ridge, camp there? Well see you in the morning.
source: Tak se běžte vyspat na hřeben a ráno se třeba uvidíme.

errors.contrastive: Why dont you go to the comb, camp there? Well see you in the morning.

reference: Zelenko, pull your squad back to the ridge and dig in pronto.
source: Zelenko, vezměte svou jednotku zpátky na hřeben a urychleně se tam zakopejte.

errors.contrastive: Zelenko, pull your squad back to the comb and dig in pronto.

reference: Well, look, the Grahams', the Lears', the Bunkers'.Then over the ridge.
source: Podívejte, Grahamovi, Learovi, Bunkerovi. Pak přes hřeben.

errors.contrastive: Well, look, the Grahams', the Lears', the Bunkers'.Then over the comb.

reference: Herr General, the Americans are attacking the ridge above the town.
source: Herr General, Američané útočí na hřeben nad městem.

errors.contrastive: Herr General, the Americans are attacking the comb above the town.

reference: I'm looking right at the ridge that we came over.
source: Právě se dívám na hřeben, kterej jsme přelezli.

errors.contrastive: I'm looking right at the comb that we came over.

reference: I was making a tour of positions when you hit that ridge.
source: Zrovna jsem prováděl kontrolu pozic, když jste napadli ten hřeben.

errors.contrastive: I was making a tour of positions when you hit that comb.

reference: If you get a ridge between you and the radar, they can't guide a missile at you.
source: Když vás od radaru dělí hřeben hory, nemohou k vám raketu navést.

errors.contrastive: If you get a comb between you and the radar, they can't guide a missile at you.

reference: When you contact them, see if it's feasible to use them in a strike at the north ridge.
source: Až se s nimi zkontaktujete, zjistěte, jestli je možné aby zaútočili na severní hřeben.

errors.contrastive: When you contact them, see if it's feasible to use them in a strike at the north comb.

reference: Johnson, get your mortar team over on that ridge over there.
source: - Johnsone. - Jo? Umísti minomet támhle na ten hřeben.

errors.contrastive: Johnson, get your mortar team over on that comb over there.

reference: In the morning I'll send all my men to the ridge.
source: Hned za svítání pošlu na ten hřeben všechny svoje lidi.

errors.contrastive: In the morning I'll send all my men to the comb.

reference: Remember the dispatch we got about Russian sub skippers running the Reykjanes Ridge at high speeds because they had hyper-accurate surveys of the underwater canyons?
source: Vzpomínáte si na tu zprávu o ruských ponorkových velitelích, proplouvajících přes Reykjanský hřeben vysokou rychlostí, protože měli velmi přesně prozkoumané podvodní kaňony.

errors.contrastive: Remember the dispatch we got about Russian sub skippers running the Reykjanes comb at high speeds because they had hyper-accurate surveys of the underwater canyons?

reference: Now listen, I'm taking the group at dawn over the ridge into the next valley.
source: Za úsvitu odvedu skupinu přes hřeben do druhého údolí.

errors.contrastive: Now listen, I'm taking the group at dawn over the comb into the next valley.

reference: West of Gibraltar, south of the Azores. The Atlantic ridge, what does that suggest to you?
source: Západně od Gibraltararu, jižně od Azorských ostrovů, atlantický hřeben, co vám to říká?

errors.contrastive: West of Gibraltar, south of the Azores. The Atlantic comb, what does that suggest to you?

reference: There's a ridge of high pressure centered over Ireland which is moving steadily eastward bringing cloudy weather to parts of the West Country, Wales and areas west of the Pennines.
source: Hřeben vyššího tlaku vzduchu se středem nad Irskem se postupně přesouvá na východ a přináší s sebou oblačnost nad západní pobřeží, Wales a oblasti západně od Pennin.

errors.contrastive: There's a comb of high pressure centered over Ireland which is moving steadily eastward bringing cloudy weather to parts of the West Country, Wales and areas west of the Pennines.

reference: Here's some smokes and a piece of cheese from Kat, and your comb is in the tobacco tin.
source: Donesli jsme ti nějaký kuřivo a peknej kousek sýra od Kata, a hřeben máš v tabatěrce.

errors.contrastive: Here's some smokes and a piece of cheese from Kat, and your ridge is in the tobacco tin.

errors.contrastive: Spoons, the helmet... ridge, paper, and so on.

reference: # Remember that rainy eve # # She threw me out # # With nothing but a fine-tooth comb #

reference: Hey, it's just a comb, you see?

reference: All proceeds from tomorrow's barbecue go to... Beaver Pelt Cafe restoration fund. - Thank you, Edna.
source: Víš, bylo rozhodnuto, že výnos z letošní grilovačku půjde do fondu pro restauraci Beavers Mill Cafe.

errors.contrastive: All decree from tomorrow's barbecue go to... Beaver Pelt Cafe restoration fund. - Thank you, Edna.
All edict from tomorrow's barbecue go to... Beaver Pelt Cafe restoration fund. - Thank you, Edna.

reference: Of course, capturing this surplus may allow for income redistribution, as many suggest; but a much bigger and sustainable bang can be achieved if the proceeds go instead to financing inclusion.
source: Dobytím tohoto přebytku lze samozřejmě umožnit přerozdělení příjmů, jak mnozí navrhují; mnohem většího a trvalejšího účinku však lze dosáhnout v případě, že výnos bude použit na financování inkluze.

errors.contrastive: Of course, capturing this surplus may allow for income redistribution, as many suggest; but a much bigger and sustainable bang can be achieved if the decree go instead to financing inclusion.
Of course, capturing this surplus may allow for income redistribution, as many suggest; but a much bigger and sustainable bang can be achieved if the edict go instead to financing inclusion.

reference: It is apparent from the provisions of the OEPS that the designated company is not entitled to use the proceeds from the charge for purposes other than those provided for by the Law.
source: Z ustanovení OEPS vyplývá, že určená společnost nemá žádnou možnost používat výnos z poplatku k jiným než zákonem stanoveným účelům.

errors.contrastive: It is apparent from the provisions of the OEPS that the designated company is not entitled to use the decree from the charge for purposes other than those provided for by the Law.
It is apparent from the provisions of the OEPS that the designated company is not entitled to use the edict from the charge for purposes other than those provided for by the Law.

reference: (ET) Ladies and gentlemen, five years ago, at the sustainable development summit in Johannesburg, we entered into a commitment to conserve fish stocks and restore them rapidly to the level which ensures maximum sustainable yield.
source: (ET) Dámy a pánové, před pěti lety jsme na summitu o trvale udržitelném rozvoji v Johannesburgu přijali závazek chránit populace ryb a rychle je obnovovat na úroveň, která zajišťuje maximální udržitelný výnos.

errors.contrastive: (ET) Ladies and gentlemen, five years ago, at the sustainable development summit in Johannesburg, we entered into a commitment to conserve fish stocks and restore them rapidly to the level which ensures maximum sustainable decree.

(ET) Ladies and gentlemen, five years ago, at the sustainable development summit in Johannesburg, we entered into a commitment to conserve fish stocks and restore them rapidly to the level which ensures maximum sustainable edict.

reference: A thousand percent return on investment- That's what you promised me, and that's what I promised them.
source: 1,000% roční výnos, tos mi slíbil a tohle zas slíbil já jim.

errors.contrastive: A thousand percent decree on investment- That's what you promised me, and that's what I promised them.
A thousand percent edict on investment- That's what you promised me, and that's what I promised them.

reference: For basic scientific research, the potential return will be broadly available to any and all, whether or not they paid for it and bore the risk of failure.
source: U základního vědeckého výzkumu bude nicméně potenciální výnos široce dostupný komukoliv a všem bez ohledu na to, zda za něj zaplatili a nesli riziko neúspěchu.

errors.contrastive: For basic scientific research, the potential decree will be broadly available to any and all, whether or not they paid for it and bore the risk of failure.
For basic scientific research, the potential edict will be broadly available to any and all, whether or not they paid for it and bore the risk of failure.

reference: It cannot be allowed to extend the scope of the first and second sentences of Article 19(2) of the Sixth Directive, which refers to transactions the proceeds of which must be excluded from the calculation of the deductible proportion.
source: 19 odst. 2 první a druhé věty šesté směrnice, který uvádí plnění, jejichž výnos musí být z výpočtu odpočitatelného podílu vyloučen.

errors.contrastive: It cannot be allowed to extend the scope of the first and second sentences of Article 19(2) of the Sixth Directive, which refers to transactions the decree of which must be excluded from the calculation of the deductible proportion.

It cannot be allowed to extend the scope of the first and second sentences of Article 19(2) of the Sixth Directive, which refers to transactions the edict of which must be excluded from the calculation of the deductible proportion.

reference: Research and development bureaucratised in large organisations gives less return on the money put in, not more.
source: Výzkum a vývoj byrokratizované ve velkých organizacích přinášejí jen menší výnos z investovaných peněz a nic víc.

errors.contrastive: Research and development bureaucratised in large organisations gives less decree on the money put in, not more.
Research and development bureaucratised in large organisations gives less edict on the money put in, not more.

reference: the maximum height that the waters came to would directly predict the yield of the crops the profits that the farmers made.
source: Každý rok, když se naplnila maximální výška, kam se voda mohla dostat přímo předpovídal výnos plodin a s tím, zisky zemědělců.

errors.contrastive: the maximum height that the waters came to would directly predict the decree of the crops the profits that the farmers made.
the maximum height that the waters came to would directly predict the edict of the crops the profits that the farmers made.

reference: The annual return on this capital is currently estimated at 60 billion tons, yet only two billion tons is consumed for food purposes and 10 billion tons for energy.
source: Roční výnos z tohoto kapitálu se v současné době odhaduje na 60 miliard tun, přičemž na krmivo se spotřebují pouhé dvě miliardy tun a na energii 10 miliard tun.

errors.contrastive: The annual decree on this capital is currently estimated at 60 billion tons, yet only two billion tons is consumed for food purposes and 10 billion tons for energy.
The annual edict on this capital is currently estimated at 60 billion tons, yet only two billion tons is consumed for food purposes and 10 billion tons for energy.

reference: In the main proceedings in the present case, the information provided by the national court indicates clearly that the purchase and sale of leased vehicles were organised professionally and systematically and that the expected sales proceeds were taken into account in determining the amount of the rental.
source: Ve věci v původním řízení vyplývá z údajů poskytnutých předkládajícím soudem, že pořízení a prodej vozidel daných do pronájmu bylo organizováno profesionálním a systematickým způsobem a že předpokládaný výnos z prodeje byl vzat v úvahu při stanovení výše nájemného.

errors.contrastive: In the main proceedings in the present case, the information provided by the national court indicates clearly that the purchase and sale of leased vehicles were organised professionally and systematically and that the expected sales decree were taken into account in determining the amount of the rental.

In the main proceedings in the present case, the information provided by the national court indicates clearly that the purchase and sale of leased vehicles were organised professionally and systematically and that the expected sales edict were taken into account in determining the amount of the rental.

reference: At this summit, the Commission agreed to maintain or to restore fish stocks to levels that can produce the maximum sustainable yield.
source: Na tomto summitu Komise souhlasila, že udrží nebo obnoví populace ryb na úrovni, jež zajistí maximální udržitelný výnos.

errors.contrastive: At this summit, the Commission agreed to maintain or to restore fish stocks to levels that can produce the maximum sustainable decree.
At this summit, the Commission agreed to maintain or to restore fish stocks to levels that can produce the maximum sustainable edict.

reference: But the real reason I'm here at this early stage is because our research shows that your particular plot of land has a potentially "high yield".
source: Ale skutečný důvod, proč jsem v takhle brzké fáze je proto, že náš výzkum ukazuje, že váš konkrétní pozemek má potenciálně "vysoký výnos".

errors.contrastive: But the real reason I'm here at this early stage is because our research shows that your particular plot of land has a potentially "high decree".
But the real reason I'm here at this early stage is because our research shows that your particular plot of land has a potentially "high edict".

reference: So if you had held your bank stocks up to the end of last year, over 110 years your investment would have yielded an annual average return of less than 3%, still broadly a break-even strategy.
source: Kdybyste tedy drželi své bankovní akcie až do konce loňského roku, pak by průměrný roční výnos z vaší investice činil za 110 let necelá 3%, což je stále víceméně nerozhodný souboj.

errors.contrastive: So if you had held your bank stocks up to the end of last year, over 110 years your investment would have yielded an annual average decree of less than 3%, still broadly a break-even strategy.
So if you had held your bank stocks up to the end of last year, over 110 years your investment would have yielded an annual average edict of less than 3%, still broadly a break-even strategy.

reference: The principle of fisheries management based on maximum sustainable yield (MSY) rather than shortterm considerations was adopted (1).
source: Byl přijat princip řízení rybolovu opírající se o maximální udržitelný výnos spíše než o krátkodobé úvahy (1).

errors.contrastive: The principle of fisheries management based on maximum sustainable decree (MSY) rather than shortterm considerations was adopted (1).
The principle of fisheries management based on maximum sustainable edict (MSY) rather than shortterm considerations was adopted (1).

reference: A mechanism based solely on pro-rata contributions, under the form of mere provisions of reserves, would imply a major burden on Member States, which would have to find the cash or capital to deposit without this bringing any yield or return.
source: Mechanismus založený pouze na poměrných příspěvcích ve formě pouhých ustanovení o rezervách by znamenal velkou zátěž pro členské státy, které by musely nalézt hotovost nebo kapitál pro vklady, aniž by to přineslo jakýkoli příjem či výnos.

errors.contrastive: A mechanism based solely on pro-rata contributions, under the form of mere provisions of reserves, would imply a major burden on Member States, which would have to find the cash or capital to deposit without this bringing any yield or decree.

A mechanism based solely on pro-rata contributions, under the form of mere provisions of reserves, would imply a major burden on Member States, which would have to find the cash or capital to deposit without this bringing any yield or edict.

reference: But all proceeds go to the Trevor project, a crisis and suicide hotline for LGBTQ youth, so yay.
source: Ale veškerý výnos poputuje projektu Trevor, krizové a sebevražedné horké lince pro LGBTQ mládež, takže jupí.

errors.contrastive: But all decree go to the Trevor project, a crisis and suicide hotline for LGBTQ youth, so yay.
But all edict go to the Trevor project, a crisis and suicide hotline for LGBTQ youth, so yay.

reference: The yield on the United Kingdom's 30-year government bond fell to 2.04% on the same day.
source: Výnos 30letého vládního dluhopisu ve Velké Británii se ve stejný den propadl na 2,04%.

errors.contrastive: The decree on the United Kingdom's 30-year government bond fell to 2.04% on the same day.
The edict on the United Kingdom's 30-year government bond fell to 2.04% on the same day.

reference: Paragraph 40 of Chronopost I makes it clear that the ‘adequate return on investment’ should derive from the price charged for commercial and logistical assistance.
source: Z bodu 40 rozsudku Chronopost I vyplývá, že „přiměřený výnos z kapitálu“ je třeba odvozovat od protiplnění požadovaného za logistickou a obchodní podporu.

errors.contrastive: Paragraph 40 of Chronopost I makes it clear that the ‘adequate decree on investment’ should derive from the price charged for commercial and logistical assistance.
Paragraph 40 of Chronopost I makes it clear that the ‘adequate edict on investment’ should derive from the price charged for commercial and logistical assistance.

reference: As regards commitments, I should remind you that the Council considers it essential that these reach an appropriate overall level in the 2008 budget, with due regard to the capacities for absorption.
source: K závazkům bych rád připomněl, že Rada považuje za nezbytné, aby v rozpočtu na období 2008 dosáhly vhodné celkové úrovně s přihlédnutím k absorpční kapacitě.

errors.contrastive: As regards commitments, I should remind you that the advice considers it essential that these reach an appropriate overall level in the 2008 budget, with due regard to the capacities for absorption.

reference: It is widely known the Arab Council took power in my name.
source: Je známo, že Arabská rada převzala moc mým jménem.

errors.contrastive: It is widely known the Arab advice took power in my name.

reference: The resolution threatens that the Security Council will consider imposing sanctions against Sudanese leaders or against the country’s important oil sector, but introduces no penalties at this time.
source: Rezoluce sice hrozí, že Rada bezpečnosti zváží uvalení sankcí proti súdánským vůdcům či proti významnému ropnému sektoru země, ale v tuto chvíli žádné tresty nezavedla.

errors.contrastive: The resolution threatens that the Security advice will consider imposing sanctions against Sudanese leaders or against the country’s important oil sector, but introduces no penalties at this time.

reference: These included, first and foremost, the budgetary battles required in order for the Commission and, above all, the Council to acknowledge that an elected European Parliament had a legitimate right to exercise certain powers in this area.
source: Nejprve šlo o spory o rozpočet, kdy bylo třeba, aby Komise a zejména Rada přiznaly volenému shromáždění evropské úrovni legitimní pravomoci.

errors.contrastive: These included, first and foremost, the budgetary battles required in order for the Commission and, above all, the advice to acknowledge that an elected European Parliament had a legitimate right to exercise certain powers in this area.

reference: Why go along with everything the Council wants, even when that may work against the efficiency of logistics chains?
source: Proč se máme přizpůsobit tomu, co chce Rada, přestože to může zhoršit efektivitu logistického řetězce?

errors.contrastive: Why go along with everything the advice wants, even when that may work against the efficiency of logistics chains?

reference: Security Council want an explanation and I'm leaving it all up to you.
source: Jdeme, Doktore, Rada bezpečnosti chce vysvětlení a o něj se postaréte vy.

errors.contrastive: Security advice want an explanation and I'm leaving it all up to you.

reference: Although Iranian citizens had the right to elect their president, the candidates had to be vetted by the Council of Guardians, half of whom were picked by the unelected Supreme Leader.
source: Ačkoliv mají občané Íránu právo volit prezidenta, kandidáty musela nejprve prověřit Rada dohlížitelů, přičemž polovinu jejich členů vybral nikým nevolený nejvyšší vůdce.

errors.contrastive: Although Iranian citizens had the right to elect their president, the candidates had to be vetted by the advice of Guardians, half of whom were picked by the unelected Supreme Leader.

reference: In November 2008, the Council asked to Commission to prepare a proposal for transforming the European heritage label into an EU initiative.
source: V listopadu roku 2008 Rada vyzvala Komisi k přípravě návrhu, na jehož základě by se„značka evropského dědictví“ stala iniciativou EU.

errors.contrastive: In November 2008, the advice asked to Commission to prepare a proposal for transforming the European heritage label into an EU initiative.

reference: It is true that in the 2004 reform the Council opted for a bottom-up approach, with action by the national governments on the creation of the blocks.
source: Je pravda, že v rámci reformy v roce 2004 se Rada rozhodla pro přístup "zdola nahoru" a tvorbu bloků ponechala na vládách jednotlivých států.

errors.contrastive: It is true that in the 2004 reform the advice opted for a bottom-up approach, with action by the national governments on the creation of the blocks.

reference: I will argue the justice of this before the Council.
source: Tohle všem povím, až se sejde Velká rada.

errors.contrastive: I will argue the justice of this before the advice.

reference: Following NATO’s intervention, the United Nations Security Council unanimously adopted Resolution 1244, placing Kosovo under UN administration.
source: Rada bezpečnosti Organizace spojených národů po intervenci NATO jednohlasně přijala rezoluci 1244, která Kosovo umístila pod správu OSN.

errors.contrastive: Following NATO’s intervention, the United Nations Security advice unanimously adopted Resolution 1244, placing Kosovo under UN administration.

reference: The fact that the Treaties leave the conduct of the EU’s external policy to the Commission and Council has never prevented the European Parliament from acting in this area.
source: Skutečnost, že dle smluv vede zahraniční politiku Unie Komise a Rada, nikdy Parlamentu nezabránila, aby v této oblasti nerozvíjel vlastní aktivity.

errors.contrastive: The fact that the Treaties leave the conduct of the EU’s external policy to the Commission and advice has never prevented the European Parliament from acting in this area.

reference: At the present stage, the Council intends, so far as it is concerned, to accept the Common Foreign and Security Policy budget proposed in the preliminary draft budget as representing a provisional minimum.
source: V tomto stadiu se Rada domnívá, že může rozpočet na společnou zahraniční a bezpečnostní politiku uvedený v předběžném návrhu rozpočtu přijmout pouze jako provizorní minimální rozpočet.

errors.contrastive: At the present stage, the advice intends, so far as it is concerned, to accept the Common Foreign and Security Policy budget proposed in the preliminary draft budget as representing a provisional minimum.

reference: The alert order has gone to my bodyguard, who are not subject to decisions of the council.
source: Má osobní garda byl vzburcována, o tom rada rozhodovat nemusí.

errors.contrastive: The alert order has gone to my bodyguard, who are not subject to decisions of the advice.

reference: It was both right and important that the EU Council of Foreign Ministers agreed on sanctions against Iran.
source: Bylo správné a důležité, že se Rada ministrů zahraničí EU shodla na sankcích vůči Íránu.

errors.contrastive: It was both right and important that the EU advice of Foreign Ministers agreed on sanctions against Iran.

reference: The Flemish Interuniversity Council (Vlaamse Inter universitaire Raad - VLIR) gives advice andmakes proposals to the Minister of Education in thefield of university education.
source: V důsledku nedávno provedených reforem státní správy odpovídá za školskou politiku Vlaamse Raad (Vlámská rada, zákonodárná moc prostřed­nictvím schvalování dekretů) a vlámská vláda a její ministr školství (výkonná moc prostřednictvím vý­nosů).

errors.contrastive: The Flemish Interuniversity advice (Vlaamse Inter universitaire Raad - VLIR) gives advice andmakes proposals to the Minister of Education in thefield of university education.

reference: Could I ask that we stop whatever we are going to do until the Council is here to listen to us?
source: Mohla bych vás požádat, abychom nepodnikali nic, dokud nebude přítomna Rada a nebude nás moci vyslechnout?

errors.contrastive: Could I ask that we stop whatever we are going to do until the advice is here to listen to us?

reference: Now if you'll tell me what is so important... that a council of state must stop for it?
source: Tak teď, kdybyste mi řekla, co je tak důležité, že kvůli tomu musí být ukončena státní rada?

errors.contrastive: Now if you'll tell me what is so important... that a advice of state must stop for it?

reference: The United Nations Security Council has authorized the International Security Assistance Force to take all necessary measures to fulfill its mandate.
source: Rada bezpečnosti Organizace spojených národů zmocnila Mezinárodní síly bezpečnostní pomoci k provedení všech opatření nezbytných ke splnění jejich mandátu.

errors.contrastive: The United Nations Security advice has authorized the International Security Assistance Force to take all necessary measures to fulfill its mandate.

reference: The Interuniversity Research Council (DSE),which deals with research matters and iscomposed of academic researchers of international repute.
source: Národní rada pro vzdělávání (ESYP) předkládá vládě návrhy ve věcech vzdělávací politiky na všech úrovních systému školství, dalšího vzdělávání a vzdělávání dospělých.

errors.contrastive: The Interuniversity Research advice (DSE),which deals with research matters and iscomposed of academic researchers of international repute.

reference: The interpretation of Article 75 of course is how you refer back to Article 67 and the relevance of that within the context, and so the legal advice we have got is to try and seek to clarify where indeed this now fits.
source: Výklad článku 75 je samozřejmě spojen, jak říkáte, s článkem 67 a s jeho relevantností v kontextu, a právní rada, kterou jsem máme, je, že se musíme pokusit vyjasnit, jak mají věci do sebe zapadnout.

errors.contrastive: The interpretation of Article 75 of course is how you refer back to Article 67 and the relevance of that within the context, and so the legal council we have got is to try and seek to clarify where indeed this now fits.

reference: No, it was Torbis's blind advice that would have destroyed your kingdom.
source: Ne, to Tobisova slepá rada by znamenala zkázu království.

errors.contrastive: No, it was Torbis's blind council that would have destroyed your kingdom.

reference: Far too many people end up in the emergency room and the hospital because they lacked the advice and help to keep their conditions under control without institutional care, or even to prevent their disorders entirely.
source: Příliš mnoho lidí končí na pohotovosti a v nemocnici proto, že jim chyběla rada a pomoc, aby svůj stav udrželi pod kontrolou bez ústavní péče, nebo aby svým neduhům dokonce zcela předešli.

errors.contrastive: Far too many people end up in the emergency room and the hospital because they lacked the council and help to keep their conditions under control without institutional care, or even to prevent their disorders entirely.

reference: —the European Union mission to provide advice and assistance for security sector reform in the Democratic Republic of the Congo (EUSEC RD Congo) (13
source: Rada uvedla, že je naprosto nutné, aby mise Africké unie v Súdánu (AMIS) získala od mezinárodního společenství podporu, kterou potřebuje, aby mohla pokračovat ve svém poslání až do úplného předání svých úkolů misi UNA-MID.

errors.contrastive: —the European Union mission to provide council and assistance for security sector reform in the Democratic Republic of the Congo (EUSEC RD Congo) (13

reference: My advice to the Presidency is that it should take Rochefoucauld's words seriously, in its capacities both as the holder of the EU Presidency and the Hungarian Government.
source: Moje rada předsednictví je taková, že by mělo vzít Rochefoucauldova slova vážně, jak v pozici nositele předsednictví EU, tak v pozici maďarské vlády.

errors.contrastive: My council to the Presidency is that it should take Rochefoucauld's words seriously, in its capacities both as the holder of the EU Presidency and the Hungarian Government.

reference: That's the best advice I've had since I've been on this trip.
source: To je ta nejlepší rada, kterou jsem dostal od té doby, co jsem na téhle cestě.

errors.contrastive: That's the best council I've had since I've been on this trip.

reference: Of course, such advice, like much of newspapers themselves nowadays, comes free of charge.
source: Taková rada je podobně jako velká část samotných dnešních novin pochopitelně bezplatná.

errors.contrastive: Of course, such council, like much of newspapers themselves nowadays, comes free of charge.

reference: In such circumstances, the patient might legitimately fear that, when the practitioner advises or recommends that he follow a course of treatment, that advice or recommendation is motivated, at least in part, by the economic interests of the practitioner.
source: V takovém případě by se pacient mohl oprávněně obávat, že pokud mu lékař radí nebo doporučuje, aby využil péče, tato rada nebo toto doporučení je alespoň zčásti odůvodněno hospodářským zájmem tohoto lékaře.

errors.contrastive: In such circumstances, the patient might legitimately fear that, when the practitioner advises or recommends that he follow a course of treatment, that council or recommendation is motivated, at least in part, by the economic interests of the practitioner.

reference: I believe that this was not good advice because encouraging a country to prove itself to be vindictive, or in any event decided in its resistance, when it is not given the means, does not sit very well with me.
source: Domnívám se, že to nebyla dobrá rada, protože podporovat zemi v její pomstychtivosti nebo ve vzdoru za každou cenu, když k tomu nemá prostředky, mi nepřipadá nejlepší.

errors.contrastive: I believe that this was not good council because encouraging a country to prove itself to be vindictive, or in any event decided in its resistance, when it is not given the means, does not sit very well with me.

reference: How can I repay the many others, so many, I couldn't possibly name them all, whose help, guidance, and advice have made this, the happiest night of my life, possible.
source: Jak mohu splatit svůj dluh mnoha dalším, tolika, že jejich jména nemohu všechna vyčíslit, jejichž pomoc a rada umožnily tento večer, nejšťastnější večer mého života.

errors.contrastive: How can I repay the many others, so many, I couldn't possibly name them all, whose help, guidance, and council have made this, the happiest night of my life, possible.

reference: Such advice is always tough to sell – all the more so in the face of the worst economic outlook in 70 years.
source: Taková rada se vždy prodává těžko – tím spíše ve světle nejhorších hospodářských vyhlídek za posledních 70 let.

errors.contrastive: Such council is always tough to sell – all the more so in the face of the worst economic outlook in 70 years.

reference: My advice to an entrepreneur – how to overcome a crisis …To start again immediately after a failure and to always offer high quality goods or services.
source: Moje rada podnikatelům – jak překonat krizi ...Hned po potížích začít znovu a vždy nabízet vysoce kvalitní zboží nebo služby.

errors.contrastive: My council to an entrepreneur – how to overcome a crisis …To start again immediately after a failure and to always offer high quality goods or services.

reference: There are many, many issues we can advise these countries on, and I believe that if the advice is sensible, it is acceptable.
source: Existuje mnoho a mnoho věcí, které lze těmto zemím poradit, a myslím si, že pokud bude daná rada rozumná, je přijatelná.

errors.contrastive: There are many, many issues we can advise these countries on, and I believe that if the council is sensible, it is acceptable.

reference: So you had better produce him, that's my advice to you for what it's worth.
source: Takže byste ho měl raději předvést, to je jediná rada jakou vám mohu dát.

errors.contrastive: So you had better produce him, that's my council to you for what it's worth.

reference: This advice applies to the long-stalled Israel-Palestine peace process, newly revived by US Secretary of State John Kerry.
source: Simon, hráčům, aby se nesnažili „o nejlepší možný výsledek, nýbrž o nejlepší možný výsledek“ s partnerem, kterého máte. Tato rada platí i pro dlouho zaseknutý izraelsko-palestinský mírový proces, jejž nově oživil americký ministr zahraničí John Kerry.

errors.contrastive: But the three stood apart, meaning you break each chain of letters into three equal rows. Then you just..

reference: My whole life's some money in the bank, some suits in my closet and a string of one-night stands.
source: Můj celý život jsou nějaké peníze v bance, několik obleků ve skříni a řetězec schůzek na jednu noc.

errors.contrastive: My whole life's some money in the bank, some suits in my closet and a chain of one-night stands.

reference: Remember that baseball player with the string of strip clubs?
source: Pamatuješ toho baseballistu, co měl řetězec strip klubů?

errors.contrastive: Remember that baseball player with the chain of strip clubs?

reference: RNA is a giant molecular string made up of four different basic building blocks.
source: RNA je obří molekulární řetězec, tvořený čtyřmi různými základními stavebními prvky.

errors.contrastive: RNA is a giant molecular chain made up of four different basic building blocks.

reference: It's reasonable to wonder if a gravitational pull, even as strong as a cosmic string, would affect them.
source: Je logické se ptát, zda je vůbec ovlivňuje gravitační tah, ať je třeba silný jako vesmírný řetězec.

errors.contrastive: It's reasonable to wonder if a gravitational pull, even as strong as a cosmic chain, would affect them.

reference: Each letter is Assigned a bit string Of 5 binary digits.
source: Každému písmenu je přiřazen 5 - ti místný řetězec znaků.

errors.contrastive: Each letter is Assigned a bit chain Of 5 binary digits.

reference: That old brick-presser over there said he saw a cop string him up.
source: Ten starý cihla-lis tamhle řekl, že viděl policajt řetězec ho.

errors.contrastive: That old brick-presser over there said he saw a cop chain him up.

reference: In this case, it was a long string of letters and numbers.
source: V tomhle případě je to dlouhý řetězec znaků a čísel.

errors.contrastive: In this case, it was a long chain of letters and numbers.

reference: Among the billions of zeros and ones making up this image is a string of text.
source: Mezi těmi miliardami nul a jedniček, které tvoří obrázek, je textový řetězec.

errors.contrastive: Among the billions of zeros and ones making up this image is a chain of text.

reference: The global chain is becoming longer and longer, and there is no longer any item which we can be absolutely certain has been produced only in one country.
source: Globální řetězec se stává stále delším a již neexistuje žádné zboží, o němž si můžeme být absolutně jistí, že bylo vyrobeno pouze v jedné zemi.

errors.contrastive: The global string is becoming longer and longer, and there is no longer any item which we can be absolutely certain has been produced only in one country.

reference: We must break the chain of events that led up to it and going out of here might be just what we're not supposed to do.
source: Musíme přerušit řetězec událostí, které k tomu vedou a zmizet odsud může být přesně to, co nesmíme.

errors.contrastive: We must break the string of events that led up to it and going out of here might be just what we're not supposed to do.

reference: It is more feasible to diversify the supply chain, albeit incrementally, by importing gas from distant producers rather than from monopolistic suppliers next door.
source: Diverzifikovat dodavatelský řetězec třeba i po malých částech dovozem plynu od vzdálených producentů je schůdnější než odebírat plyn od monopolních dodavatelů za humny.

errors.contrastive: It is more feasible to diversify the supply string, albeit incrementally, by importing gas from distant producers rather than from monopolistic suppliers next door.

reference: The Authority assessesrisks to the food chain and carries out scientific assessment on any matter that mayaffect the safety of food in Europe.
source: Úřadhodnotí rizika pro potravní řetězec a provádívědecké hodnocení jakékoliv záležitosti,která může nepříznivě ovlivnit bezpečnostpotravin v Evropě.

errors.contrastive: The Authority assessesrisks to the food string and carries out scientific assessment on any matter that mayaffect the safety of food in Europe.

reference: We ask it to take into account the position of Parliament and the Standing Committee on the Food Chain and Animal Health: to put health before trade.
source: Požádali jsem ji, aby vzala v úvahu stanovisko Parlamentu a Stálého výboru pro potravinový řetězec a zdraví zvířat: upřednostnit zdraví před obchodem.

errors.contrastive: We ask it to take into account the position of Parliament and the Standing Committee on the Food string and Animal Health: to put health before trade.

reference: A chain of circumstances that fragments the law that holds the universe together.
source: Řetězec okolností, které narušují řád, jenž drží vesmír pohromadě.

errors.contrastive: A string of circumstances that fragments the law that holds the universe together.

reference: Given such profound changes, financial leaders should think about how to orchestrate a new financial supply chain – the “killer app” for our still new century.
source: S přihlédnutím k tak hlubokým změnám je potřeba, aby finanční lídři přemýšleli, jak ve finančnictví připravit nový dodavatelský řetězec – „trhák“ v Jobsově stylu pro naše stále ještě mladé století.

errors.contrastive: Given such profound changes, financial leaders should think about how to orchestrate a new financial supply string – the “killer app” for our still new century.

reference: Very little can be achieved if the forthcoming reform fails to motivate the catching sector, the processing and seafood chain as well as consumers to support the objectives of the policy and take responsibility for implementing them effectively.
source: Pokud nadcházející reforma nedokáže motivovat odvětví rybolovu a zpracovatelský řetězec mořských produktů, stejně jako spotřebitele, aby podporovali cíle politiky a převzali odpovědnost za jejich efektivní provádění, bude úspěch velmi malý.

errors.contrastive: Very little can be achieved if the forthcoming reform fails to motivate the catching sector, the processing and seafood string as well as consumers to support the objectives of the policy and take responsibility for implementing them effectively.

reference: That said, when the proposal was presented to the Standing Committee of the Food Chain and Animal Health on 2 June, 26 Member States expressed a negative opinion and one abstained.
source: Přestože byl návrh 2. června předložený Stálému výboru pro potravinový řetězec a zdraví zvířat, 26 členských států vyjádřilo záporné stanovisko a jeden se zdržel.

errors.contrastive: That said, when the proposal was presented to the Standing Committee of the Food string and Animal Health on 2 June, 26 Member States expressed a negative opinion and one abstained.

reference: No, I've got a chain of stores, but I'm in the grocery game.
source: Ne, mám řetězec obchodů, ale podnikám v potravinách.

errors.contrastive: No, I've got a string of stores, but I'm in the grocery game.

reference: In Zambia, for example, Sylva Banda ignited a craze for authentic traditional meals two decades ago with a chain of popular restaurants.
source: V Zambii například Sylva Bandová už před dvěma desítkami let skrze svůj řetězec populárních restaurací vyvolala posedlost tradičními pokrmy.

errors.contrastive: In Zambia, for example, Sylva Banda ignited a craze for authentic traditional meals two decades ago with a string of popular restaurants.

reference: By adopting a global approach, which takes account of the entire value chain — from planning to implementation and specialist training — POWER will consolidate the position of the North Sea region as a frontrunner in this sector, if not the leader, by 2015.’
source: Přijetím globálního přístupu, který zohledňuje celý hodnotový řetězec – od plánování až po instalaci a školení odborníků – by měl POWER posílit postavení oblasti Severního moře na špičce tohoto průmyslu, dokonce ji do roku 2015 dostat na první místo.“

errors.contrastive: By adopting a global approach, which takes account of the entire value string — from planning to implementation and specialist training — POWER will consolidate the position of the North Sea region as a frontrunner in this sector, if not the leader, by 2015.’

reference: We will get there if we manage to adopt a more comprehensive approach to forests in temperate zones, at least within the European Union; an approach that ensures both that wood products are manufactured in an honest way and also the traceability of the entire selling chain.
source: Dosáhneme jej, pokud se nám podaří zaujmout komplexnější přístup k lesům v mírných pásmech, alespoň v rámci Evropské unie; přístup, který zajistí, aby byly dřevařské výrobky vyráběny čestným způsobem a aby bylo možné vystopovat celý prodejní řetězec.

errors.contrastive: We will get there if we manage to adopt a more comprehensive approach to forests in temperate zones, at least within the European Union; an approach that ensures both that wood products are manufactured in an honest way and also the traceability of the entire selling string.

reference: On this planet water changes to a chain of molecules.
source: Na této planetě se voda mění na řetězec molekul.

errors.contrastive: On this planet water changes to a string of molecules.

reference: The chain already sells only Fairtrade tea and coffee in its 200 Café Revive coffee shops.
source: Ve svých 200 kavárnách Café Revive už řetězec prodává pouze čaj a kávu se značkou Fairtrade.
