reference: Throughout the sector, the production and marketing chain offers full transparency to authorities and consumers on theorigin of raw materials ‘from net to plate.’
source: Produkční a tržní řetězec nabízí orgánům i spotřebitelům napříč celým odvětvím plnou transparentnost ohledněpůvo-du surovin „ze sítě až na talíř“.

errors.contrastive: Throughout the sector, the production and marketing string offers full transparency to authorities and consumers on theorigin of raw materials ‘from net to plate.’

reference: It brings no added value, only complexity, confusion and duplication, when the situation demands coherence, an unambiguous chain of command and political control, and robust rules of engagement.
source: Nepřináší žádnou přidanou hodnotu, pouze složitost, zmatek a zdvojení, když daná situace vyžaduje konzistenci, jednoznačný řetězec velení a politické kontroly a přímočará pravidla pro zapojení do konfliktu.

errors.contrastive: It brings no added value, only complexity, confusion and duplication, when the situation demands coherence, an unambiguous string of command and political control, and robust rules of engagement.

reference: MRS. CATHY MARNO. THE HUDSON AUTOMAT CHAIN TAKES GREAT PLEASURE IN PRESENTING YOU, OUR ONE MILLIONTH CUSTOMER,
source: Paní Cathy Marno, Hudsonův řetězec automatů... vám s potěšením oznamuje, že jako miliontý zákazník... získáváte šek na $1 million.

errors.contrastive: MRS. CATHY MARNO. THE HUDSON AUTOMAT string TAKES GREAT PLEASURE IN PRESENTING YOU, OUR ONE MILLIONTH CUSTOMER,

reference: Kerr described what he called “supply chain attacks” in which hackers not only steal proprietary information, but go further and insert erroneous data and programs in communications hardware and software – Trojan horses that can be used to bring down systems.
source: Kerr popsal problém, který pojmenoval „útoky přes dodavatelský řetězec“, kdy hackeři nejen kradou chráněné informace, ale jdou ještě dál a do komunikačního hardwaru a softwaru vkládají chybná data a programy – trojské koně, skrze něž lze způsobit pády systémů.

errors.contrastive: Kerr described what he called “supply string attacks” in which hackers not only steal proprietary information, but go further and insert erroneous data and programs in communications hardware and software – Trojan horses that can be used to bring down systems.

reference: This monitoring tool should provide better information to consumers, public authorities and market operators and so addressthelack of transparency of prices andimprove the knowledgeoftheimpactofregulation along the food supply chain.
source: Tento ná-strojby mělposkytovatlepšíinformace spotřebitelům, veřejným orgánům a tržním subjektům, a takto se zabývat nedostatečnou transparentností cen, a měl by zlepšitpoznatkyodopaduregulacena řetězec potravinového zásobování.

errors.contrastive: This monitoring tool should provide better information to consumers, public authorities and market operators and so addressthelack of transparency of prices andimprove the knowledgeoftheimpactofregulation along the food supply string.

reference: The expression 'climate refugee' has not yet entered the vocabulary of current international law.
source: Výraz "klimatický uprchlík" dosud do slovníku současného mezinárodního práva nevstoupil.

errors.contrastive: The expression 'climate runaway' has not yet entered the vocabulary of current international law.
The expression 'climate fugitive' has not yet entered the vocabulary of current international law.

reference: Why does a dead refugee have a photo of two children outside your convent?
source: Proč měl mrtvý uprchlík fotku dětí před vaším klášterem?

errors.contrastive: Why does a dead runaway have a photo of two children outside your convent?
Why does a dead fugitive have a photo of two children outside your convent?

reference: Sheikh Ahmad Yasin, a paraplegic refugee from the village of Jora (now on Israel’s southern coast), worked quietly to build a grass-root movement with the tacit assent of the Israeli army, which sought to encourage an alternative to the PLO.
source: Šajch Ahmad Jásin, ochrnutý uprchlík z vesnice Jora (dnes ležící na jižním pobřeží Izraele), v tichosti budoval všelidové hnutí, čemuž izraelská armáda s tichým souhlasem přihlížela, neboť se snažila podpořit alternativu k OOP.

errors.contrastive: Sheikh Ahmad Yasin, a paraplegic runaway from the village of Jora (now on Israel’s southern coast), worked quietly to build a grass-root movement with the tacit assent of the Israeli army, which sought to encourage an alternative to the PLO.

Sheikh Ahmad Yasin, a paraplegic fugitive from the village of Jora (now on Israel’s southern coast), worked quietly to build a grass-root movement with the tacit assent of the Israeli army, which sought to encourage an alternative to the PLO.

reference: – Iron out inconsistencies in Europe’s Asylum System in particular by standardising the definition of a refugee.
source: – odstranění rozdílů v evropském azylovém systému, zejména standardním vymezením pojmu „uprchlík“;

errors.contrastive: – Iron out inconsistencies in Europe’s Asylum System in particular by standardising the definition of a runaway.
– Iron out inconsistencies in Europe’s Asylum System in particular by standardising the definition of a fugitive.

reference: It is absolutely incorrect to say that even one refugee from Camp Ashraf or the alternative camp has been transferred to Europe or even within Iraq with the support of the High Commissioner.
source: Je naprosto nesprávné říkat, že byl i třeba jeden jediný uprchlík z tábora Ashraf nebo jiného tábora přesunut do Evropy či v rámci Iráku s podporou Nejvyššího komisaře OSN.

errors.contrastive: It is absolutely incorrect to say that even one runaway from Camp Ashraf or the alternative camp has been transferred to Europe or even within Iraq with the support of the High Commissioner.
It is absolutely incorrect to say that even one fugitive from Camp Ashraf or the alternative camp has been transferred to Europe or even within Iraq with the support of the High Commissioner.

reference: I don't ask questions after eleven years here, and I'm a certified refugee.
source: Nekladu otázky. Jsem tu 11 let a jsem uznaný uprchlík.

errors.contrastive: I don't ask questions after eleven years here, and I'm a certified runaway.
I don't ask questions after eleven years here, and I'm a certified fugitive.

reference: The decision was likely driven, at least partly, by how difficult it is, given the EU’s porous internal borders, to determine where a refugee first entered.
source: Toto rozhodnutí bylo zřejmě přinejmenším zčásti motivováno tím, jak těžké je určit, kudy uprchlík prvně vstoupil do EU, vzhledem k tomu, jak prostupné jsou vnitřní hranice.

errors.contrastive: The decision was likely driven, at least partly, by how difficult it is, given the EU’s porous internal borders, to determine where a runaway first entered.
The decision was likely driven, at least partly, by how difficult it is, given the EU’s porous internal borders, to determine where a fugitive first entered.

reference: Increased attention must be given to transposing further and implementing effectively the acquis, in order to be able to meet the obligations of membership in good time, particularly in judicial and administrative reforms, the fight against corruption, minority rights and refugee return.
source: Zvýšenou pozornost je teba vnovat dalšímu provádní a účinnému uplatování acquis, aby Chorvatsko bylo schopno v pimené dob splnit závazky spojené s členstvím, zejména pokud jde o justiční a správní reformu, boj proti korupci, práva menšin a navracení uprchlík$.

errors.contrastive: Increased attention must be given to transposing further and implementing effectively the acquis, in order to be able to meet the obligations of membership in good time, particularly in judicial and administrative reforms, the fight against corruption, minority rights and runaway return.

Increased attention must be given to transposing further and implementing effectively the acquis, in order to be able to meet the obligations of membership in good time, particularly in judicial and administrative reforms, the fight against corruption, minority rights and fugitive return.

reference: You would be aware of the 1951 Convention on Refugees that says that a refugee should claim asylum in the first safe country - but you disregard that.
source: Jistě znáte Úmluvu o uprchlících z roku 1951, ve které stojí, že uprchlík by měl žádat o azyl v první bezpečné zemi. Ale vy to přehlížíte.

errors.contrastive: You would be aware of the 1951 Convention on Refugees that says that a runaway should claim asylum in the first safe country - but you disregard that.
You would be aware of the 1951 Convention on Refugees that says that a fugitive should claim asylum in the first safe country - but you disregard that.

reference: A subscriber in West Germany wired me... that Mrs. Campbell had just arrived as a refugee.
source: Jeden předplatitel ze západního Německa mi poslal telegram, že paní Campbellová právě přijela coby uprchlík.

errors.contrastive: A subscriber in West Germany wired me... that Mrs. Campbell had just arrived as a runaway.
A subscriber in West Germany wired me... that Mrs. Campbell had just arrived as a fugitive.

reference: The typical refugee child spends more than ten years away from home.
source: Typický dětský uprchlík stráví mimo domov víc než deset let.

errors.contrastive: The typical runaway child spends more than ten years away from home.
The typical fugitive child spends more than ten years away from home.

reference: Since the asylum systems in the different Member States have different levels of stringency, a well-advised refugee would settle initially in the Member State that has the most lenient asylum law with the most loopholes.
source: Vzhledem k tomu, že azylové systémy v jednotlivých členských státech jsou různě přísné, dobře poučený uprchlík nejprve zamíří do členského státu, jehož azylové právní předpisy jsou nevolnější a mají nejvíce děr.

errors.contrastive: Since the asylum systems in the different Member States have different levels of stringency, a well-advised runaway would settle initially in the Member State that has the most lenient asylum law with the most loopholes.

Since the asylum systems in the different Member States have different levels of stringency, a well-advised fugitive would settle initially in the Member State that has the most lenient asylum law with the most loopholes.

reference: The Lebanese identity card my father says he is ... a Palestinian refugee.
source: Zde je libanonská občanka mého otce a tam je napsáno, že je... palestinský uprchlík.

errors.contrastive: The Lebanese identity card my father says he is ... a Palestinian runaway.
The Lebanese identity card my father says he is ... a Palestinian fugitive.

reference: If an application is successful, a refugee has the right to bring along his or her family members as well.
source: Je-li žádost kladně vyřízena, má uprchlík právo přivést s sebou i rodinné příslušníky.

errors.contrastive: If an application is successful, a runaway has the right to bring along his or her family members as well.
If an application is successful, a fugitive has the right to bring along his or her family members as well.

reference: He's a genuine refugee, and has no connection to the murders.
source: Je to opravdový uprchlík a s vraždami nemá nic společného.

errors.contrastive: He's a genuine runaway, and has no connection to the murders.
He's a genuine fugitive, and has no connection to the murders.

reference: But as the number of people seeking asylum has grown, it has become difficult for tribunals and courts to determine who is a refugee, as defined by the Convention, and who is a well-coached migrant seeking a better life in a more affluent country.
source: S rostoucím počtem lidí usilujících o azyl však začalo být složité, aby tribunály a soudy určovaly, kdo je uprchlík v souladu s konvencí OSN, a kdo je jen dobře trénovaný běženec hledající lepší život v zámožnější zemi.

errors.contrastive: But as the number of people seeking asylum has grown, it has become difficult for tribunals and courts to determine who is a runaway, as defined by the Convention, and who is a well-coached migrant seeking a better life in a more affluent country.

But as the number of people seeking asylum has grown, it has become difficult for tribunals and courts to determine who is a fugitive, as defined by the Convention, and who is a well-coached migrant seeking a better life in a more affluent country.

reference: Uncle Alfonso, didn't you say Kassandra was a refugee?
source: Strýčku Alfonso, řekl jsi mi, že Kasandra byla uprchlík.

errors.contrastive: Uncle Alfonso, didn't you say Kassandra was a runaway?
Uncle Alfonso, didn't you say Kassandra was a fugitive?

reference: This will be pronounced an unlawful killing by a desperate fugitive already wanted for another crime.

errors.contrastive: This will be pronounced an unlawful killing by a desperate refugee already wanted for another crime.

errors.contrastive: She has received death threats from Muslim extremists ever since she renounced – indeed, denounced – her Muslim faith, and was forced to live as a virtual refugee, albeit under the protection of the Dutch state.

source: Jejich pokožka, ruce, orgány, nic takového jsem neviděla.

The skin, hands, organs - they were nothing I'd ever seen.

reference: The epidermis is healthy, save for a few batches of sun damage.
source: Pokožka je zdravá, jako by na ni nesvítilo škodlivé slunce.

errors.contrastive: The complexion is healthy, save for a few batches of sun damage.
The skin is healthy, save for a few batches of sun damage.

reference: The epidermis is magenta, appears transparent and is extremely thin... allowing visualization of muscles and individual muscle fibers.
source: Pokožka je purpurová, zdá se být průhledná a extrémně tenká. Umožňuje zviditelnění svalů a jednotlivých svalových vláken.

errors.contrastive: The complexion is magenta, appears transparent and is extremely thin... allowing visualization of muscles and individual muscle fibers.
The skin is magenta, appears transparent and is extremely thin... allowing visualization of muscles and individual muscle fibers.

reference: Well, her epidermis seems intact, but she's tangled up in some of the stations cables.
source: No, její pokožka vypadá netknutě, ale je přichycena několika staničními kabely.

errors.contrastive: Well, her complexion seems intact, but she's tangled up in some of the stations cables.
Well, her skin seems intact, but she's tangled up in some of the stations cables.

reference: It appears only when the skin is warmed up.
source: Objeví se to jen, když mi zteplá pokožka.

errors.contrastive: It appears only when the complexion is warmed up.
It appears only when the epidermis is warmed up.

reference: Human skin is simply not designed to withstand the abrasive characteristics of a typical road surface.
source: Lidská pokožka není uzpůsobena tomu, aby snesla abrazivní vlastnosti typického povrchu silnice.

errors.contrastive: Human complexion is simply not designed to withstand the abrasive characteristics of a typical road surface.
Human epidermis is simply not designed to withstand the abrasive characteristics of a typical road surface.

reference: So your skin absorbs a little dye, the odd chemical here and there.
source: Takže tvoje pokožka absorbuje tu a tam trochu divné chemické barvy.

errors.contrastive: So your complexion absorbs a little dye, the odd chemical here and there.
So your epidermis absorbs a little dye, the odd chemical here and there.

reference: Your skin is supposed to be absorbing the moisture in your mask.
source: Tvá pokožka by teď měla vstřebávat vlhkost z tvé masky.

errors.contrastive: Your complexion is supposed to be absorbing the moisture in your mask.
Your epidermis is supposed to be absorbing the moisture in your mask.

reference: See how perfectly drie and preserved the skin is.
source: Vidíš, jak je ta pokožka dokonale vysušená a zachovalá.

errors.contrastive: See how perfectly drie and preserved the complexion is.
See how perfectly drie and preserved the epidermis is.

reference: Our eyes are not sensitive to this kind of light, but our skin is-- we feel it as heat.
source: Naše oči nejsou citlivé na tento druh světla, ale naše pokožka je-- cítíme je jako teplo.

errors.contrastive: Our eyes are not sensitive to this kind of light, but our complexion is-- we feel it as heat.
Our eyes are not sensitive to this kind of light, but our epidermis is-- we feel it as heat.

reference: Once stimulated, the female will respond in such a way that the skin around her...
source: Jedno podráždění, a žena odpoví takovým způsobem, že pokožka kolem ní...

errors.contrastive: Once stimulated, the female will respond in such a way that the complexion around her...
Once stimulated, the female will respond in such a way that the epidermis around her...

reference: Her skin glistens. Her petite ankle slips into the perfumed water. Then her sensuous legs, until finally her whole body is caressed with foam.
source: Její pokožka se leskne, její tenké lýtka se ponoří do vonící vody... i její smyslné nohy, dokud celým jejím tělem neprojde záchvěv vzrušení...

errors.contrastive: Her complexion glistens. Her petite ankle slips into the perfumed water. Then her sensuous legs, until finally her whole body is caressed with foam.
Her epidermis glistens. Her petite ankle slips into the perfumed water. Then her sensuous legs, until finally her whole body is caressed with foam.

reference: Skin feels... clammy, but you say you feel fine?
source: Pokožka je... chladná, ale cítíš se dobře?

errors.contrastive: complexion feels... clammy, but you say you feel fine?
epidermis feels... clammy, but you say you feel fine?

reference: Your hair is the color of the sun, your skin is like fresh milk, and everyone loves you.
source: Tvé vlasy jsou barvy slunce. Tvá pokožka je jak čerstvé mléko. - A všichni tě milují.

errors.contrastive: Your hair is the color of the sun, your complexion is like fresh milk, and everyone loves you.
Your hair is the color of the sun, your epidermis is like fresh milk, and everyone loves you.

reference: CLEAN HAIR,SMOOTH SKIN, WEARING MY SUNDAY BEST.
source: Čisté vlasy, jemná pokožka, oblečená v mém "nedělním".

errors.contrastive: CLEAN HAIR,SMOOTH complexion, WEARING MY SUNDAY BEST.
CLEAN HAIR,SMOOTH epidermis, WEARING MY SUNDAY BEST.

reference: It takes a while for the throbbing to stop and the skin to grow back.
source: Chvíli trvá, než bolest přestane a pokožka sroste.

errors.contrastive: It takes a while for the throbbing to stop and the complexion to grow back.
It takes a while for the throbbing to stop and the epidermis to grow back.

reference: What a repulsive creature you are, constantly shedding your skin and hair, leaving your oily sweat on everything you touch.
source: Jak odpudivá stvoření jste, vaše pokožka a vlasy vám neustále opadávají, na všem čeho se dotknete zůstává mastná stopa.

errors.contrastive: What a repulsive creature you are, constantly shedding your complexion and hair, leaving your oily sweat on everything you touch.
What a repulsive creature you are, constantly shedding your epidermis and hair, leaving your oily sweat on everything you touch.

reference: Her organs stopped working, her skin became... diseased, er, rotten.
source: Její orgány přestaly pracovat, její pokožka byla...nemocná, ehm, hnila.

errors.contrastive: Her organs stopped working, her complexion became... diseased, er, rotten.
Her organs stopped working, her epidermis became... diseased, er, rotten.

reference: Intact skin is mottled and discoloured due to submergence in and exposure to a highly bacterial environment.
source: Neporušená pokožka je mramorovaná a vybledlá což je důsledek působení prostředí s vysokou koncentrací bakterií.

errors.contrastive: Intact complexion is mottled and discoloured due to submergence in and exposure to a highly bacterial environment.
Intact epidermis is mottled and discoloured due to submergence in and exposure to a highly bacterial environment.

reference: I was just making sure that Your flawless skin wasn't harmed.
source: Jenom jsem se ujišťoval, že tvoje nádherná pokožka je v pořádku.

errors.contrastive: I was just making sure that Your flawless complexion wasn't harmed.
I was just making sure that Your flawless epidermis wasn't harmed.

reference: You should leave a small bare patch at the base of the spine to allow the skin to breathe.
source: Vždycky se má nechat holý proužek tam, kde začíná páteř, aby pokožka mohla dýchat.

errors.contrastive: You should leave a small bare patch at the base of the spine to allow the complexion to breathe.
You should leave a small bare patch at the base of the spine to allow the epidermis to breathe.

reference: Muscle, bone, all of it is slowly liquefiied for easy digestion while the victim's skin is made hard and brittle forming a sack or shell from which the reptile can drink.
source: Svaly, kosti, vše se začne pomalu rozpouštět pro lepší trávení, zatímco pokožka oběti tuhne a stává se z ní jakýsi druh skořápky, ze které může plaz sát.

errors.contrastive: Muscle, bone, all of it is slowly liquefiied for easy digestion while the victim's complexion is made hard and brittle forming a sack or shell from which the reptile can drink.
Muscle, bone, all of it is slowly liquefiied for easy digestion while the victim's epidermis is made hard and brittle forming a sack or shell from which the reptile can drink.

reference: My skin is far too excitable for wool, I fear.
source: Moje pokožka je příliš citlivá na to, aby přišla do styku s vlnou.

errors.contrastive: My complexion is far too excitable for wool, I fear.
My epidermis is far too excitable for wool, I fear.

reference: Can be measles Eraniano... or perhaps my skin has been full of termites Steiner...
source: Mohla jsem dostat Irineanské spalničky, nebo byla třeba moje pokožka napadena nějakým roztočem, nebo...

errors.contrastive: Can be measles Eraniano... or perhaps my complexion has been full of termites Steiner...
Can be measles Eraniano... or perhaps my epidermis has been full of termites Steiner...

reference: Painful breathing, pale complexion... unsightly bone protrusions.
source: Bolestivé dýchání, bledá pokožka... nehezké výčnělky kostí.

errors.contrastive: Painful breathing, pale skin... unsightly bone protrusions.
Painful breathing, pale epidermis... unsightly bone protrusions.

reference: Tanned complexion was considered unattractive until 1920, when Coco Chanel went to the South of France and returned with a tan.
source: Opálená pokožka se považovala za neatraktivní do roku 1920, kdy Coco Chanelová odjela do jižní Francie a vrátila se opálená.

errors.contrastive: Tanned skin was considered unattractive until 1920, when Coco Chanel went to the South of France and returned with a tan.
Tanned epidermis was considered unattractive until 1920, when Coco Chanel went to the South of France and returned with a tan.

reference: Before one even addressed the matter of trade, the complexion is too weathered.
source: Na první pohled každého upoutá, že má látku z běžného obchodu. A její pokožka je příliš poznamenána počasím.

errors.contrastive: Before one even addressed the matter of trade, the skin is too weathered.
Before one even addressed the matter of trade, the epidermis is too weathered.

reference: Public opinion tends to take more notice of industrial accidents than of the wide diversity of occupational diseases.
source: Veřejné mínění má sklon si více všímat pracovních úrazů než velice rozmanitých nemocí z povolání.

errors.contrastive: Public opinion tends to take more notice of industrial accidents than of the wide diversity of trade diseases.

reference: I work in my apartment, and I have a rather unusual occupation.
source: Pracuji doma, a mé povolání je dost neobvyklé.

errors.contrastive: I work in my apartment, and I have a rather unusual trade.

reference: As nearly always happens, Phelps’s choice of vocation came after meeting an important professor, in this case the Harvard economist James Nelson.
source: A jak tomu téměř vždy bývá, pro své budoucí povolání se Phelps rozhodl po setkání s důležitým profesorem, v tomto případě s ekonomem z Harvardovy univerzity Jamesem Nelsonem.

errors.contrastive: As nearly always happens, Phelps’s choice of trade came after meeting an important professor, in this case the Harvard economist James Nelson.

reference: The spec ralized theo reticalknowledge acquired from the Berufsschule iscombined with occupational practice and applied inconcrete situations.
source: Rámcová kurikula a odborné kurzy na Berufsschule a předpisy o odborné přípravě vyučením na různá státem uznaná povolání připravují společně orgány spolkových zemí a orgány federace; koordinovaný postup zahrnuje i souhlas zaměstnavatelů a odborů.

errors.contrastive: The spec ralized theo reticalknowledge acquired from the Berufsschule iscombined with trade practice and applied inconcrete situations.

reference: Today we have highly-advanced legislation designed to support an appropriate preventive policy, define the obligations incumbent on undertakings and deal with new occupational diseases in Europe.
source: V Evropě máme dnes legislativu na vysoké úrovni, jejímž cílem je podpořit vhodnou preventivní politiku, definovat povinnosti firem a podniků a čelit novým nemocem z povolání.

errors.contrastive: Today we have highly-advanced legislation designed to support an appropriate preventive policy, define the obligations incumbent on undertakings and deal with new trade diseases in Europe.

reference: - The theater was my vocation, if I'd studied
source: - Jsem hladová. - Divadlo bylo mé povolání, v dobách mých studií.

errors.contrastive: - The theater was my trade, if I'd studied

reference: Cambridge – What if political leaders around the world could improve school achievement and job readiness, reduce crime, and extend healthy life expectancy – but the results would not be seen until after they left public office?
source: CAMBRIDGE – Co kdyby mohli političtí předáci po celém světě zlepšit školní výsledky dětí a jejich připravenost na povolání, snížit zločinnost a prodloužit průměrnou délku zdravého života – avšak výsledky jejich činnosti by se projevily až po jejich odchodu z veřejných funkcí?

errors.contrastive: Cambridge – What if political leaders around the world could improve school achievement and trade readiness, reduce crime, and extend healthy life expectancy – but the results would not be seen until after they left public office?

reference: Explanation on Article 15 — Freedom to choose an occupation and right to engage in work
source: Vysvětlení k článku 15 – Právo svobodné volby povolání a právo pracovat

errors.contrastive: Explanation on Article 15 — Freedom to choose an trade and right to engage in work

reference: We are actually told nothing, however, about the causes of occupational illness - of which there are three.
source: Ve skutečnosti se ale nedozvíme nic o příčinách nemocí z povolání - ty jsou tři.

errors.contrastive: We are actually told nothing, however, about the causes of trade illness - of which there are three.

reference: - For that reason death is... a part of our business.
source: - Z těchto důvodů je smrt ... součástí našeho povolání.

errors.contrastive: - For that reason death is... a part of our trade.

reference: Older information technology has already created "winner-take-all" effects in some occupations.
source: Starší informační technologie už u některých povolání způsobily, že „vítěz bere vše".

errors.contrastive: Older information technology has already created "winner-take-all" effects in some trade.

reference: The occupational trainingprogrammes (FPO) last 800 hours, training in the workshop schools lasts 1 to 3 years, and in the skilledcraft centres 6 to 12 months.
source: Kurzy přípravy na povolání (FPO) trvají 800 hodin.

errors.contrastive: The trade trainingprogrammes (FPO) last 800 hours, training in the workshop schools lasts 1 to 3 years, and in the skilledcraft centres 6 to 12 months.

reference: However, we also need to focus on occupational illnesses which have a huge cost in terms of workers' health, the cost to businesses and their productivity and to society as a whole through associated social security and health care costs.
source: Potřebujeme se však také zaměřit na nemoci z povolání, které představují obrovské náklady jak ohledně zdraví pracovníků, tak pokud se týká firem a jejich produktivity a společnosti jako celku, která s tím má spojené velké náklady na sociální zabezpečení a zdravotní péči.

errors.contrastive: However, we also need to focus on trade illnesses which have a huge cost in terms of workers' health, the cost to businesses and their productivity and to society as a whole through associated social security and health care costs.

reference: I guess it's a kind of an occupational disease with cops.
source: Myslím, že je to jakási policajtova nemoc z povolání.

errors.contrastive: I guess it's a kind of an trade disease with cops.

reference: In the United States, the rate at which prostitutes are killed in the workplace is 51 times that of the next most dangerous occupation for women, working in a liquor store.
source: Ve Spojených státech je pravděpodobnost zabití prostitutky na „pracovišti“ jedenapadesátkrát vyšší než u druhého nejnebezpečnějšího povolání žen, totiž u prodeje alkoholu ve specializované prodejně.

errors.contrastive: In the United States, the rate at which prostitutes are killed in the workplace is 51 times that of the next most dangerous trade for women, working in a liquor store.

reference: Thosesuccessfully completing the training are entitled topractise their occupation as a qualified employee in training.
source: Duální systém odborného vzdělávání a přípravy (Duales system) odborné vzdělání a nezbytné vědomosti a znalosti potřebné k výkonu povolání.

errors.contrastive: Thosesuccessfully completing the training are entitled topractise their trade as a qualified employee in training.

reference: I also regret that the reduction in the number of industrial injuries and occupational diseases in particular did not include, for example, migrant workers, workers with temporary contracts, workers with low qualifications, and women in certain companies, such as small and medium-sized companies.
source: Jsem zároveň znepokojený, že snížení počtu pracovních úrazů a hlavně nemocí z povolání se netýkalo např. migrujících pracovníků, pracovníků s nejistými smlouvami, pracovníků s nízkou kvalifikací, žen v určitých podnicích, jako jsou malé a střední podniky.

errors.contrastive: I also regret that the reduction in the number of industrial injuries and trade diseases in particular did not include, for example, migrant workers, workers with temporary contracts, workers with low qualifications, and women in certain companies, such as small and medium-sized companies.

reference: Papa used to say it's a job for a mob, but now, he doesn't mind.
source: Tatínek to napřed nechtěl, prý je to povolání pro snoby. Ale teď už mi to nerozmlouvá.

errors.contrastive: Papa used to say it's a trade for a mob, but now, he doesn't mind.

reference: In football, as in other occupations, restrictions on labor mobility came entirely from the demand side.
source: Ve fotbale stejně jako u jiných povolání existovala omezení mobility pracovních sil výlučně na poptávkové straně.

errors.contrastive: In football, as in other trade, restrictions on labor mobility came entirely from the demand side.

reference: According to the Act apprenticeship training aims to promote thedevelopmentof skill in, understanding of andresponsibility in craftmanship in relation to craft,occupation and society.
source: Podle tohoto zákona je cílem učňovské odborné přípravy podporovat rozvoj dovedností, znalostí a odpovědnosti při výkonu řemesla, a to ve vztahu k řemeslu, povolání a společnosti.

errors.contrastive: According to the Act apprenticeship training aims to promote thedevelopmentof skill in, understanding of andresponsibility in craftmanship in relation to craft,trade and society.

source: Chápu, že máš fantastické představy o špionážním povolání, ale tahle práce.. ..znamená více než jen čištění štětečkem a mrtvé schránky.
